translated: ['Ucwaningo lwangaphambilini lubike ukuthi u-R0 we-SARS-CoV-2 ubuphezulu njengo-6.47 ngekhefu lokuzethemba lika-95% (CI) lika-5.71-7.23, kanti u-R0 we-SARS-CoV usukela ku-2 kuya ku-4 kuphela.']

sourceString: A comparison of SARS-CoV-2 with MERS-CoV and SARA-CoV regarding their symptoms, mortality, and R0 is presented in Table ​Table1.1.
targetString: Ukuqhathaniswa kwe-SARS-CoV-2 ne-MERS-CoV kanye ne-SARA-CoV ngokuphathelene nezimpawu zabo, ukufa, kanye no-R0 kumelelwe kokuthi Ithebula Ithebula1.1.
translated: ['Ukuqhathaniswa kwe-SARS-CoV-2 ne-MERS-CoV ne-SARA-CoV mayelana nezimpawu zabo, ukufa, kanye no-R0 kuvezwa kuThebula Table1.1.']

sourceString: The above figures suggest that SARS-CoV-2 has a higher ability to spread than MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV, but it is less lethal than the latter two.
targetString: Izinombolo ezingenhla zisikisela ukuthi i-SARS-CoV-2 inekhono eliphakeme kakhulu lokubhebhetheka kune-MERS-CoV kanye ne-SARS-CoV, kodwa inamandla amancane okubulala kunazo zombili.
translated: ['Izibalo ezingenhla zibonisa ukuthi i-SARS-CoV-2 inekhono eliphakeme lokusabalala kune-MERS-CoV ne-SARS-CoV, kodwa ayibulali kangako kunezimbili zokugcina.']

sourceString: Thus, it is much more challenging to control the epidemic of SARS-CoV-2 than those of MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV.
targetString: Ngakho-ke, kuyinselele kakhulu ukulawula umqedazwe we-SARS-CoV-2 kune-MERS-CoV kanye ne-SARS-CoV.
translated: ['Ngakho, kuyinselele kakhulu ukulawula ubhubhane lwe-SARS-CoV-2 kunalabo be-MERS-CoV ne-SARS-CoV.']

sourceString: Clustered onset often happens in the same family or from the same gathering or vehicle such as a cruise ship.
targetString: Ukuqalisa kwamaqoqo kuvame ukwenzeka kumndeni ofanayo noma kumbuthano ofanayo noma into yezokuthutha efana nomkhumbi wokungcebeleka.
translated: ['Ukuqala okuhlanganisiwe kuvame ukwenzeka emndenini ofanayo noma kusuka embuthanweni ofanayo noma imoto efana nomkhumbi we-cruise.']

sourceString: Patients often have a history of travel or residence in Wuhan or other affected areas or contact with infected individuals or patients in the recent two weeks before the onset.
targetString: Iziguli ngokuvamile zinomlando wokuvakasha noma zihlala e-Wuhan noma ezinye izindawo ezithintekile noma ukuxhumana nabantu abathelelekile noma iziguli emavikini amabili akamuva ngaphambi kokuqala.
translated: ['Iziguli zivame ukuba nomlando wokuhamba noma wokuhlala eWuhan noma kwezinye izindawo ezithintekile noma ukuxhumana nabantu abanegciwane noma iziguli emasontweni amabili edlule ngaphambi kokuqala.']

sourceString: However, it has been reported that people can carry the virus without symptoms longer than two weeks and cured patients discharged from hospitals can carry the virus again, which sends out an alarm to increase the time for quarantine.
targetString: Nokho, kuye kwabikwa ukuthi abantu bangakwazi ukuthwala igciwane ngaphandle kwezimpawu isikhathi eside kunamaviki amabili futhi iziguli ezilashiwe ezikhishiwe esibhedlela zingakwazi ukuphinde zithwale igciwane futhi, okukhipha isixwayiso sokunyusa isikhathi sokuzivalela.
translated: ['Kodwa-ke kubikwe ukuthi abantu bangathwala igciwane ngaphandle kwezimpawu isikhathi esingaphezu kwamasonto amabili futhi iziguli eziphulukisiwe ezikhishwe ezibhedlela zingaphinde zithwale igciwane, okuthumela i-alamu yokwandisa isikhathi sokuvalelisa.']

sourceString: Patients have normal or reduced number of peripheral white blood cells (especially lymphocytes) at the early stage.
targetString: Iziguli zinenani elivamile noma elincishisiwe lamaseli amhlophe egazi ayi-peripheral (ikakhulukazi ama-lymphocyte) ezigabeni zokuqala.
translated: ['Iziguli zinenani elijwayelekile noma elincishisiwe lamaseli amhlophe egazi e-peripheral (ikakhulukazi ama-lymphocytes) esigabeni sokuqala.']

sourceString: For example, lymphopenia with white blood cell count < 4×109/L including lymphocyte count < 1×109/L, and elevated aspartate aminotransferase levels and viremia were found in 1,099 COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Ngokwesibonelo, i-lymphopenia enesibalo samaseli egazi amhlophe esithi < 4×109/L okuhlanganisa isibalo se-lymphocyte esithi < 1×109/L, kanye namazinga aphakeme e-aspartate aminotransferase kanye ne-viremia atholwa kuziguli ezingu-1,099 ezine-COVID-19.
translated: ['Isibonelo, i-lymphopenia enesibalo samaseli amhlophe egazi < 4×109 / L kufaka phakathi isibalo se-lymphocyte <-1×109 / L, futhi amazinga aphakeme e-aspartate aminotransferase kanye ne-viremia atholakala ezigulini ze-1,099 COVID-19.']

sourceString: The levels of liver and muscle enzymes and myoglobin were increased in the blood of some patients, and C-reactive protein and erythrocyte sedimentation were increased in the blood of most patients.
targetString: Amazinga ama-enzyme esibindi nomsipha kanye ne-myoglobin ayephakeme egazini lezinye iziguli, futhi iphrotheni eyi-C-reactive kanye ne-erythrocyte sedimentation yayiphakeme egazini leziguli eziningi.
translated: ['Amazinga ama-enzyme wesibindi nemisipha kanye ne-myoglobin akhuphuka egazini lezinye iziguli, futhi amaprotheni e-C-reactive kanye ne-erythrocyte sedimentation akhuphuka egazini leziguli eziningi.']

sourceString: In patients with severe cases, the level of D-dimer, a fibrin degradation product present in the blood, was elevated, and lymphocyte count was progressively reduced.
targetString: Kuziguli ezinokugula okubucayi, izinga le-D-dimer, umkhiqizo wokuwohloka kwe-fibrin okhona egazini, laliphakeme, futhi isibalo se-lymphocyte lalinciphe ngokuphawulekayo.
translated: ['Ezigulini ezinamacala anzima, izinga le-D-dimer, umkhiqizo wokuchithwa kwe-fibrin okhona egazini, waphakanyiswa, futhi isibalo se-lymphocyte sancishiswa ngokuqhubekayo.']

sourceString: Abnormalities in chest radiography are found in most COVID-19 patients and featured by bilateral patchy shadows or ground glass opacity in the lungs.
targetString: Kwatholwa okungajwayelekile ku-radiography yesifuba yeziguli eziningi ezine-COVID-19 futhi okunezici zethunzi elinamapheshi akabili noma i-ground glass opacity emaphasheni.
translated: ['Ukungahambi kahle ku-radiography yesifuba kutholakala ezigulini eziningi ze-COVID-19 futhi kuboniswa izithunzi ezinamabala amabili noma i-ground glass opacity emaphashini.']

sourceString: Patients often develop an atypical pneumonia, acute lung injury, and acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
targetString: Iziguli zivame ukuphathwa inyumoniya engavamile, ukulimala kwephaphu okubucayi, kanye ne-acute respiratory distress syndrome (I-ARDS).
translated: ['Iziguli zivame ukuba ne-pneumonia ye-atypical, ukulimala okukhulu kwamaphaphu, kanye ne-acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).']

sourceString: When ARDS happens, uncontrolled inflammation, fluid accumulation, and progressive fibrosis severely compromise the gas exchange.
targetString: Lapho kwenzeka i-ARDS, ukuvuvukala okungalawuliwe, ukukhula koketshezi, kanye ne-fibrosis ethuthukayo kufaka engcupheni ukushintshana kwegesi.
translated: ['Lapho kwenzeka i-ARDS, ukuvuvukala okungalawulwa, ukuqoqwa kwamanzi, kanye ne-fibrosis eqhubekayo kuphazamisa kakhulu ukushintshaniswa kwegesi.']

sourceString: Dysfunction of type-I and type-II pneumocytes decreases the surfactant level and increases surface tension, thus reducing the ability of the lungs to expand and heightening the risk of lung collapse.
targetString: Ukungasebenzi kahle kohlobo-I nohlobo-II lwe-pneumocyte kunciphisa izinga le-surfactant futhi kunyuse ukucindezeleka kwendawo engaphezulu, ngaleyo ndlela kuncishiswe ikhono lamaphaphu lokunwebeka futhi okunyusa ingozi yokuwa kwamaphaphu.
translated: ['Ukungasebenzi kahle kwe-type-I kanye ne-pneumocytes yohlobo II kunciphisa izinga le-surfactant futhi kwandise ukungezwani komhlaba, ngaleyo ndlela kunciphise ikhono lamaphaphu lokwandisa nokuphakamisa ingozi yokuwa kwamaphaphu.']

sourceString: Therefore, the worst chest radiographic findings often parallel the most severe extent of the disease.
targetString: Ngakho-ke, imiphumela emibi kakhulu ye-radiography ivame ukufana nesimo esibucayi kakhulu sesifo.
translated: ['Ngakho-ke, okutholakele okubi kakhulu kwesifuba se-radiographic kuvame ukufana nobukhulu obunzima kakhulu besifo.']

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, the first pathological analysis of COVID-19 demonstrated the desquamation of pneumocytes, hyaline membrane formation, and interstitial lymphocyte infiltration, and multinucleated syncytial cells in the lungs of a patient who died of the disease, consistent with the pathology of viral infection and ARDS and similar to that of SARS and MERS patients.
targetString: Ngo-February 18, 2020, ukuhlaziya kokuqala oku-pathological kwe-COVID-19 kwabonisa ukuxebuka kwama-pneumocyte, ukwakheka kolwelwesi lwe-hyaline, kanye nokufinyelelwa kwe-interstitial lymphocyte, kanye namaseli e-multinucleated syncytial emaphasheni esiguli esibulawe isifo, okuhambisana ne-pathology yesifo segciwane kanye ne-ARDS futhi okufana nalokho kweziguli ze-SARS ne-MERS.
translated: ['Ngo-February 18, 2020, ukuhlaziywa kokuqala kwe-pathological ye-COVID-19 kwabonisa ukuphelelwa yisikhathi kwama-pneumocytes, ukwakheka kwe-membrane ye-hyaline, kanye nokungena kwe-lymphocyte interstitial, kanye namaseli we-syncytial amaningi emaphashini esiguli esabulawa nesifo, esihambisana ne-pathology yokutheleleka kwamagciwane kanye ne-ARDS futhi efana naleyo yeziguli ze-SARS ne-MERS.']

sourceString: The detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA via reverse-transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) was used as the major criteria for the diagnosis of COVID-19.
targetString: Ukutholwa kwe-RNA ye-SARS-CoV-2 kusetshenziswa i-reverse-transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (I-RT-PCR) kwasetshenziswa njengombandela omkhulu wokuxilongwa kwe-COVID-19.
translated: ['Ukutholakala kwe-SARS-CoV-2 RNA nge-reverse-transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) kwasetshenziswa njengemigomo emikhulu yokuxilongwa kwe-COVID-19.']

sourceString: However, due to the high false-negative rate, which may accelerate the epidemic, clinical manifestations started to be used for diagnosis (which no longer solely relied on RT-PCR) in China on February 13, 2020.
targetString: Nokho, ngenxa yenani eliphakeme lenegethivu engeyikho, engase isheshise umqedazwe, ukubonakala kwezokwelashwa kwaqala ukusetshenziswa lapho kuxilongwa (okwakungathembele kuphela ku-RT-PCR) e-China ngo-February 13, 2020.
translated: ['Kodwa-ke, ngenxa yezinga eliphezulu elingamanga-elibi, elingasheshisa ubhubhane, ukubonakaliswa komtholampilo kwaqala ukusetshenziselwa ukuxilongwa (okungasathembele kuphela ku-RT-PCR) eChina ngoFebhuwari 13, 2020.']

sourceString: A similar situation also occurred with the diagnosis of SARS.
targetString: Kwavela isimo esifanayo lapho kuxilongwa i-SARS.
translated: ['Isimo esifanayo senzeka nokuxilongwa kwe-SARS.']

sourceString: Therefore, a combination of disease history, clinical manifestations, laboratory tests, and radiological findings is essential and imperative for making an effective diagnosis.
targetString: Ngakho-ke, inhlanganisela yomlando wesifo, ukubonakaliswa kwezokwelashwa, ukuhlolwa kwaselabhorethri, nemiphumela ye-radiological ibalulekile futhi isemqoka ukuze kwenziwe ukuxilongwa okuyimpumelelo.
translated: ['Ngakho-ke, inhlanganisela yomlando wezifo, ukubonakaliswa komtholampilo, ukuhlolwa kwelabhoratri, kanye nokutholakala kwe-radiological kubalulekile futhi kuphoqelekile ekwenzeni ukuxilongwa okuphumelelayo.']

sourceString: On February 14, 2020, the Feng Zhang group described a protocol of using the CRISPR-based SHERLOCK technique to detect SARS-CoV-2, which detects synthetic SARS-CoV-2 RNA fragments at 20 × 10-18 mol/L to 200 × 10-18 mol/L (10-100 copies per microliter of input) using a dipstick in less than an hour without requiring elaborate instrumentation.
targetString: Ngo-February 14, 2020, iqembu le-Feng Zhang lachaza iphrothokholi yokusebenzisa indlela ka-SHERLOCK esekelwe ku-CRISPR ukuze kutholwe i-SARS-CoV-2, ethola izingxenyana ezingezona ezemvelo ze-RNA ye-SARS-CoV-2 ku-20 × 10-18 mol/L to 200 × 10-18 mol/L (amakhophi angu-10-100 nge-microliter ngayinye yokufakiwe) kusetshenziswa induku yokugcobhoza enkathini engaphansi kwehora ngaphandle kokudinga amathuluzi ayinkimbinkimbi.
translated: ['NgoFebhuwari 14, 2020, iqembu le-Feng Zhang lachaza umthetho olandelwayo wokusebenzisa inqubo ye-SHERLOCK esekelwe ku-CRISPR ukuthola i-SARS-CoV-2, ethola izingcezu zokwenziwa ze-SARS-CoV-2 RNA ku-20 × 10-18 mol / L kuya ku-200 ×-10-18 mol / L (amakhophi we-10-100 nge-microliter yokufaka) usebenzisa i-dipstick esikhathini esingaphansi kwehora ngaphandle kokudinga i-instrumentation eyinkimbinkimbi.']

sourceString: Hopefully, the new technique can dramatically enhance the sensitivity and convenience if verified in clinical samples.
targetString: Sithemba ukuthi indlela entsha izothuthukisa kakhulu ukuzwela nezinzuzo uma kuqinisekisiwe kumasampula ezokwelashwa.
translated: ['Ngethemba, inqubo entsha ingathuthukisa ngokuphawulekayo ukuzwela nokulula uma kuqinisekisiwe kumasampula omtholampilo.']

sourceString: Due to the lack of experience with the novel CoV, physicians can mainly provide supportive care to COVID-19 patients, while attempting a variety of therapies that have been used or proposed before for the treatment of other CoVs such as SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV and other viral diseases (Table ​(Table2).2).
targetString: Ngenxa yokuntula okuhlangenwe nakho nge-CoV entsha, odokotela ngokuyinhloko bangakwazi ukunikeza ukunakekelwa kokusekela kuziguli ze-COVID-19, kuyilapho bezama izinhlobonhlobo zezindlela zokwelapha ezisetshenzisiwe noma eziphakanyisiwe ngaphambilini ukuze kwelashwe amanye ama-CoV afana ne-SARS-CoV kanye ne-MERS-CoV nezinye izifo zamagciwane (Ithebula ​(Ithebula2).2).
translated: ['Ngenxa yokuntuleka kokuhlangenwe nakho nge-CoV entsha, odokotela banganikeza ikakhulukazi ukunakekelwa okusekelayo ezigulini ze-COVID-19, ngenkathi bezama izindlela ezihlukahlukene zokwelapha eziye zasetshenziswa noma zaphakanyiswa ngaphambili ukwelashwa kwamanye ama-CoVs afana ne-SARS-CoV ne-MERS-CoV nezinye izifo ezibangelwa amagciwane (Ithebula (Ithebula2).2).']

sourceString: These therapies include current and potential treatments with antiviral drugs, immunosuppressants, steroids, plasma from recovered patients, Chinese medicine, and psychological support.
targetString: Lokhu kwelashwa kuhlanganisa ukwelashwa kwamanje nokungase kube ukwelashwa ngemithi elwa namagciwane, ama-immunosuppressant, ama-steroid, i-plasma evela kuziguli eziluleme, imithi yama-Chinese, kanye nosizo lwezengqondo.
translated: ['Lezi zindlela zokwelapha zihlanganisa ukwelashwa kwamanje futhi okungenzeka ngemithi elwa namagciwane, ama-immunosuppressants, ama-steroid, i-plasma evela ezigulini ezibuyisiwe, imithi yamaShayina, nokusekelwa kwengqondo.']

sourceString: Even plasma from recovered patients was proposed to be used for treatment.
targetString: Kwenziwa ngisho nesiphakamiso sokusebenzisa i-plasma yeziguli eziluleme njengendlela yokwelashwa.
translated: ['Ngisho ne-plasma evela ezigulini ezibuyisiwe yaphakanyiswa ukuthi isetshenziselwe ukwelashwa.']

sourceString: Pharmaceutical companies are racing to develop antibodies and vaccines against the virus.
targetString: Izinkampani zama-pharmaceutical ziyaqhudelana ukuze zakhe izivikeli-mzimba nemigomo emelene negciwane.
translated: ['Izinkampani zemithi zijaha ukuthuthukisa ama-antibodies kanye nemithi yokugoma yokulwa naleli gciwane.']

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 mainly attacks the lungs in the beginning and probably also attacks, to a lesser degree, other organs that express ACE2, such as the gastrointestinal system and the kidneys.
targetString: I-SARS-CoV-2 ngokuyinhloko ihlasela amaphaphu ekuqaleni futhi cishe iphinde ihlasele, ngokwezinga elincane, ezinye izitho zomzimba ezibonisa i-ACE2, njengesistimu ye-gastrointestinal kanye nezinso.
translated: ['I-SARS-CoV-2 ikakhulukazi ihlasela amaphaphu ekuqaleni futhi mhlawumbe futhi ihlasela, ngezinga elincane, ezinye izitho eziveza i-ACE2, njengohlelo lwesisu nezinso.']

sourceString: Nevertheless, respiratory dysfunction and failure are the major threat to the patients and the major cause of death.
targetString: Noma kunjalo, ukungasebenzi kahle kanye nokuhluleka kwendlela yokuphefumula kuwusongo olukhulu kuziguli futhi kuyimbangela enkulu yokufa.
translated: ['Noma kunjalo, ukungasebenzi kahle kokuphefumula kanye nokwehluleka kuyingozi enkulu ezigulini kanye nembangela enkulu yokufa.']

sourceString: Thus, respiratory support is critical to relieve the symptoms and save lives and includes general oxygen therapy, high-flow oxygen, noninvasive ventilation, and invasive mechanical ventilation depending on the severity of the disease.
targetString: Ngakho-ke, ukusekelwa kokuphefumula kubalulekile ukuze kudambiswe izimpawu futhi kusindiswe izimpilo futhi kuhlanganisa ukwelashwa okuvamile ngomoya-mpilo, ukugeleza okuphakeme komoya-mpilo, ukufakwa komoya ngaphandle kwemishini elimaza umzimba, kanye nokufakwa komoya kusetshenziswa imishini elimaza umzimba kuye ngobucayi besifo.
translated: ['Ngakho, ukwesekwa kokuphefumula kubalulekile ukuqeda izimpawu nokusindisa izimpilo futhi kufaka phakathi ukwelashwa komoya-mpilo jikelele, umoya-mpilo ogeleza kakhulu, umoya wokuphefumula ongahlaseli, kanye nokuphefumula kwemishini okuhlaselayo ngokuya ngobunzima besifo.']

sourceString: Patients with severe respiratory symptoms have to be supported by extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO), a modified cardiopulmonary bypass technique used for the treatment of life-threatening cardiac or respiratory failure.
targetString: Iziguli ezinezimpawu zokuphefumula ezibucayi kufanele zisekelwe kusetshenziswa i-extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (I-ECMO), indlela elungisiwe yokuhlinzwa ye-cardiopulmonary esetshenziselwa ukwelapha ukwehluleka kokusebenza kwenhliziyo noma kokuphefumula okusongela ukuphila.
translated: ['Iziguli ezinezimpawu ezinzima zokuphefumula kufanele zixhaswe yi-extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO), inqubo eguquliwe ye-cardiopulmonary bypass esetshenziselwa ukwelashwa kokuhluleka kwenhliziyo noma ukuphefumula okusongela ukuphila.']

sourceString: In addition, the maintenance of electrolyte balance, the prevention and treatment of secondary infection and septic shock, and the protection of the functions of the vital organs are also essential for SARS-CoV-2 patients.
targetString: Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukugcinwa esimweni kwebhalansi ye-electrolyte, ukuvinjwa nokwelashwa kokutheleleka kwesibili kanye ne-septic shock, kanye nokuvikelwa kokusebenza kwezitho zomzimba ezisemqoka nakho kubalulekile kuziguli ezine-SARS-CoV-2.
translated: ['Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukugcinwa kwebhalansi ye-electrolyte, ukuvimbela nokwelashwa kokutheleleka kwesibili kanye nokushaqeka kwe-septic, kanye nokuvikelwa kwemisebenzi yezitho ezibalulekile nakho kubalulekile ezigulini ze-SARS-CoV-2.']

sourceString: It has been known that a cytokine storm results from an overreaction of the immune system in SARS and MERS patients.
targetString: Kuyaziwa ukuthi isiphepho se-cytokine siwumphumela wokusabela ngokwedlulele kwamasosha omzimba kuziguli ze-SARS ne-MERS.
translated: ['Kuye kwaziwa ukuthi isiphepho se-cytokine esibangelwa ukusabela ngokweqile kwamasosha omzimba ezigulini ze-SARS ne-MERS.']

sourceString: Cytokine storm is a form of systemic inflammatory response featured by the release of a series of cytokines including TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ, and MCP-1.
targetString: Isiphepho se-cytokine siyindlela yokusabela yohlelo lokuvuvukala enezici zokukhululwa kochungechunge lwama-cytokine okuhlanganisa i-TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ, kanye ne-MCP-1.
translated: ['Isiphepho se-Cytokine siyindlela yokuphendula kokuvuvukala kwesistimu ekhonjiswe ngokukhishwa kochungechunge lwama-cytokines kufaka phakathi i-TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ, ne-MCP-1.']

sourceString: These cytokines induce immune cells to release a vast number of free radicals which are the major cause of ARDS and multiple organ failure.
targetString: Lawa ma-cytokine akhuthaza amasosha omzimba ukuthi akhulule inani elikhulu nama-radical akhululekile ayimbangela eyinhloko ye-ARDS kanye nokuhluleka kwezitho zomzimba eziningi.
translated: ['La ma-cytokines enza amangqamuzana omzimba akhiphe inani elikhulu lama-radicals mahhala okuyimbangela enkulu ye-ARDS kanye nokwehluleka kwezitho eziningi.']

sourceString: Immunosuppression is essential in the treatment of cytokine storms, especially in severe patients.
targetString: Ukucindezelwa kwamasosha omzimba kubalulekile ekwelashweni kweziphepho ze-cytokine, ikakhulukazi kuziguli ezibucayi.
translated: ['I-immunosuppression ibalulekile ekwelapheni iziphepho ze-cytokine, ikakhulukazi ezigulini ezinzima.']

sourceString: Corticosteroids and tocilizumab, an anti-IL6 monoclonal antibody, have been used to treat cytokine storm.
targetString: Ama-corticosteroid kanye ne-tocilizumab, isivikeli-mzimba esiyi-anti-IL6 monoclonal, kuye kwasetshenziswa ukuze kwelashwe isiphepho se-cytokine.
translated: ['Ama-Corticosteroids kanye ne-tocilizumab, i-anti-IL6 monoclonal antibody, asetshenziselwe ukwelapha isiphepho se-cytokine.']

sourceString: Other immunosuppression treatments for cytokine storm include the modulation of T cell-directed immune response; the blockade of IFN-γ, IL-1, and TNF; JAK inhibition; blinatumomab; suppressor of cytokine signaling 4; and HDAC inhibitors.
targetString: Okunye ukwelashwa kokucindezelwa kwamasosha omzimba kwesiphepho se-cytokine kuhlanganisa ukulawulwa kokusabela kwamasosha omzimba okuqondiswe kuseli lika-T; ukuvinjwa kwe-IFN-γ, IL-1, kanye ne-TNF; ukuthiywa kwe-JAK ; i-blinatumomab; umcindezeli wokusetshenziswa kwesiginali ye-cytokine 4; kanye nezivimbi ze-HDAC.
translated: ['Ezinye izindlela zokwelapha ze-immunosuppression zesiphepho se-cytokine zihlanganisa i-modulation yokuphendula komzimba okuqondiswe yi-T cell; ukuvinjwa kwe-IFN-γ, IL-1, ne-TNF; Ukuvimbela i-JAK; blinatumomab; suppressor of cytokine uphawu 4; kanye ne-HDAC inhibitors.']

sourceString: Steroids, as immunosuppressants, were widely used in the treatment of SARS to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.
targetString: Ama-steroid, njengama-immunosuppressant, asetshenziswa kabanzi ukwelashweni kwe-SARS ukuze kuncishiswe ubucayi komonakalo wokuvuvukala.
translated: ['Ama-steroid, njengama-immunosuppressants, asetshenziswa kabanzi ekwelapheni i-SARS ukunciphisa ubunzima bomonakalo wokuvuvukala.']

sourceString: However, steroids at high dosages were not beneficial to severe lung injury in SARS and COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Nokho, ama-steroid kusilinganiso esiphakeme awazange azuzise ekulimaleni kwamaphaphu okubucayi ezigulini eziphethwe i-SARS kanye ne-COVID-19.
translated: ['Kodwa-ke, ama-steroid ngemithamo ephezulu ayengazuzisi ukulimala okukhulu kwamaphaphu ezigulini ze-SARS ne-COVID-19.']

sourceString: Instead, they may cause severe side effects, especially avascular osteonecrosis, dramatically affecting the prognosis.
targetString: Kunalokho, kungase kubangele imiphumela engathandeki ebucayi, ikakhulukazi i-avascular osteonecrosis, okuphazamisa ngendlela ephawulekayo i-prognosis.
translated: ['Esikhundleni salokho, zingase zibangele imiphumela emibi kakhulu, ikakhulukazi i-osteonecrosis yenhliziyo, ethinta kakhulu i-prognosis.']

sourceString: Nevertheless, short courses of corticosteroids at low-to-moderate doses have been recommended to be used prudently for critically ill COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Noma kunjalo, uhlelo olufushane lwama-corticosteroid ngezilinganiso eziphansi kuye kwezimaphakathi ziye zatuswa ukuthi zisetshenziswe ngokucophelela kuziguli ze-COVID-19 ezigula ngendlela ebucayi.
translated: ['Noma kunjalo, izifundo ezimfushane ze-corticosteroids ngemithamo ephansi kuya kokulinganisela ziye zanconywa ukuthi zisetshenziswe ngokuhlakanipha ezigulini ezigula kakhulu ze-COVID-19.']

sourceString: At the time of writing, no effective antiviral therapy has been confirmed.
targetString: Ngesikhathi sokubhala, akukho ukwelashwa okusebenzayo okulwa negciwane okwase kuqinisekisiwe.
translated: ['Ngesikhathi sokubhala, akukho ukwelashwa okusebenzayo kwe-antiviral okuqinisekisiwe.']

sourceString: However, intravenous administration with remdesivir, a nucleotide analog, has been found to be efficacious in an American patient with COVID-19.
targetString: Nokho, ukufakwa emthanjeni nge-remdesivir, okuyi-nucleotide analog, kwatholwa kusebenza esigulini esiyi-American esine-COVID-19.
translated: ['Kodwa-ke, ukuphathwa kwe-intravenous nge-remdesivir, i-nucleotide analog, kutholakale ukuthi kuyi-efficacious esigulini saseMelika esine-COVID-19.']

sourceString: Remdesivir is a novel antiviral drug developed by Gilead initially for the treatment of diseases caused by Ebola and Marlburg viruses.
targetString: I-Remdesivir iwumuthi omusha olwa negciwane owaqala wakhiqizwa yi-Gilead ukuze kwelashwe izifo ezibangelwa amagciwane e-Ebola ne-Marlburg.
translated: ['I-Remdesivir iyisidakamizwa se-novel antiviral esakhiwa yiGileyadi ekuqaleni ekwelapheni izifo ezibangelwa amagciwane e-Ebola neMarlburg.']

sourceString: Later, remdesivir also demonstrated possible inhibition of other single stranded RNA viruses including MERS and SARS viruses.
targetString: Kamuva, i-remdesivir yaphinde yabonisa ukuthi yayingase ivimbele amagciwane e-RNA anomucu owodwa okuhlanganisa amagciwane e-MERS ne-SARS.
translated: ['Kamuva, i-remdesivir iphinde yabonisa ukuvimbela okungenzeka kwamanye amagciwane e-RNA awodwa axhunyiwe kufaka phakathi amagciwane e-MERS ne-SARS.']

sourceString: Based on these, Gilead has provided the compound to China to conduct a pair of trials on SARS-CoV-2-infected individuals, and the results are highly anticipated.
targetString: Ngokusekelwe kulokhu, i-Gilead inikeze i-China isakhi ukuze iqhube izingcwaningo kubantu abaphethwe i-SARS-CoV-2, futhi imiphumela ibhekwe ngabomvu.
translated: ['Ngokusekelwe kulezi, iGileyadi linikeze i-compound eChina ukuqhuba izivivinyo ezimbili kubantu abanegciwane le-SARS-CoV-2, futhi imiphumela ilindelwe kakhulu.']

sourceString: In addition, baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, and ribavirin have been suggested as potential therapies for patients with acute respiratory symptoms.
targetString: Ngaphezu kwalokho, i-baricitinb, i-interferon-α, i-lopinavir/ritonavir, kanye ne-ribavirin kuye kwaphakanyiswa njengokungase kube ukwelashwa kweziguli ezinezimpawu zokuphefumula ezibucayi.
translated: ['Ngaphezu kwalokho, i-baricitinb, i-interferon-α, i-lopinavir / ritonavir, ne-ribavirin iye yaphakanyiswa njengezindlela zokwelapha ezingaba khona zeziguli ezinezimpawu zokuphefumula ezibukhali.']

sourceString: Diarrhea, nausea, vomiting, liver damage, and other adverse reactions can occur following combined therapy with lopinavir/ritonavir.
targetString: Isifo sohudo, isicanucanu, ukuhlanza, ukulimala kwesibindi, nokunye ukusabela okubucayi kungase kuvele ngemva kokwelashwa okuyinhlanganisela nge-lopinavir/ritonavir.
translated: ['Isifo sohudo, isicanucanu, ukuhlanza, ukulimala kwesibindi, nokunye ukusabela okungekuhle kungenzeka kulandela ukwelashwa okuhlangene ne-lopinavir / ritonavir.']

sourceString: The interaction of these treatments with other drugs used in the patients should be monitored carefully.
targetString: Ukusebenzelana kwalokhu kwelashwa neminye imithi esetshenziswe kuziguli kufanele kuqashelwe ngokucophelela.
translated: ['Ukusebenzisana kwalezi zindlela zokwelapha nezinye izidakamizwa ezisetshenziswa ezigulini kufanele kubhekwe ngokucophelela.']

sourceString: Plasma from recovered patients and antibody generation
targetString: I-Plasma evela kuziguli eziluleme nokwakhiwa kwezivikeli-mzimba
translated: ['I-Plasma evela ezigulini ezibuyisiwe kanye nesizukulwane se-antibody']

sourceString: The collection of the blood from patients who recovered from a contagious disease to treat other patients suffering from the same disease or to protect healthy individuals from catching the disease has a long history.
targetString: Ukuqoqwa kwegazi leziguli eziluleme esifweni esithathelanayo ukuze kwelashwe ezinye iziguli eziphethwe isifo esifanayo noma ukuze kuvikelwe abantu abaphile kahle ukuthi bangasitholi isifo kunomlando omude.
translated: ['Ukuqoqwa kwegazi ezigulini ezaphila ngesifo esithathelwanayo ukwelapha ezinye iziguli eziphethwe yisifo esifanayo noma ukuvikela abantu abaphilile ekubambeni lesi sifo inomlando omude.']

sourceString: Indeed, recovered patients often have a relatively high level of antibodies against the pathogen in their blood.
targetString: Eqinisweni, iziguli eziluleme zivame ukuba nezinga eliphakeme lezivikeli-mzimba ezimelana nesifo esisegazini labo.
translated: ['Ngempela, iziguli ezibuyisiwe zivame ukuba nezinga eliphezulu kakhulu lama-antibodies ngokumelene ne-pathogen egazini lazo.']

sourceString: Antibodies are an immunoglobulin (Ig) produced by B lymphocytes to fight pathogens and other foreign objects and they recognize unique molecules in the pathogens and neutralize them directly.
targetString: Izivikeli-mzimba ziyi-immunoglobulin (Ig) ekhiqizwa ama-B lymphocyte ukuze kuliwe nezifo kanye nezinye izinto ezingadingekile emzimbeni futhi zikwazi ukubona amangqamuzana ahlukile ezifweni futhi awenze angasebenzi ngokuqondile.
translated: ['Ama-antibodies ayi-immunoglobulin (Ig) ekhiqizwa ngama-B lymphocytes ukulwa nezifo nezinye izinto zakwamanye amazwe futhi aqaphela ama-molecule ahlukile kuma-pathogens futhi awathathi hlangothi ngqo.']

sourceString: Based on this, plasma was collected from the blood of a group of patients who recovered from COVID-19 and was injected into 10 seriously ill patients.
targetString: Ngokusekelwe kulokhu, i-plasma yaqoqwa egazini leqembu leziguli ezilulame ku-COVID-19 futhi yajovwa kuziguli ezigula ezingu-10 ngendlela ebucayi ezingu-.
translated: ['Ngokusekelwe kulokhu, i-plasma yaqoqwa egazini leqembu leziguli ezaphila ku-COVID-19 futhi zafakwa ezigulini ezingu-10 ezigula kakhulu.']

sourceString: Their symptoms improved within 24 hours, accompanied by reduced inflammation and viral loads and improved oxygen saturation in the blood.
targetString: Izimpawu zazo zaba ngcono emahoreni angu-24, okwahambisana nokuvuvukala okuncishisiwe kanye nemithamo yegciwane kanye nokugcwala komoya-mpilo okuthuthukile egazini.
translated: ['Izimpawu zabo zathuthuka kungakapheli amahora angama-24, zihambisana nokunciphisa ukuvuvukala kanye nemithwalo yamagciwane kanye nokuthuthukisa ukugcwala komoya-mpilo egazini.']

sourceString: However, verification and clarification are necessary to propose the method for large-scale use before specific therapies are not yet developed.
targetString: Nokho, ukuqinisekiswa kanye nokucaciswa kuyadingeka ukuze kwenziwe isiphakamiso sokuthi indlela isetshenziswe kabanzi ngaphambi kokuthi ukwelashwa okuthile kuthuthukiswe.
translated: ['Kodwa-ke, ukuqinisekiswa nokucaciswa kuyadingeka ukuphakamisa indlela yokusetshenziswa okukhulu ngaphambi kokuba izindlela ezithile zokwelapha zingakathuthukiswa.']

sourceString: In addition, given the therapeutic effects, some disadvantages associated with the plasma should be considered carefully.
targetString: Ngaphezu kwalokho, uma kucatshangelwa imiphumela yokwelashwa, okunye okungazuzisi okuhlobene ne-plasma kufanele kucatshangelwe ngokucophelela.
translated: ['Ngaphezu kwalokho, kunikezwe imiphumela yokwelapha, ezinye izinto ezingezinhle ezihambisana ne-plasma kufanele zibhekwe ngokucophelela.']

sourceString: For example, antibodies can overstimulate the immune response and cause cytokine release syndrome, which is potentially a life-threatening toxicity.
targetString: Ngokwesibonelo, izivikeli-mzimba zingakhuthaza ngokwedlulele ukusabela kwamasosha omzimba futhi kubangele isifo sokukhululwa kwe-cytokine, okungase kube ubungozi obusongela ukuphila.
translated: ['Isibonelo, ama-antibodies angakwazi ukugqugquzela ngokweqile ukuphendula kwamasosha omzimba futhi abangele i-cytokine release syndrome, okungenzeka ukuthi ubuthi obusongela ukuphila.']

sourceString: The concentration of antibodies in the blood is usually low, and the demand for the plasma is large to treat critically ill patients.
targetString: Umthamo wezivikeli-mzimba ezisegazini ngokuvamile uphansi, futhi isidingo se-plasma sikhulu ukuthi kungalashwa iziguli ezigula ngendlela ebucayi.
translated: ['Ukuhlushwa kwama-antibodies egazini kuvame ukuba phansi, futhi isidingo se-plasma sikhulu ukwelapha iziguli ezigula kakhulu.']

sourceString: It is difficult to develop and produce specific antibodies rapidly enough to fight against a global epidemic.
targetString: Kunzima ukwakha nokukhiqiza izivikeli-mzimba ezithile ngokushesha okukhulu ukuze kuliwe nomqedazwe wembulunga yonke.
translated: ['Kunzima ukuthuthukisa nokukhiqiza ama-antibodies athile ngokushesha ngokwanele ukulwa nobhubhane lomhlaba wonke.']

sourceString: Thus, it is more critical and practical to isolate B cells from recovered patients and identify the genetic codes encoding effective antibodies or screen for effective antibodies against essential proteins of the virus.
targetString: Ngenxa yalokho, kubaluleke kakhulu futhi kunengqondo ukuhlukanisa amaseli ka-B eziguli eziluleme futhi kuphawulwe amakhodi ezakhi zofuzo anezakhi zofuzo ezisebenzayo noma kuhlungwe izivikeli-mzimba ezisebenzayo ekumeleleni amaphrotheni abalulekile egciwane.
translated: ['Ngakho, kubalulekile kakhulu futhi kusebenza ukuhlukanisa amaseli e-B ezigulini ezibuyisiwe futhi ukhombe amakhodi ofuzo afaka ama-antibodies asebenzayo noma isikrini sama-antibodies asebenzayo ngokumelene namaprotheni abalulekile wegciwane.']

sourceString: This way, we can readily scale up the production of the antibodies.
targetString: Ngale ndlela, singakwazi ukunyusa ukukhiqizwa kwezivikeli-mzimba.
translated: ['Ngale ndlela, singakwazi ukukhulisa kalula ukukhiqizwa kwama-antibodies.']

sourceString: TCM has been used to treat a variety of diseases in China for thousands of years.
targetString: I-TCM iye yasetshenziswa ukuze kulashwe izinhlobonhlobo zezifo e-China izinkulungwane zeminyaka.
translated: ['I-TCM isetshenziselwe ukwelapha izifo ezihlukahlukene eChina izinkulungwane zeminyaka.']

sourceString: However, its effects largely rely on a combination of multiple components in a formula that varies depending on the diagnosis of a disease based on the theories of TCM.
targetString: Nokho, imithelela yayo incike kakhulu ekuhlanganisweni kwezingxenye eziningi kufomula ehlukahlukayo kuye ngokuxilongwa kwesifo ngokusekelwe embonweni ye-TCM.
translated: ['Kodwa-ke, imiphumela yayo incike kakhulu ekuhlanganiseni izingxenye eziningi kwifomula ehlukahluka ngokuya ngokuxilongwa kwesifo ngokusekelwe emicabangweni ye-TCM.']

sourceString: Most of the effective components remain unknown or are vague as it is difficult to extract and verify such components or their optimal combinations.
targetString: Iningi lezingxenye ezisebenzayo zihlala zingaziwa noma azicacile njengoba kunzima ukumonyula nokuqinisekisa izingxenye ezinjalo noma izinhlanganisela zayo ezisebenza kangcono.
translated: ['Iningi lezingxenye ezisebenzayo zihlala zingaziwa noma azicacile njengoba kunzima ukukhipha nokuqinisekisa izingxenye ezinjalo noma inhlanganisela yazo efanele.']

sourceString: Currently, due to the lack of effective and specific therapy for COVID-19, TCM has become one of the major alternative treatments for patients with light to moderate symptoms or for those who have recovered from severe stages.
targetString: Okwamanje, ngenxa yokuntuleka yokwelashwa okusebenzayo nokuqondile kwe-COVID-19, i-TCM isiphenduke okunye kokwelashwa okukhulu kweziguli ezinezimpawu ezincane kuye kwezimaphakathi kulabo abalulame ezigabeni ezibucayi.
translated: ['Njengamanje, ngenxa yokuntuleka kokwelashwa okusebenzayo nokuqondile kwe-COVID-19, i-TCM isibe enye yezindlela ezinkulu zokwelapha iziguli ezinezimpawu ezikhanyayo kuya kokulinganisela noma kulabo abaye baphila ezigabeni ezinzima.']

sourceString: For example, Shu Feng Jie Du capsules and Lian Hua Qing Wen capsules were found to be effective for COVID-19 treatment.
targetString: Ngokwesibonelo, amaphilisi e-Shu Feng Jie Du kanye namaphilisi e-Lian Hua Qing Wen kwatholwa ukuthi ayasebenza ekwelashweni kwe-COVID-19.
translated: ['Isibonelo, amaphilisi e-Shu Feng Jie Du kanye nama-capsules e-Lian Hua Qing Wen atholakala ephumelelayo ekwelashweni kwe-COVID-19.']

sourceString: Top cure rates in the treatment of COVID-19 patients were observed in several provinces in China that used TCM in 87% of their patients, including Gansu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%), and Hunan (50%), whereas Hubei province, which used TCM in only approximately 30% of its COVID-19 patients, had the lowest cure rate (13%).
targetString: Izilinganiso eziphakeme zokwelashwa ekwelashweni kweziguli ezine-COVID-19 zaphawulwa ezifundazweni eziningi zase-China ezisebenzise i-TCM ku-87% weziguli zabo, okuhlanganisa i-Gansu (63.7%), i-Ningxia (50%), ne-Hunan (50%), kuyilapho isifundazwe sase-Hubei, esasebenzisa i-TCM cishe ku-30% weziguli zaso ezine-COVID-19, saba nesilinganiso esiphansi kakhulu sokululama (13%).
translated: ['Izinga eliphezulu lokwelapha ekwelapheni iziguli ze-COVID-19 labonwa ezifundazweni eziningana eChina ezisebenzise i-TCM ku-87% yeziguli zazo, kufaka phakathi iGansu (63.7%), iNingxia (50%), neHunan (50%), kanti isifundazwe saseHubei, esisebenzisa i-TCM cishe ku-30% kuphela weziguli zayo ze-COVID-19, sasinezinga eliphansi kakhulu lokwelapha (13%).']

sourceString: However, this is quite a rough comparison as many other impact factors such as the number and severity of the patients should be included in the evaluation.
targetString: Nokho, lokhu kuwukuqhathanisa okunganembile njengoba ezinye izici zomthelela ezifana nenani nobucayi beziguli kufanele zifakwe ekuhlaziyweni.
translated: ['Kodwa-ke, lokhu kuqhathaniswa okunzima kakhulu njengoba ezinye izinto eziningi zomthelela ezifana nenani nobunzima beziguli kufanele zifakwe ekuhlolweni.']

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, Boli Zhang and coworkers published a study to compare western medicine (WM) treatment alone with combined treatment of WM and TCM.
targetString: Ngo-February 18, 2020, u-Boli Zhang nozakwabo bashicilela ucwaningo lokuqhathanisa ukwelashwa ngemithi yasentshonalanga (WM) yodwa kanye nokwelashwa okuyinhlanganisela kwe-WM ne-TCM.
translated: ['Ngo-February 18, 2020, uBoli Zhang kanye nabasebenza nabo bashicilele ucwaningo lokuqhathanisa ukwelashwa kwemithi yasentshonalanga (WM) kuphela nokwelashwa okuhlangene kwe-WM ne-TCM.']

sourceString: They found that the times needed for body temperature recovery, symptom disappearance, and hospitalization were remarkably shorter in the WM+TCM group than in the WM only group.
targetString: Bathola ukuthi izikhathi ezidingekayo ukuze izinga lokushisa komzimba lilulame, kuphele izimpawu, kanye nokulaliswa esibhedlela kwakukufushane eqenjini le-WM+TCM kuneqembu le-WM kuphela.
translated: ['Bathola ukuthi izikhathi ezidingekayo zokubuyiswa kokushisa komzimba, ukunyamalala kwezimpawu, nokulaliswa esibhedlela kwakufushane ngokuphawulekayo eqenjini le-WM + TCM kuneqembu le-WM kuphela.']

sourceString: Most impressively, the rate for symptomatic worsening (from light to severe) was remarkably lower for the WM+TCM group than for the WM only group (7.4% versus 46.2%) and the mortality was lower in the WM+TCM group than WM only group (8.8% versus 39%).
targetString: Okuhlaba umxhwele kakhulu, ukuthi izinga lokuba libi kwezimpawu (ukusuka kwezincane kuye kwezibucayi) laliphansi ngokuphawulekayo eqenjini le-WM+TCM kuneqembu le-WM kuphela (u-7.4% oqhathaniswa no-46.2%) futhi ukufa kwakuphansi kakhudlwana eqenjini le-WM+TCM kuneqembu le-WM kuphela (u-8.8% oqhathaniswa no-39%).
translated: ['Okuhlaba umxhwele kakhulu, izinga lokuwohloka kwezimpawu (kusukela ekukhanyeni kuya kokukhulu) laliphansi ngokuphawulekayo eqenjini le-WM + TCM kuneqembu le-WM kuphela (7.4% ngokuhambisana ne-46.2%) futhi ukufa kwakuphansi eqenjini le-WM + TCM kuneqembu le-WM kuphela (8.8% ngokuhambisana ne-39%).']

sourceString: Nevertheless, the efficacy and safety of TCM still await more well-controlled trials at larger scales and in more centers.
targetString: Noma kunjalo, ukusebenza nokuphepha kwe-TCM kusalinde izingcwaningo ezilawulwe kahle emazingeni amakhulu nasezikhungweni eziningi.
translated: ['Noma kunjalo, ukusebenza nokuphepha kwe-TCM kusalindele izivivinyo eziningi ezilawulwa kahle ngezilinganiso ezinkulu nasezikhungweni eziningi.']

sourceString: It would also be intriguing to characterize the mechanism of actions and clarify the effective components of TCM treatments or their combinations if possible.
targetString: Kungaphinde futhi kuhlabe umxhwele ukuthi kuphawulwe indlela yezenzo futhi kucaciswe ukuthi izingxenye ezisebenzayo zokwelashwa kwe-TCM noma izinhlanganisela zayo uma kunokwenzeka.
translated: ['Kungaba futhi okuthakazelisayo ukubonakalisa indlela yezenzo nokucacisa izingxenye ezisebenzayo zokwelashwa kwe-TCM noma inhlanganisela yazo uma kungenzeka.']

sourceString: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 mostly experience great fear of the highly contagious and even fatal disease, and quarantined people also experience boredom, loneliness, and anger.
targetString: Iziguli okunezinsolo noma eziqinisekisiwe ukuthi ziphethwe i-COVID-19 ngokuvamile ziyasisaba kakhulu isifo esithelelena kakhulu futhi esibulalayo, futhi abantu abazivalele baphinde babhoreke, babe nesizungu, kanye nolaka.
translated: ['Iziguli ezine-COVID-19 ecatshangelwayo noma eqinisekisiwe ikakhulukazi zithola ukwesaba okukhulu ngesifo esithathelwanayo kakhulu ngisho nesibulalayo, futhi abantu abavalelwe nabo bathola isithukuthezi, uvalo, nentukuthelo.']

sourceString: Furthermore, symptoms of the infection such as fever, hypoxia, and cough as well as adverse effects of the treatments such as insomnia caused by corticosteroids can lead to more anxiety and mental distress.
targetString: Ngaphezu kwalokho, izimpawu zokutheleleka ezifana nemfiva, i-hypoxia, nokukhwehlela kanye nemiphumela ebucayi yokwelashwa efana nokuqwasha ebangelwa ama-corticosteroid ingaholela ekubeni nexhala okwengeziwe nokucindezeleka ngokomqondo.
translated: ['Ngaphezu kwalokho, izimpawu zokutheleleka ezifana nomkhuhlane, i-hypoxia, nokukhwehlela kanye nemiphumela emibi yokwelashwa okufana nokulala okubangelwa ama-corticosteroids kungaholela ekukhathazekeni okuningi nokucindezeleka kwengqondo.']

sourceString: In the early phase of the SARS outbreak, a range of psychiatric morbidities including persistent depression, anxiety, panic attacks, psychomotor excitement, psychotic symptoms, delirium, and even suicidality were reported.
targetString: Esigabeni sokuqala sokubheduka kwe-SARS, izifo eziningi ezihlobene nengqondo okuhlanganisa ukucindezeleka okuphikelelayo, ixhala, ukushaywa uvalo, ukuphazamiseka kwekhono lengqondo lokunyakazisa umzimba, izimpawu zokusangana, ukuhanjelwa ingqondo, ngisho nokufuna ukuzibulala kwabikwa.
translated: ['Esigabeni sokuqala sokuqubuka kwe-SARS, kwabikwa uhla lwezimo zengqondo ezihlanganisa ukucindezeleka okuqhubekayo, ukukhathazeka, ukuphaphatheka, injabulo yengqondo, izimpawu zengqondo, i-delirium, ngisho nokuzibulala.']

sourceString: Mandatory contact tracing and quarantine, as a part of the public health responses to the COVID-19 outbreak, can make people more anxious and guilty about the effects of the contagion, quarantine, and stigma on their families and friends.
targetString: Ukulandelelwa kokuxhumana okuyimpoqo nokuzivalela, njengengxenye yokusabela kwezempilo yomphakathi ekubhedukeni kwe-COVID-19, kungase kwenze abantu abaningi babe nexhala futhi bazizwe benecala mayelana nemiphumela yokuthelelana, ukuzivalela, kanye nesigcwagcwa emndenini nakubangane babo.
translated: ['Ukulandelela abathintekayo okuphoqelekile kanye nokugcinwa kwabantu, njengengxenye yezimpendulo zempilo yomphakathi ekuqubukeni kwe-COVID-19, kungenza abantu bakhathazeke kakhulu futhi babe necala ngemiphumela yokutheleleka, ukuvalelisa, kanye nehlazo emindenini yabo nabangane.']

sourceString: Thus, mental health care should be provided to COVID-19 patients, suspected individuals, and people in contact with them as well as the general public who are in need.
targetString: Ngenxa yalokho, ukunakekelwa kwempilo yengqondo kufanele kunikezwe iziguli ze-COVID-19, abantu okusolwa ukuthi banayo, nabantu abaxhumana nabo kanye nomphakathi ovamile oludingayo.
translated: ['Ngakho, ukunakekelwa kwezempilo yengqondo kufanele kunikezwe iziguli ze-COVID-19, abantu abacatshangelwayo, nabantu abaxhumana nabo kanye nomphakathi jikelele abaswele.']

sourceString: The psychological support should include the establishment of multidisciplinary mental health teams, clear communications with regular and accurate updates about the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak and treatment plans and the use of professional electronic devices and applications to avoid close contact with each other.
targetString: Usizo lwezengqondo kufanele luhlanganise ukusungulwa kwamathimba ezempilo yengqondo yemikhakha eminingi, ukuxhumana okucacile okunezibuyekezo zezikhathi zonke nezinembile ezimayelana nokubheduka kwe-SARS-CoV-2 kanye nezinhlelo zokwelashwa kanye nokusetshenziswa kwamadivayisi ezokwelashwa kagesi kanye nezinhlelo zokugwema ukusondelana ngokuseduze nabanye.
translated: ['Ukwesekwa kwengqondo kufanele kubandakanye ukusungulwa kwamathimba ezempilo yengqondo amaningi, ukuxhumana okucacile ngezibuyekezo ezijwayelekile nezinembile mayelana nokuqubuka kwe-SARS-CoV-2 kanye nezinhlelo zokwelashwa kanye nokusetshenziswa kwamadivaysi kagesi ochwepheshe kanye nezicelo zokugwema ukusondelana nomunye.']

sourceString: Effective vaccines are essential for interrupting the chain of transmission from animal reservoirs and infected humans to susceptible hosts and are often complementary to antiviral treatment in the control of epidemics caused by emerging viruses.
targetString: Imigomo esebenzayo ibalulekile ukuze kugqashulwe iketanga lokuthelelana ukusuka ezilwaneni nabantu abathelelekile kuye kubabungazi abangase bachayeke futhi ngokuvamile iyahambelana nokwelashwa okulwa namagciwane ekulawulweni kwemiqedazwe ebangelwa amagciwane amasha.
translated: ['Imithi yokugoma ephumelelayo ibalulekile ekuphazamiseni uchungechunge lokudluliselwa kusuka ezindaweni zokugcina izilwane kanye nabantu abanegciwane kuya ezindaweni ezithintekayo futhi ngokuvamile ihambisana nokwelashwa kwe-antiviral ekulawuleni izifo ezibangelwa amagciwane avelayo.']

sourceString: Efforts have been made to develop S protein-based vaccines to generate long-term and potent neutralizing antibodies and/or protective immunity against SARS-CoV.
targetString: Kwenziwe imizamo yokwenza imigomo esekelwe kuphrotheni ka-S ukuze kwenziwe izivikeli-mzimba zesikhathi eside nezinamandla okubulala kanye/noma ukuvikeleka kokungayitholi i-SARS-CoV.
translated: ['Kwenziwe imizamo yokuthuthukisa imithi yokugoma esekelwe kumaprotheni e-S ukukhiqiza ama-antibodies esikhathi eside futhi anamandla angathathi hlangothi kanye / noma ukuvikeleka okuvikelayo ku-SARS-CoV.']

sourceString: Live-attenuated vaccines have been evaluated in animal models for SARS.
targetString: Imigomo ebukhoma encishiwe amandla iye yahlolwa ezilwaneni ngokuqondene ne-SARS.
translated: ['Imithi yokugoma e-live-attenuated ihlolwe kumamodeli ezilwane ze-SARS.']

sourceString: However, the in vivo efficacy of these vaccine candidates in elderly individuals and lethal-challenge models and their protection against zoonotic virus infection have yet to be determined before a clinical study is initiated.
targetString: Nokho, ukusebenza ezintweni eziphilayo kwalawa makhandidethi omgomo kubantu abadala kanye namamodeli enselele ebulalayo kanye nokuvikeleka kwawo ekungenweni igciwane elisuka ezilwaneni liye kubantu kusazotholwa ngaphambi kokuthi kuqaliswe ucwaningo lwezokwelashwa.
translated: ['Kodwa-ke, ukusebenza kwe-in vivo kwalaba abafuna ukugoma kubantu asebekhulile kanye namamodeli abulalayo-inselele kanye nokuvikelwa kwabo ekungenweni kwegciwane le-zoonotic kusamele kunqunywe ngaphambi kokuqala kocwaningo lomtholampilo.']

sourceString: This is probably because SARS died down 17 years ago and no new case has been reported since.
targetString: Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi i-SARS yathula eminyakeni engu-17 edlule futhi akukho ukugula kwayo okusha okuye kwabikwa kusukela ngaleso sikhathi.
translated: ['Lokhu mhlawumbe kungenxa yokuthi uSARS washona phansi eminyakeni engu-17 eyedlule futhi asikho isigameko esisha esibikiwe kusukela ngaleso sikhathi.']

sourceString: In contrast, sporadic cases and clusters of MERS continue to occur in the Middle East and spread to other regions owing to the persistence of zoonotic sources in endemic areas.
targetString: Ngakolunye uhlangothi, izimo eziyimvela kancane kanye namaqoqo e-MERS ayaqhubeka evela e-Middle East futhi asakazeka nakwezinye izifunda ngenxa yokuphikelela kwemithombo yamagciwane asuka ezilwaneni aye kubantu ezindaweni ezinesifo.
translated: ['Ngokuphambene nalokho, amacala angavamile kanye namaqoqo e-MERS ayaqhubeka nokwenzeka eMiddle East futhi asakazeke kwezinye izifunda ngenxa yokuphikelela kwemithombo ye-zoonotic ezindaweni ezisabalele.']

sourceString: Vaccination strategies have been developed for MERS by using inactivated virus, DNA plasmids, viral vectors, nanoparticles, virus-like particles and recombinant protein subunits and some have been evaluated in animal models.
targetString: Amasu okugoma aye enzelwa i-MERS ngokuthi kusetshenziswe igciwane elingasebenzi, ama-plasmid e-DNA, ama-vector egciwane, ama-nanoparticle, izinhlayiya ezifana negciwane kanye namayunithi angaphansi ephrotheni eyinhlanganisela futhi amanye aye ahlolwa kumamodeli ezilwane.
translated: ['Amasu okugoma athuthukiswe ku-MERS ngokusebenzisa igciwane elingasebenzi, ama-DNA plasmids, ama-vectors amagciwane, ama-nanoparticles, izinhlayiya ezifana negciwane kanye nama-subunits amaprotheni aphindaphindayo futhi amanye ahlolwe kumamodeli wezilwane.']

sourceString: The development of a safe and effective vaccine against SARS-CoV-2 for non-immune individuals is an urgent and critical task for controlling the ongoing epidemic.
targetString: Ukwakhiwa komgomo ophephile nosebenzayo omelene ne-SARS-CoV-2 kubantu abathelelekayo kuwumsebenzi ophuthumayo nobalulekile ekulawuleni umqedazwe oqhubekayo.
translated: ['Ukuthuthukiswa komuthi wokugoma ophephile futhi osebenzayo ngokumelene ne-SARS-CoV-2 kubantu abangavikelekile kungumsebenzi ophuthumayo futhi obalulekile wokulawula ubhubhane oluqhubekayo.']

sourceString: However, it is challenging to overcome the difficulty because of the long period of time (averaged 18 months) needed for vaccine development and the dynamic variations of CoVs.
targetString: Nokho, kuyinselele ukumelana nobunzima ngenxa yenkathi ende (isilinganiso sezinyanga ezingu-18) edingekayo ukuze kwakhiwe umgomo kanye nezinhlobo ezishintshayo zama-CoV.
translated: ['Kodwa-ke, kuyinselele ukunqoba ubunzima ngenxa yesikhathi eside (esilinganiselwa ezinyangeni ezingu-18) ezidingekayo ekuthuthukiseni umuthi wokugoma kanye nokuhlukahluka okunamandla kwama-CoVs.']

sourceString: As a novel disease, COVID-19 has just started to manifest its full clinical course throughout thousands of patients.
targetString: Njengesifo esisha, i-COVID-19 isanda kuqala ukubonisa uhlelo lwayo lwezokwelashwa olugcwele ezigulini eziyizinkulungwane.
translated: ['Njengesifo senoveli, i-COVID-19 isanda kuqala ukubonakalisa inkambo yayo egcwele yomtholampilo kuzo zonke izinkulungwane zeziguli.']

sourceString: In most cases, patients can recover gradually without sequelae.
targetString: Ezimweni eziningi, iziguli zingakwazi ukululama kancane ngaphandle kwemiphumela yesifo sangaphambilini.
translated: ['Ezimweni eziningi, iziguli zingabuyisa kancane kancane ngaphandle kwe-sequelae.']

sourceString: However, similar to SARS and MERS, COVID-19 is also associated with high morbidity and mortality in patients with severe cases.
targetString: Nokho, ngokufana ne-SARS ne-MERS, i-COVID-19 iphinde ihlotshaniswe nezinga eliphakeme lokugula nokufa ezigulini ezinokugula okubucayi.
translated: ['Kodwa-ke, ngokufana ne-SARS ne-MERS, i-COVID-19 nayo ihlotshaniswa nokugula okuphezulu nokufa ezigulini ezinamacala anzima.']

sourceString: Therefore, building a prognosis model for the disease is essential for health-care agencies to prioritize their services, especially in resource-constrained areas.
targetString: Ngakho-ke, ukwakha imodeli yembangela yesifo kubalulekile kuma-ejensi okunakekelwa kwezempilo ukuze kubekwe ekuqaleni amasevisi awo, ikakhulukazi ezindaweni ezinezinsiza ezincane.
translated: ['Ngakho-ke, ukwakha imodeli ye-prognosis yalesi sifo kubalulekile ezinhlanganweni zokunakekelwa kwezempilo ukubeka phambili izinsizakalo zazo, ikakhulukazi ezindaweni ezicindezelwe ngemithombo.']

sourceString: Based on clinical studies reported thus far, the following factors may affect or be associated with the prognosis of COVID-19 patients (Table ​(Table33):
targetString: Ngokusekelwe kuzingcwaningo zokwelashwa ezibikwe kuze kube manje, izici ezilandelayo zingase zithinte noma zihlotshaniswe nembangela yeziguli ze-COVID-19 (Ithebula ​(Ithebula33):
translated: ['Ngokusekelwe ezifundweni zemitholampilo ezibikwe kuze kube manje, lezi zinto ezilandelayo zingathinta noma zihlotshaniswa ne-prognosis yeziguli ze-COVID-19 (Ithebula (Ithebula33):']

sourceString: Age: Age was the most important factor for the prognosis of SARS, which is also true for COVID-19.
targetString: Ubudala: Ubudala babuyisici esibaluleke kakhulu sembangela ye-SARS, okuyiqiniso futhi nge-COVID-19.
translated: ['Ubudala: Ubudala kwakuyisici esibaluleke kakhulu se-prognosis ye-SARS, okuyiqiniso nange-COVID-19.']

sourceString: COVID-19 mainly happened at the age of 30-65 with 47.7% of those patients being over 50 in a study of 8,866 cases as described above.
targetString: I-COVID-19 yavela ngokuyinhloko kubudala obungu-30-65 futhi u-47.7% walezo ziguli zazingaphezu kuka-50 kucwaningo lweziguli ezingu-8,866 njengoba kuchazwe ngenhla.
translated: ['I-COVID-19 yenzeka ikakhulukazi eneminyaka engu-30-65 nge-47.7% yalezo ziguli ezingaphezu kuka-50 ocwaningweni lwamacala angu-8 866 njengoba kuchaziwe ngenhla.']

sourceString: Patients who required intensive care were more likely to have underlying comorbidities and complications and were significantly older than those who did not (at the median age of 66 versus 51), suggesting age as a prognostic factor for the outcome of COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Iziguli ezazidinga ukunakekelwa kwezimo ezibucayi zazinethuba eliphakeme lokuphathwa ezinye izifo nezinkimbinkimbi futhi zazindala ngokuphawulekayo kunalezo ezingenazo (ubudala ongu-66 buqhathaniswa no-51), okusikisela ukuthi ubudala buyisici esiyimbangela kumphumela kuziguli eziphethwe i-COVID-19.
translated: ['Iziguli ezazidinga ukunakekelwa kakhulu zazivame ukuba ne-comorbidities engaphansi kanye nezinkinga futhi zazikhulile kakhulu kunalabo abangazange (eminyakeni ephakathi kwe-66 ngokuhambisana ne-51), okusikisela iminyaka njengesici se-prognostic somphumela weziguli ze-COVID-19.']

sourceString: Sex: SARS-CoV-2 has infected more men than women (0.31/100,000 versus 0.27/100,000), as described above.
targetString: Ubulili: I-SARS-CoV-2 igulise abantu besilisa abaningi kunabantu besifazane (u-0.31/100,000 oqhathaniswa no-0.27/100,000), njengoba kuchazwe ngenhla.
translated: ['Ubulili: I-SARS-CoV-2 isihlasele amadoda amaningi kunabesifazane (0.31/100,000 kuqhathaniswa no-0.27/100 000), njengoba kuchaziwe ngenhla.']

sourceString: Comorbidities and complications: Patients with COVID-19 who require intensive care are more likely to suffer from acute cardiac injury and arrhythmia.
targetString: Izifo ezikhona kakade nezinkimbinkimbi: Iziguli eziphethwe i-COVID-19 ezidinga ukunakekelwa okubucayi zinethuba eliphakeme lokuphathwa ukulimala kwenhliziyo okubucayi kanye ne-arrhythmia.
translated: ['I-Comorbidities nezinkinga: Iziguli ezine-COVID-19 ezidinga ukunakekelwa kakhulu zivame ukuhlushwa ukulimala okukhulu kwenhliziyo kanye ne-arrhythmia.']

sourceString: Cardiac events were also the main reason for death in SARS patients.
targetString: Izehlakalo ezihlobene nenhliziyo zaphinde zaba isizathu esiyinhloko sokufa kweziguli ezine-SARS.
translated: ['Izenzakalo zenhliziyo nazo zaziyisizathu esiyinhloko sokufa ezigulini yakwa-SARS.']

sourceString: It has been reported that SARS-CoV-2 can also bind to ACE2-positive cholangiocytes, which might lead to liver dysfunctions in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Kuphindwe kwabikwa ukuthi i-SARS-CoV-2 iyakwazi futhi ukunamathela kuma-ACE2-positive cholangiocyte, okungase kuholele ekungasebenzini kahle kwesibindi kuziguli eziphethwe i-COVID-19.
translated: ['Kubikwa ukuthi i-SARS-CoV-2 nayo ingabopha kuma-cholangiocytes ane-ACE2, okungase kuholele ekungasebenzi kahle kwesibindi ezigulini ze-COVID-19.']

sourceString: It is worth noting that age and underlying disease are strongly correlated and might interfere with each other.
targetString: Kuhle ukuphawula ukuthi ubudala kanye nesifo esikhona kakade kuhlobene nokuqinile futhi kungase kuphazamisane.
translated: ['Kuyafaneleka ukuphawula ukuthi iminyaka kanye nesifo esiyisisekelo kuhlobene kakhulu futhi kungaphazamisa omunye nomunye.']

sourceString: Abnormal laboratory findings: The C-reactive protein (CRP) level in blood reflects the severity of inflammation or tissue injury and has been proposed to be a potential prognostic factor for disease, response to therapy, and ultimate recovery.
targetString: Imiphumela yaselabhorethri engavamile: Izinga lephrotheni ye-C-reactive (CRP) egazini ibonisa ubucayi bokuvuvukala noma ukulimala kwesicubu futhi kuye kwaphakanyiswa ukuthi kuyisici esingase sibe imbangela yesifo, ukusabela ekwelashweni, kanye nokululama okuphelele.
translated: ['Okutholakele okungajwayelekile kwelabhoratri: Izinga le-C-reactive protein (CRP) egazini libonisa ubunzima bokuvuvukala noma ukulimala kwezicubu futhi lihlongozwa ukuba libe yinto engaba yi-prognostic yezifo, ukuphendula ekwelashweni, nokubuyiswa kokugcina.']

sourceString: The correlation of CRP level to the severity and prognosis of COVID-19 has also been proposed.
targetString: Kuphinde kwenziwa ukuhlobana kwezinga le-CRP nobucayi nembangela ye-COVID-19.
translated: ['Ukuhambisana kwezinga le-CRP nobunzima kanye ne-prognosis ye-COVID-19 nakho kuhlongozwa.']

sourceString: In addition, elevated lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), and creatine kinase (CK) may also help predict the outcome.
targetString: Ngaphezu kwalokho, i-lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) ephakeme, i-aspartate aminotransferase (AST), i-alanine aminotransferase (ALT), kanye ne-creatine kinase (CK) ingase futhi isize ukubikezela umphumela.
translated: ['Ngaphezu kwalokho, i-lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) ephakeme, i-aspartate aminotransferase (AST), i-alanine aminotransferase (ALT), ne-creatine kinase (CK) nayo ingakusiza ukubikezela umphumela.']

sourceString: These enzymes are expressed extensively in multiple organs, especially in the heart and liver, and are released during tissue damage.
targetString: Lawa ma-enzyme aboniswa kabanzi ezithweni eziningi, ikakhulukazi enhliziyweni nakusibindi, futhi kukhululwa phakathi nokulimala kwesicubu.
translated: ['La ma-enzyme abonakaliswa kakhulu ezithweni eziningi, ikakhulukazi enhliziyweni nasesibindini, futhi akhishwa ngesikhathi sokulimala kwezicubu.']

sourceString: Thus, they are traditional markers for heart or liver dysfunctions.
targetString: Ngenxa yalokho, ziyizinkomba ezivamile zokungasebenzi kahle kwenhliziyo noma isibindi.
translated: ['Ngakho, ziyizimpawu zendabuko zokungasebenzi kahle kwenhliziyo noma isibindi.']

sourceString: Major clinical symptoms: Chest radiography and temporal progression of clinical symptoms should be considered together with the other issues for the prediction of outcomes and complications of COVID-19.
targetString: Izimpawu zokwelashwa ezinkulu: I-radiography yesifuba nokuqhubeka kwesikhashana kwezimpawu zokwelashwa kufanele zicatshangelwe ndawonye nezinye izinkinga zokubikezelwa kwemiphumela nezinkimbinkimbi ze-COVID-19.
translated: ['Izimpawu ezinkulu zomtholampilo: I-radiography yesifuba kanye nokuqhubeka yesikhashana kwezimpawu zomtholampilo kufanele kubhekwe kanye nezinye izindaba zokubikezela imiphumela nezinkinga ze-COVID-19.']

sourceString: Use of steroids: As described above, steroids are immunosuppressant commonly used as an adjunctive therapy for infectious diseases to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.
targetString: Ukusetshenziswa kwama-steroid: Njengoba kuchazwe ngenhla, ama-steroid angama-immunosuppressant ngokuvamile asetshenziswa njengokwelashwa kokwenezela kwezifo ezithelelanayo ukuze kuncishiswe ubucayi komonakalo wokuvuvukala.
translated: ['Ukusetshenziswa kwe-steroids: Njengoba kuchaziwe ngenhla, ama-steroid ayi-immunosuppressant evame ukusetshenziswa njengendlela yokwelapha i-adjunctive yezifo ezithathelwanayo ukunciphisa ubunzima bomonakalo wokuvuvukala.']

sourceString: Since a high dosage of corticosteroids was widely used in severe SARS patients, many survivors suffered from avascular osteonecrosis with life-long disability and poor life quality.
targetString: Njengoba kusetshenziswe kabanzi inani eliphakeme lama-corticosteroid kuziguli ezine-SARS ebucayi, iningi labantu abasinda babephethwe i-avascular osteonecrosis benokukhubazeka kokuphila kwabo konke nezinga lokuphila elingelihle.
translated: ['Njengoba umthamo omkhulu we-corticosteroids wawusetshenziswa kabanzi ezigulini ezinzima ze-SARS, abaningi abasindile bahlushwa i-osteonecrosis yenhliziyo ngokukhubazeka impilo yonke kanye nekhwalithi yokuphila engeyinhle.']

sourceString: Thus, if needed, steroids should be used at low dosage and for a short time in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Ngenxa yalokho, uma edingekile, ama-steroid kufanele asetshenziswe ngesilinganiso esiphansi futhi isikhathi esifushane kuziguli ze-COVID-19.
translated: ['Ngakho, uma kudingeka, ama-steroid kufanele asetshenziswe ngomthamo ophansi futhi isikhathi esifushane ezigulini ze-COVID-19.']

sourceString: Mental stress: As described above, during the COVID-19 outbreak many patients have suffered from extraordinary stress as they often endured long periods of quarantine and extreme uncertainty and witnessed the death of close family members and fellow patients.
targetString: Ukucindezeleka komqondo: Njengoba kuchazwe ngenhla, phakathi nokubheduka kwe-COVID-19 iziguli eziningi zaphathwa ukucindezeleka okukhulu njengoba kwakufanele zibekezelele izinkathi ezide zokuzivalela nokungaqiniseki okukhulu futhi zibona ukufa kwamalungu omndeni aseduze kanye neziguli ezikanye nazo.
translated: ['Ukucindezeleka kwengqondo: Njengoba kuchaziwe ngenhla, ngesikhathi sokuqubuka kwe-COVID-19 iziguli eziningi ziye zahlushwa ukucindezeleka okungavamile njengoba zivame ukubekezelela isikhathi eside sokuhlala kanye nokungaqiniseki okukhulu futhi zabona ukufa kwamalungu omndeni aseduze nezinye iziguli.']

sourceString: It is imperative to provide psychological counseling and long-term support to help these patients recover from the stress and return to normal life.
targetString: Kusemqoka ukuthi kunikezwe ukwelulekwa komqondo nokusekelwa kwesikhathi eside ukuze kusizwe lezi ziguli zilulame ekucindezelekeni futhi zibuyele empilweni evamile.
translated: ['Kusemqoka ukunikeza ukwelulekwa ngokwengqondo kanye nokwesekwa isikhathi eside ukusiza lezi ziguli ukuba zibuyele ekucindezelekeni futhi zibuyele ekuphileni okujwayelekile.']

sourceString: According to demographic studies so far, COVID-19 seems to have different epidemiological features from SARS.
targetString: Ngokuvumelana nezingcwaningo zolwazi lwabantu kuze kube manje, i-COVID-19 ibonakala inezici ze-epidemiological ezihlukile ku-SARS.
translated: ['Ngokocwaningo lwabantu kuze kube manje, i-COVID-19 ibonakala inezici ezahlukene ze-epidemiological ezivela ku-SARS.']

sourceString: In addition to replicating in the lower respiratory tract, SARS-CoV-2 can efficiently replicate in the upper respiratory tract and causes mild or no symptoms in the early phase of infection, similar to other CoVs that cause common colds.
targetString: Ngaphezu kokuphindeka kumgudu wokuphefumula ongezansi, i-SARS-CoV-2 iyakwazi ukuphindeka kalula kumgudu wokuphefumula ongenhla futhi ibangele izimpawu ezincane noma ingazibangeli esigabeni sokuqala sokutheleleka, ngendlela efanayo nama-CoV abangela imikhuhlane evamile.
translated: ['Ngaphezu kokuphindaphinda emgodini wokuphefumula ophansi, i-SARS-CoV-2 ingakwazi ukuphindaphinda kahle emgodini wokuphefumula ongenhla futhi ibangela izimpawu ezincane noma ezingekho esigabeni sokuqala sokutheleleka, ezifana namanye ama-CoVs abangela imikhuhlane evamile.']

sourceString: Therefore, infected patients at the early phase or incubation period can produce a large amount of virus during daily activities, causing great difficulty for the control of the epidemic.
targetString: Ngakho-ke, iziguli ezithelelekile esigabeni sokuqala noma enkathini yokufukanyelwa zingakhiqiza inani elikhulu legciwane phakathi nemisebenzi yansuku zonke, okubangela ubunzima obukhulu bokulawulwa komqedazwe.
translated: ['Ngakho-ke, iziguli ezinegciwane esigabeni sokuqala noma isikhathi sokukhulelwa zingakhiqiza inani elikhulu legciwane ngesikhathi semisebenzi yansuku zonke, okubangela ubunzima obukhulu ekulawuleni ubhubhane.']

sourceString: However, the transmission of SARS-CoV was considered to occur when the patients are severely ill, while most transmission did not happen at the early phase.
targetString: Nokho, ukutheleleka kwe-SARS-CoV kwakucatshangwa ukuthi kwenzeka lapho iziguli zazigula kakhulu, kuyilapho ukutheleleka okuningi kungazange kwenzeke esigabeni sokuqala.
translated: ['Kodwa-ke, ukudluliselwa kwe-SARS-CoV kwakubhekwa njengokwenzeka lapho iziguli zigula kakhulu, kanti ukudluliselwa okuningi akwenzekanga esigabeni sokuqala.']

sourceString: Thus, the current outbreak of COVID-19 is much more severe and difficult to control than the outbreak of SARS.
targetString: Ngenxa yalokho, ukubheduka kwe-COVID-19 kubucayi kakhulu futhi kunzima ukukulawula kunokubheduka kwe-SARS.
translated: ['Ngakho, ukuqubuka kwamanje kwe-COVID-19 kunzima kakhulu futhi kunzima ukulawula kunokuqubuka kwe-SARS.']

sourceString: Great efforts are currently underway in China including the lockdown of Wuhan and surrounding cities and continuous quarantine of almost the entire population in hopes of interrupting the transmission of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Kunemizamo eminingi eqhubekayo njengamanje e-China okuhlanganisa ukuvalwa thaqa kwe-Wuhan namadolobha azungezile nokuzivalela okuqhubekayo kwaso sonke isibalo sabantu ngethemba lokuphazamisa ukudluliswa kwe-SARS-CoV-2.
translated: ['Imizamo emikhulu njengamanje iyaqhubeka eChina kufaka phakathi ukuvalwa kweWuhan namadolobha azungezile kanye nokugcinwa okuqhubekayo cishe kwabantu bonke ngethemba lokuphazamisa ukudluliselwa kwe-SARS-CoV-2.']

sourceString: Although these actions have been dramatically damaging the economy and other sectors of the country, the number of new patients is declining, indicating the slowdown of the epidemic.
targetString: Nakuba lezi zinyathelo ziwulimaze kakhulu umnotho neminye imikhakha yezwe, inani leziguli ezintsha liyancipha, okubonisa ukuncipha kwejubane lomqedazwe.
translated: ['Nakuba lezi zenzo bezilimaza kakhulu umnotho neminye imikhakha yezwe, isibalo seziguli ezintsha siyehla, okukhombisa ukwehla kobhubhane.']

sourceString: The most optimistic estimate is that the outbreak will end by March and the downswing phase will last for 3-4 months.
targetString: Isilinganiso esithembisa kakhulu esokuthi ukubheduka kuzophela ngo-March futhi isigaba sokuncipha sizoqhubeka izinyanga ezingu-3-4.
translated: ['Isilinganiso esinethemba kakhulu ukuthi ukuqubuka kwalesi sifo kuzophela ngoMashi kanti isigaba sokwehla sizohlala izinyanga ezingu-3-4.']

sourceString: However, some other experts are not that optimistic.
targetString: Nokho, ezinye izazi azinalo lelo themba.
translated: ['Kodwa-ke, abanye abanye ochwepheshe abanethemba kangako.']

sourceString: Paul Hunter, et al., estimated that COVID-19, which seems substantially more infectious than SARS, will not end in 2020.
targetString: U-Paul Hunter, et al., ulinganisa ukuthi i-COVID-19, ebonakala ithelelana kakhulu kune-SARS, ngeke iphele ngo-2020.
translated: ['UPaul Hunter, et al., ulinganise ukuthi i-COVID-19, ebonakala itheleleka kakhulu kune-SARS, ngeke iphele ngo-2020.']

sourceString: Ira Longini, et al., established a model to predict the outcome of the epidemic and suggested that SARS-CoV-2 could infect two-thirds of the global population.
targetString: U-Ira Longini, et al., wasungula imodeli yokubikezela umphumela womqedazwe futhi wasikisela ukuthi i-SARS-CoV-2 ingase iphathe izingxenye ezimbili kwezintathu zesibalo sabantu emhlabeni wonke.
translated: ['U-Ira Longini, et al., wasungula imodeli yokubikezela umphumela wobhubhane futhi wasikisela ukuthi i-SARS-CoV-2 ingasulela izingxenye ezimbili kwezintathu zabantu bomhlaba wonke.']

sourceString: A Canadian group reported that SARS-CoV-2 was detected in both mid-turbinate and throat swabs of patients who recovered and left the hospital 2 weeks earlier, which indicates that the newly identified virus could become a cyclical episode similar to influenza.
targetString: Iqembu lase-Canada labika ukuthi i-SARS-CoV-2 yatholwa kuwo womabili amaswabhu e-mid-turbinate kanye nawomphimbo eziguli ezalulama futhi zaphuma esibhedlela emavikini amabili ngaphambilini, okubonisa ukuthi igciwane elisanda kutholwa kungenzeka ukuthi libe isiqephu esiphindayo esifana nemfuluwenza.
translated: ['Iqembu laseCanada libike ukuthi i-SARS-CoV-2 yatholakala kuzo zombili i-turbinate ephakathi nendawo kanye ne-throat swabs yeziguli ezaphila futhi zaphuma esibhedlela emasontweni ama-2 ngaphambili, okubonisa ukuthi igciwane elisanda kutholakala lingaba isiqephu se-cyclical esifana nomkhuhlane.']

sourceString: However, promising signs have occurred in China based on the declining number of new cases, indicating the current strategies might have been working.
targetString: Nokho, izimpawu ezithembisayo zivele e-China ngokusekelwe enanini elehlayo labantu abasha abagulayo, okubonisa ukuthi amasu amanje kungenzeka ukuthi ayasebenza.
translated: ['Kodwa-ke, izimpawu ezithembisayo zenzeke eChina ngokusekelwe ekwehleni kwenani lamacala amasha, okubonisa ukuthi amasu amanje angase asebenze.']

sourceString: Ebola was originally predicted to cause up to a million cases with half a million deaths.
targetString: Ekuqaleni kwakubikezelwe ukuthi i-Ebola yayizophatha abantu abayisigidi futhi kufe ingxenye yesigidi sabantu.
translated: ['Ekuqaleni i-Ebola yabikezelwa ukuthi ibangele amacala afinyelela esigidini ngokufa kwesigamu sesigidi.']

sourceString: However, via strict quarantine and isolation, the disease has eventually been put under control.
targetString: Nokho, ngenxa yokuzivalela nokuzihlukanisa okuqinile, isifo sigcine silawuliwe.
translated: ['Kodwa-ke, nge-quarantine eqinile nokuhlukaniswa, lesi sifo ekugcineni sifakwe ngaphansi kokulawula.']

sourceString: It is possible, similar to SARS-CoV, that SARS-CoV-2 might become weaker in infectivity and eventually die down or become a less pathogenic virus co-existent with humans.
targetString: Kungenzeka, njenge-SARS-CoV, ukuthi i-SARS-CoV-2 ingase ibe buthaka ingabi namandla futhi ekugcineni iphele noma ibe igciwane elingagulisi kakhulu elikwazi ukuphilisana nabantu.
translated: ['Kungenzeka, ngokufana ne-SARS-CoV, ukuthi i-SARS-CoV-2 ingase ibe buthakathaka ekutheleleni futhi ekugcineni ife phansi noma ibe igciwane elingaphansi kwe-pathogenic elisebenzisana nabantu.']

sourceString: A comparison of the epidemic of COVID-19 with that of SARS and MERS is provided below (Fig. ​(Fig.55).
targetString: Ukuqhathaniswa komqedazwe we-COVID-19 nalowo we-SARS kanye ne-MERS kunikezwa ngezansi (Umfa. ​(Umfa.55).
translated: ['Ukuqhathaniswa kobhubhane lwe-COVID-19 nalolowo we-SARS ne-MERS kuhlinzekwa ngezansi (Fig. (Umdwebo.55).']

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is highly transmittable through coughing or sneezing, and possibly also through direct contact with materials contaminated by the virus.
targetString: I-SARS-CoV-2 ithelelana kakhulu ngokukhwehlela noma ukuthimula, futhi kungenzeka ukuthi ngokuthintana okuqondile nezinto ezinegciwane.
translated: ['I-SARS-CoV-2 idluliselwa kakhulu ngokukhwehlela noma ukuthimla, futhi mhlawumbe nangokuxhumana ngqo nezinto ezingcoliswe igciwane.']

sourceString: The virus was also found in feces, which raises a new possibility of feces-to-mouth transmission.
targetString: Igciwane laphinde futhi latholwa endleni, okuveza ithuba elisha lokudluliselwa okusuka endleni kuye emlonyeni.
translated: ['Leli gciwane laphinde latholakala ekudleni, okuphakamisa ithuba elisha lokudluliselwa kwendle emlonyeni.']

sourceString: A recent study on 138 cases reported that 41% of the cases were possibly caused by nosocomial infections, including 17 patients with other prior diseases and 40 health-care providers.
targetString: Ucwaningo lwakamuva lweziguli ezingu-138 lwabika ukuthi u-41% weziguli kungenzeka ukuthi zatheleleka ezibhedlela, okuhlanganisa iziguli ezingu-17 ezazivele ziphethwe ezinye izifo ngaphambilini kanye nabanakekeli bezempilo abangu-40.
translated: ['Ucwaningo lwakamuva ngamacala angu-138 lubike ukuthi u-41% wamacala kungenzeka ukuthi abangelwa ukutheleleka nge-nosocomial, kufaka phakathi iziguli ezingu-17 ezinezinye izifo zangaphambilini kanye nabahlinzeki bezempilo abangu-40.']

sourceString: Thus, great precaution should be used to protect humans, especially health-care providers, social workers, family members, colleagues, and even bystanders in contact with patients or infected people.
targetString: Ngenxa yalokho, kufanele kusetshenziswe ukuqapha okukhulu ukuze kuvikelwe abantu, ikakhulukazi abahlinzeki bokunakekelwa kwezempilo, osonhlalakahle, amalungu omndeni, ozakwabo, ngisho nabantu abame eduze kweziguli noma abantu abathelelekile.
translated: ['Ngakho, kufanele kusetshenziswe ukuqapha okukhulu ukuvikela abantu, ikakhulukazi abahlinzeki bezempilo, abasebenzi bezenhlalakahle, amalungu omndeni, osebenza nabo, ngisho nababekhona ngokuxhumana neziguli noma abantu abanegciwane.']

sourceString: The first line of defense that could be used to lower the risk of infection is through wearing face masks; both the use of surgical masks and N95 respirator masks (series # 1860s) helps control the spread of viruses.
targetString: Umugqa wokuqala wokuvikeleka ongase usetshenziswe ukuze kwehliswe ubungozi bokutheleleka uwukugqoka amamaski obuso; kokubili ukusetshenziswa kwemaski yokuhlinzwa kanye namamaski e-N95 respirator (uchungechunge # 1860s) kusiza ukulawula ukubhebhetheka kwamagciwane.
translated: ['Umugqa wokuqala wokuzivikela ongasetshenziselwa ukwehlisa ingozi yokutheleleka ngokugqoka imishanguzo yobuso; kokubili ukusetshenziswa kwemishanguzo yokuhlinzwa kanye nemishanguzo yokuphefumula ye-N95 (uchungechunge # 1860s) kusiza ukulawula ukusabalala kwamagciwane.']

sourceString: Surgical face masks prevent liquid droplets from a potentially infected individual from traveling through the air or sticking onto surfaces of materials, where they could be passed on to others.
targetString: Amamaski obuso okuhlinza avimba amaconsana awuketshezi avela kumuntu okungenzeka ukuthi uthelelekile ukuthi angahambi ngomoya futhi anamathele ebusweni bezinto, lapho engadluliselwa khona kwabanye abantu.
translated: ['Imishanguzo yobuso yokuhlinzwa ivimbela amaconsi oketshezi avela kumuntu ongase abe negciwane ukuba ahambe emoyeni noma anamathele ezindaweni zezinto, lapho angadluliselwa khona kwabanye.']

sourceString: However, only N95 (series # 1860s) masks can protect against the inhalation of virions as small as 10 to 80 nm, with only 5% of the virions being able to penetrate completely; SARS-CoV-2 is similar to SARS-CoV in size and both are approximately 85 nm.
targetString: Nokho, amamaski e-N95 (uchungechunge # 1860s) kuphela angakwazi ukukuvikela ekuhogeleni ama-virion amancane ngo-10 kuye ku-80 nm, kuyilapho u-5% kuphela wama-virion okwazi ukudlula ngokuphelele; i-SARS-CoV-2 inosayizi ofanayo nowe-SARS-CoV kokubili kucishe kube ngu-85 nm.
translated: ['Kodwa-ke, kuphela imishanguzo ye-N95 (uchungechunge # 1860s) engavikela ukuphefumula kwama-virions amancane njenge-10 kuya ku-80 nm, nge-5% kuphela yama-virions akwazi ukungena ngokuphelele; I-SARS-CoV-2 ifana ne-SARS-CoV ngobukhulu futhi zombili cishe ziyi-85 nm.']

sourceString: Since particles can penetrate even five surgical masks stacked together, health-care providers in direct contact with patients must wear N95 (series # 1860s) masks but not surgical masks.
targetString: Njengoba izinhlayiya zikwazi ukudlula kumamaski okuhlinza amahlanu ahlanganisiwe, abahlinzeki bezempilo abasebenza ngokuqondile neziguli kumelwe bagqoke amamaski e-N95 (uchungechunge # 1860s) hhayi amamaski okuhlinza.
translated: ['Njengoba izinhlayiya zingena ngisho nemishanguzo emihlanu yokuhlinzwa ehlanganiswe ndawonye, abahlinzeki bezempilo abaxhumana ngqo neziguli kumele bagqoke imishanguzo ye-N95 (uchungechunge # 1860s) kodwa hhayi imishanguzo yokuhlinzwa.']

sourceString: In addition to masks, health-care providers should wear fitted isolation gowns in order to further reduce contact with viruses.
targetString: Ngaphezu kwamamaski, abahlinzeki bokunakekelwa kwezempilo kufanele bagqoke amagawuni okuzivikela abalingana kahle ukuze kuncishiswe ngokwengeziwe ukuthintana namagciwane.
translated: ['Ngaphezu kwemishanguzo, abahlinzeki bezempilo kufanele bagqoke izingubo zokuhlukanisa ezifakiwe ukuze kuqhutshekwe nokunciphisa ukuxhumana namagciwane.']

sourceString: Viruses can also infect an individual through the eyes.
targetString: Amagciwane angakwazi ukungena kumuntu ngamehlo.
translated: ['Amagciwane nawo angathelela umuntu ngamehlo.']

sourceString: On January 22, 2020, a doctor was infected with SARS-CoV-2 although he wore an N95 mask; the virus might have entered his body through his inflammatory eyes.
targetString: Ngo-January 22, 2020, udokotela watheleleka nge-SARS-CoV-2 nakuba ayegqoke imaski ye-N95; igciwane kungenzeka ukuthi langena emzimbeni wakhe ngokuthi lingene emehlweni akhe avuvukele.
translated: ['NgoJanuwari 22, 2020, udokotela watheleleka nge-SARS-CoV-2 nakuba egqoke imaski ye-N95; leli gciwane kungenzeka ukuthi lingene emzimbeni wakhe ngamehlo akhe okuvuvukala.']

sourceString: Thus, health-care providers should also wear transparent face shields or goggles while working with patients.
targetString: Ngenxa yalokho, abahlinzeki bokunakekelwa kwezempilo kufanele futhi bagqoke izivikeli zobuso ezingakwazi ukukubonisa noma izibuko ngenkathi besebenza ngeziguli.
translated: ['Ngakho, abahlinzeki bezempilo kufanele futhi bagqoke izihlangu zobuso ezibonakalayo noma izibuko ngenkathi besebenza neziguli.']

sourceString: For the general public in affected or potentially affected areas, it is highly suggested that everybody wash their hands with disinfectant soaps more often than usual, try to stay indoors for self-quarantine and limit contact with potentially infected individuals.
targetString: Kumphakathi ovamile ezindaweni ezithintekile noma okungenzeka ukuthi zithintekile, kutuswa kakhulu ukuthi wonke umuntu ageze izandla zakhe ngensipho ekhucululayo izikhathi eziningi kunokuvamile, azame ukuhlala endlini ukuze azivalele futhi akhawule ukuxhumana nabantu okungenzeka ukuthi bathelelekile.
