translated: ['Ukuthatha imithi ebandayo engaphezu kwe-counter, ukuphuza uketshezi, nokuphumula kungasiza ukunciphisa izimpawu.']

sourceString: Depending on the severity, oxygen therapy, intravenous fluids, and breathing support may be required.
targetString: Kuye ngokuncika ngobunzima, ukulapha umoya wokuphefumula, uketshezi olungeniswayo, nokusekela ukuphefumula kungase kudingeke.
translated: ['Ngokuya ngobunzima, ukwelashwa komoya-mpilo, uketshezi lwe-intravenous, nokusekelwa kokuphefumula kungadingeka.']

sourceString: The use of steroids may worsen outcomes.
targetString: Ukusebenzisa ama-steroids kungase kulalaze imiphumela.
translated: ['Ukusetshenziswa kwe-steroids kungase kube kubi kakhulu imiphumela.']

sourceString: Several compounds that were previously approved for treatment of other viral diseases are being investigated for use in treating COVID-19.
targetString: Izakhi eziningi ebezigunyaziwe ekusebenzeni kwezinye izifo ezandayo ziyaphenywa ukuze zisebenziswe ekulapheni i-COVID-19.
translated: ['Izinhlanganisela eziningana ezazivunyelwe ngaphambilini ukwelashwa kwezinye izifo ezibangelwa amagciwane ziyaphenywa ukuze zisetshenziswe ekwelapheni i-COVID-19.']

sourceString: The WHO also stated that some "traditional and home remedies" can provide relief of the symptoms caused by SARS-CoV-19.
targetString: I-WHO yaphinde yakhipha ukuthi amanye "amakhambi amadala nawasekhaya" angakwazi ukuhlinzekela  impumuzo kulezimpawu ezidalwa i-SARS-CoV-19.
translated: ['I-WHO iphinde yasho ukuthi ezinye "izindlela zendabuko nezasekhaya" zinganikeza ukukhululeka kwezimpawu ezibangelwa i-SARS-CoV-19.']

sourceString: Increasing capacity and adapting healthcare for the needs of COVID-19 patients is described by the WHO as a fundamental outbreak response measure.
targetString: Ukuphakamisa amandla nokuvumelanisa ezokunakekela ezempilo ngokwesidingo seziguli ze-COVID-19 kuphakanyiswa i-WHO njengesinyathelo esibucayi sokusabela kuqubuko.
translated: ['Ukwandisa amandla nokuzivumelanisa nokunakekelwa kwezempilo kwezidingo zeziguli ze-COVID-19 kuchazwa yi-WHO njengendlela eyisisekelo yokuphendula ukuqubuka.']

sourceString: The ECDC and the European regional office of the WHO have issued guidelines for hospitals and primary healthcare services for shifting of resources at multiple levels, including focusing laboratory services towards COVID-19 testing, cancelling elective procedures whenever possible, separating and isolating COVID-19 positive patients, and increasing intensive care capabilities by training personnel and increasing the number of available ventilators and beds.
targetString: I-ECDC ne-European regional office le-WHO bakhiphe imihlahlandlela yezibhedlela nabanakekeli bempilo abayinloko ngokugudluza izinsiza ngezigaba ezingafani, okuhlanganisa ukugxilisa imisebenzi yamalebhu ekuhloleni i-COVID-19, ukukhansela izinqubo ezikhethwayo lapho kungenzeka, ukuhlunga nokuhlukanisa iziguli ze-COVID-19 eziqinisekisiwe, nokuphakamisa amandla okunakekela okubucayi ngokuqeqsha izisebenzi nokwandisa isibalo sezisizi zokuphefumula nemibhede.
translated: ['I-ECDC kanye nehhovisi lesifunda laseYurophu le-WHO bakhiphe imihlahlandlela yezibhedlela kanye nezinsizakalo zokunakekelwa kwezempilo eziyinhloko zokushintsha izinsiza emazingeni amaningi, kufaka phakathi ukugxila kwezinsizakalo ze-laboratory ekuhlolweni kwe-COVID-19, ukukhansela izinqubo zokukhetha noma nini lapho kungenzeka, ukuhlukanisa nokuhlukanisa iziguli ezine-COVID-19, nokwandisa amandla okunakekelwa kakhulu ngokuqeqesha abasebenzi nokwandisa inani lama-ventilator nemibhede ekhona.']

sourceString: There are various theories about where the very first case (the so-called patient zero) may have originated.
targetString: Kunemibono ehlukene mayelana nokuthi isibonelo sokuqala (obizwa ngesiguli seqanda) savela kuphi.
translated: ['Kunemibono ehlukahlukene mayelana nokuthi icala lokuqala kakhulu (okuthiwa isiguli zero) kungenzeka ukuthi lavela kuphi.']

sourceString: The first known case of the novel coronavirus may trace back to 1 December 2019 in Wuhan, Hubei, China.
targetString: Isibonelo sokuqala esaziwayo se-coronavirus entsha sibuyela emuva ku-1 December 2019 e-Wuhan, e-Hubei, e-China.
translated: ['Icala lokuqala elaziwayo le-coronavirus entsha lingase lkulandelela emuva ku-1 Disemba 2019 eWuhan, eHubei, eChina.']

sourceString: Within a month, the number of coronavirus cases in Hubei gradually increased.
targetString: Esikhathini esingaba inyanga, isibalo sezibonelo ze-coronavirus e-Hubei saphakama kancane.
translated: ['Kungakapheli inyanga, inani lamacala e-coronavirus eHubei landa kancane kancane.']

sourceString: These were mostly linked to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, which also sold live animals, and one theory is that the virus came from one of these kinds of animals; or, in other words, has a zoonotic origin.A pneumonia cluster of unknown cause was observed on 26 December and treated by the doctor Zhang Jixian in Hubei Provincial Hospital, who informed the Wuhan Jianghan CDC on 27 December.
targetString: Lezi bezixhumene kakhulu ne-Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, ephinde idayise izilwane eziphilayo, futhi umbono ukuthi igciwane lavela kwesinye sizinhlobo zalezi zilwane; noma, ngamanye amagama, sinomsuka wokuthathelwa esilwaneni. Uxhaxha lwamanyumoniya lwembagela engaziwa lwabhekwa ngo-26 December futhi lalashwa ngudokotela u-Zhang Jixian e-Hubei Provincial Hospital, owabikela i-Wuhan Jianghan CDC ngo-27 December.
translated: ['Lezi zazihlobene kakhulu ne-Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, nayo eyayithengisa izilwane eziphilayo, futhi omunye umbono uthi igciwane lavela kwenye yalezi zinhlobo zezilwane; noma, ngamanye amazwi, inemvelaphi ye-zoonotic. Iqoqo le-pneumonia lesizathu esingaziwa labonwa ngo-26 Disemba futhi laphathwa udokotela uZhang Jixian esibhedlela sesifundazwe saseHubei, owazise i-Wuhan Jianghan CDC ngo-27 Disemba.']

sourceString: On 30 December, a group of doctors at Wuhan Central Hospital alerted their colleagues of a "SARS-like coronavirus".
targetString: Ngo-30 December, iqembu lodokotela e-Wuhan Central Hospital laxwayisa abanakwabo nge-"coronavirus efana ne-SARS".
translated: ['Ngo-30 Disemba, iqembu lodokotela esibhedlela iWuhan Central laxwayisa ozakwabo "nge-coronavirus efana ne-SARS".']

sourceString: Eight of these doctors, including Li Wenliang, were admonished by the police for spreading false rumours, and another, Ai Fen, was reprimanded by her superiors for raising the alarm.
targetString: Odokotela abayisishigalombili, abahlanganisa u-Li Wenliang, bayalwa amaphoyisa ngokusakaza amahlebezi ayiphutha, omunye futhi, u-Ai Fen, wathethiswa abaphathi bakhe ngokuhlaba umkhosi.
translated: ['Abayisishiyagalombili kulaba dokotela, okubalwa kubo uLi Wenliang, bakhuzwe ngamaphoyisa ngokusabalalisa amahemuhemu amanga, kwathi omunye, u-Ai Fen, wakhuzwa ngabaphathi bakhe ngokuphakamisa i-alamu.']

sourceString: The Wuhan Municipal Health Commission later released a public notice on 31 December and informed the WHO.
targetString: I-Wuhan Municipal Health Commission kamuva yakhipha isaziso somphakathi ngo-31 December futhi yabikela ne-WHO.
translated: ['Kamuva iKhomishini Yezempilo kaMasipala waseWuhan yakhipha isaziso somphakathi ngomhlaka-31 Disemba futhi yazisa i-WHO.']

sourceString: Enough cases of unknown pneumonia had been reported to health authorities in Wuhan to trigger an investigation in early January.During the early stages of the outbreak, the number of cases doubled approximately every seven and a half days.
targetString: Izibonelo ezanele zenyumoniya engaziwa zase zibikelwe amagunya ezempilo e-Wuhan ukuthi zingasusa uphenyo ekuqaleni kuka-January. Ezigabeni zokuqala zokuqubuka, isibalo sezibonelo saphindeka okungenani njalo ngemuva kwezinsuku eziyisikhombisa nengxenye.
translated: ['Izigameko ezanele ze-pneumonia engaziwa zazibikwe kwiziphathimandla zezempilo eWuhan ukuvusa uphenyo ekuqaleni kukaJanuwari.Ngesikhathi sokuqala kokuqubuka kwalesi sifo, isibalo sabantu abahlaselwe nesifo siphindwe kabili cishe njalo ezinsukwini eziyisikhombisa nengxenye.']

sourceString: In early and mid-January 2020, the virus spread to other Chinese provinces, helped by the Chinese New Year migration and Wuhan being a transport hub and major rail interchange.
targetString: Ekuqaleni naphakathi kuka-January 2020, igciwane lasabalala laya nakwezinye izifunda zase-China, lisizwa ukuthutha ngenxa Yonyaka Omusha Wase-China nokuthi i-Wuhan iyihabhu yezokuthutha nokushintshana kojantshi abakhulu.
translated: ['Ekuqaleni naphakathi noJanuwari 2020, leli gciwane lasakazeka kwezinye izifundazwe zaseChina, lasizwa ukufuduka koNyaka Omusha WaseShayina kanye neWuhan ukuba yindawo yezokuthutha kanye nokushintshaniswa okukhulu kwezitimela.']

sourceString: On 20 January, China reported nearly 140 new cases in one day, including two people in Beijing and one in Shenzhen.
targetString: Ngo-20 January, i-China yabika cishe izibonelo ezingu-140 ngosuku olulodwa, okuhlanganisa abantu ababili e-Beijing noyedwa e-Shenzhen.
translated: ['Ngomhlaka-20 Januwari, iChina yabika cishe amacala amasha angu-140 ngosuku olulodwa, kuhlanganise nabantu ababili eBeijing noyedwa eShenzhen.']

sourceString: Later official data shows that 6,174 people had already developed symptoms by 20 January 2020.As of 26 March, the United States has overtaken China and Italy with the highest number of confirmed cases in the world.As of 9 April 2020, more than 1.61 million cases have been reported worldwide; more than 97,000 people have died and more than 364,000 have recovered.
targetString: Kamuva idatha esemthethweni yabonisa ukuthi abantu abangu-6,174 bese bebonisa izimpawu ngo-20 January 2020. Kusukela ngo-26 March, i-United States iyidlulile i-China ne-Italy ngibalo esiphakeme sezibonelo eziqinisekisiwe emhlabeni. Kusukela ngo-9 April 2020, izibonelo ezingaphezu kuka-1.61 wesigidi ziye zabikwa umhlaba wonke; abantu abangaphezulu kuka-97,000 bafile futhi abangaphezulu kuka-364,000 balulamile.
translated: ['Imininingwane esemthethweni kamuva ibonisa ukuthi abantu abangu-6 174 sebevele benezimpawu ngo-20 Januwari 2020.As-26 Mashi, i-United States idlule iChina ne-Italy ngenani eliphakeme kakhulu lamacala aqinisekisiwe emhlabeni. Kusukela ngomhlaka-9 Ephreli 2020, sekubikwe amacala angaphezu kwezigidi ezingu-1.61 emhlabeni wonke; bangaphezu kuka-97 000 abantu asebeshonile kanti bangaphezu kuka-364 000 abaphilile.']

sourceString: Around 200 countries and territories have had at least one case.
targetString: Okungenani amazwe nezindawo ezingu-200 zibe naso okungenani isibonelo esisodwa.
translated: ['Amazwe nezindawo ezizungeze i-200 zibe necala okungenani elilodwa.']

sourceString: Due to the pandemic in Europe, many countries in the Schengen Area have restricted free movement and set up border controls.
targetString: Ngenxa yobhubhane e-Europe, amazwe amaningi endaweni yase-Schengen isibeke umngcele wokunyakaza ngenkululeko futhi aphakamisa ukulwulwa komngcele.
translated: ['Ngenxa yalolu bhubhane eYurophu, amazwe amaningi aseSchengen Area avimbele ukuhamba ngokukhululeka futhi amisa ukulawulwa kwemingcele.']

sourceString: National reactions have included containment measures such as quarantines (known as stay-at-home orders, shelter-in-place orders, or lockdown) and curfews.As of 2 April, nearly 300 million people, or about 90% of the population, are under some form of lockdown in the United States, more than 50 million people are in lockdown in the Philippines, about 59 million people are in lockdown in South Africa, and 1.3 billion people are in lockdown in India.
targetString: Ukusabela kwesizwe kuhlanganise izinyathelo zokugcinwa njengokuvalelwa (okwaziwa ngokuthi iziqondiso zokuhlala ekhaya, iziqondiso zokukhosela lapho ukhona, noma ukuvala phansi) nezikhathi ezimisiwe. Kusukela ngo 2 April, cishe izigidi ezingu-300 zabantu, noma u-90% wenani labantu, bangaphansi kwendlela ethile yokuvala phansi e-United States, abantu abangaphezulu kwezigidi ezingu-50 zabantu ziphansi kokuvala phansi e-Philippines, okungenani izigidi ezingu-59 zabantu ziphansi kokuvala phansi e-South Africa, futhi izinkulungwane zezigidi ezingu-1.3 zabantu ziphansi kokuvala phansi e-India.
translated: ['Ukusabela kuzwelonke kuhlanganise nezinyathelo zokuvimbela ezifana nezindawo zokuhlala (ezaziwa ngokuthi imiyalo yokuhlala ekhaya, imiyalo yendawo yokuhlala, noma ukuvalwa) kanye nezikhathi zokufika ekhaya. Kusukela ngomhlaka-2 Ephreli, cishe abantu abayizigidi ezingama-300, noma cishe u-90% wabantu, bangaphansi kohlobo oluthile lokuvalwa kwezwe e-United States, abantu abangaphezu kwezigidi ezingama-50 bavalelwe ePhilippines, cishe abantu abayizigidi ezingama-59 bavalelwe eNingizimu Afrika, futhi abantu abayizigidi eziyizinkulungwane ezingu-1.3 bavalelwe eNdiya.']

sourceString: On 26 March, 1.7 billion people worldwide were under some form of lockdown, which increased to 2.6 billion people two days later—around a third of the world's population.
targetString: Ngo-26 March, izinkulungwa zezigidi ezingu-1.7 zbantu emhlabeni wonke bebengaphansi kohlobo lokuvala phansi, okube sekukhuphuka kwaba izinkulungwane zezigidi ezingu-2.6 zabantu ezinsukwini ezimbili kamuva—okungaba izingxenye ezintathu zenani labantu bomhlaba.
translated: ['Ngomhlaka-26 Mashi, abantu abayizigidi eziyizinkulungwane ezingu-1.7 emhlabeni wonke babengaphansi kohlobo oluthile lokuvalwa, okwakhuphuka kwaba ngabantu abayizigidi eziyizinkulungwane ezingu-2.6 ngemva kwezinsuku ezimbili—cishe ingxenye yesithathu yabantu bomhlaba.']

sourceString: The first confirmed case of COVID-19 has been traced back to 1 December 2019 in Wuhan; one unconfirmed report suggests the earliest case was on 17 November.
targetString: Isibonelo sokuqala eziqinisekisiwe se-COVID-19 silandelelwe emuva ku-1 December 2019 e-Wuhan; umbiko owodwa ongaqinisekisiwe uphakamisa ukuthi isibonelo sokuqala saba ngo-17 November.
translated: ['Icala lokuqala eliqinisekisiwe le-COVID-19 lilandelwe emuva ku-1 Disemba 2019 eWuhan; omunye umbiko ongaqinisekisiwe uveza ukuthi icala lokuqala lalingomhlaka-17 Novemba.']

sourceString: Doctor Zhang Jixian observed a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 26 December, upon which her hospital informed Wuhan Jianghan CDC on 27 December.
targetString: Udokotela u-Zhang Jixian wabheka uxhaxha lwezibonelo zenyumoniya yembangela engaziwa ngo-26 December, khona lapho insibhedlela sakhe sabikela i-Wuhan Jianghan CDC ngo-27 December.
translated: ['Udokotela uZhang Jixian wabona iqoqo lamacala e-pneumonia esizathu esingaziwa ngomhlaka-26 Disemba, lapho isibhedlela sakhe sazisa khona iWuhan Jianghan CDC ngomhlaka-27 Disemba.']

sourceString: Initial genetic testing of patient samples on 27 December 2019 indicated the presence of a SARS-like coronavirus.
targetString: Ukuhlola kokuqala kofuzo kwezibonelo zeziguli ngo-27 December 2019 kwabonisa ukuba khona kwe-coronavirus efana ne-SARS.
translated: ['Ukuhlolwa kokuqala kwezakhi zofuzo zamasampula eziguli ngomhlaka-27 Disemba 2019 kukhombise ukuba khona kwe-coronavirus efana ne-SARS.']

sourceString: A public notice was released by Wuhan Municipal Health Commission on 31 December.
targetString: Isaziso somphakathi sakhishwa yi-Wuhan Municipal Health Commission ngo-31 December.
translated: ['Isaziso somphakathi sakhishwa yiKhomishini Yezempilo kaMasipala waseWuhan ngomhlaka-31 Disemba.']

sourceString: The WHO was informed on the same day.
targetString: I-WHO yabikelwa ngosuku olufanayo.
translated: ['I-WHO yaziswa ngosuku olufanayo.']

sourceString: As these notifications occurred, doctors in Wuhan were warned by police for "spreading rumours" about the outbreak.
targetString: Njengoba lezi zaziso zivela, odokotela e-Wuhan baxwayiswa amaphoyisa "ngokusakaza amahlebezi" aphathelene nokuqubuka.
translated: ['Njengoba lezi zaziso zenzeka, odokotela baseWuhan baxwayiswa ngamaphoyisa "ngokusabalalisa amahemuhemu" mayelana nokuqubuka kwalesi sifo.']

sourceString: The Chinese National Health Commission initially claimed that there was no "clear evidence" of human-to-human transmission.
targetString: I-Chinese National Health Commission yaqala ngokugomela ukuthi "abukho ubufakazi" bokudliliselana komuntu nomuntu.
translated: ['I-Chinese National Health Commission ekuqaleni yathi abukho "ubufakazi obucacile" bokudluliselwa komuntu nomuntu.']

sourceString: In late January, the Chinese government launched a radical campaign later described by the Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping as a "people's war" to contain the spread of the virus.
targetString: Ekuphetheni kuka-January, uhulumeni wase-China waqalisa umkhankaso omkhulu kamuva owachazwa unobhala jikelele we-Chinese Communist Party u-Xi Jinping ngokuthi "impi yabantu" yokuvalela ukusaphazeka kwegciwane.
translated: ['Ngasekupheleni kukaJanuwari, uhulumeni waseChina wasungula umkhankaso omkhulu kamuva ochazwe unobhala jikelele we-Chinese Communist Party uXi Jinping "njengempi yabantu" ukunqanda ukusabalala kwaleli gciwane.']

sourceString: In what has been described as "the largest quarantine in human history", a cordon sanitaire was announced on 23 January stopping travel in and out of Wuhan, which was extended to a total of 15 cities in Hubei, affecting a total of about 57 million people.
targetString: Kulokho okubizwe ngokuthi "ukuvalelwa okukhulu emlandweni wesintu", intambo ngenhlanzeko yamenyezelwa ngo-23 January yokuvala ukungena nokuphuma e-Wuhan, eyandiselwa inani lamadolobha angu-15 cities e-Hubei, okuthinta inani lezigi zabantu ezingu-57.
translated: ['Kulokho okuye kwachazwa ngokuthi "ukugcinwa okukhulu kunazo zonke emlandweni wesintu", kwamenyezelwa i-cordon sanitaire ngo-23 Januwari ukumisa ukuhamba ukungena nokuphuma eWuhan, okwanwetshwa emadolobheni angu-15 eHubei, okuthinta inani labantu abangaba yizigidi ezingama-57.']

sourceString: Private vehicle use was banned in the city.
targetString: Ukusebenzisa imoto yakho bekuvinjelwe edolobheni.
translated: ['Ukusetshenziswa kwezimoto zangasese kwavinjelwa edolobheni.']

sourceString: Chinese New Year (25 January) celebrations were cancelled in many places.
targetString: Ukugubha Unyaka Omusha e-China (25 January) kwakhanselwa ezindaweni eziningi.
translated: ['Imikhosi yoNyaka Omusha WaseShayina (25 Januwari) yakhanselwa ezindaweni eziningi.']

sourceString: The authorities also announced the construction of a temporary hospital, Huoshenshan Hospital, which was completed in 10 days.
targetString: Abasemagunyeni baphinda bamemezela ukwakhiwa kwesibhedlela sesikhashana, i-Huoshenshan Hospital, eyaqedwa ezinsukwini ezingu-10.
translated: ['Iziphathimandla ziphinde zamemezela ukwakhiwa kwesibhedlela sesikhashana, iHuoshenshan Hospital, esaqedwa ezinsukwini ezingu-10.']

sourceString: Another hospital was built afterwards, Leishenshan Hospital, to handle additional patients.
targetString: Esinye isibhedlela sakhiwa kamuva, i-Leishenshan Hospital, ukuze sinakekele iziguli ezengeziwe.
translated: ['Esinye isibhedlela sakhiwa ngemuva kwalokho, isibhedlela iLeishenshan, ukuphatha iziguli ezengeziwe.']

sourceString: In addition to newly constructed hospitals, China also converted 14 other facilities in Wuhan, such as convention centers and stadiums, into temporary hospitals.On 26 January, the government instituted further measures to contain the COVID-19 outbreak, including issuing health declarations for travellers and extending the Spring Festival holiday.
targetString: Ngaphezu kokwakha izibhedlela ezintsha, i-China futhi yaguqula izindawo ezingu-14 e-Wuhan, njengezikhungo zemihlangano nezitediyamu, zaba yizibhedlela zesikhashana. Ngo-26 January, uhulumeni waqalisa ezinye izinyathelo zokuvalela ukuqubuka kwe-COVID-19, okuhlanganisa ukukhipha izimemezelo zezempilo zabahambi nokunweba iholidi Lomkhosi weNtwasahlobo.
translated: ['Ngaphezu kwezibhedlela ezisanda kwakhiwa, iChina iphinde yaguqula ezinye izikhungo ezingu-14 eWuhan, njengezikhungo zemihlangano nezinkundla zemidlalo, zaba izibhedlela zesikhashana. Ngo-26 Januwari, uhulumeni wasungula ezinye izinyathelo zokunqanda ukuqubuka kwe-COVID-19, kufaka phakathi ukukhipha izimemezelo zezempilo zabahambi nokwandisa iholidi le-Spring Festival.']

sourceString: Universities and schools around the country were also closed.
targetString: Amanyuvesi nezikole ezweni nawo avalwa.
translated: ['Amanyuvesi nezikole ezweni lonke nazo zivaliwe.']

sourceString: The regions of Hong Kong and Macau instituted several measures, particularly in regard to schools and universities.
targetString: Izifunda zase-Hong Kong ne-Macau zaqalisa izinyathelo ezimbalwa, ikakhulukazi ngokuphathelene nezikole namanyuvesi.
translated: ['Izifunda zaseHong Kong naseMacau zasungula izinyathelo eziningana, ikakhulukazi maqondana nezikole namanyuvesi.']

sourceString: Remote working measures were instituted in several Chinese regions.
targetString: Izinyathelo zokusebenza ukude zaqaliswa ezifundeni ezimbalwa zase-China.
translated: ['Izinyathelo zokusebenza ezikude zasungulwa ezifundeni eziningana zaseChina.']

sourceString: Travel restrictions were enacted in and outside of Hubei.
targetString: Imikhawulo yokuhamba yamiswa ngaphakathi nangaphandle kwe-Hubei.
translated: ['Imikhawulo yokuhamba wenziwa ngaphakathi nangaphandle kweHubei.']

sourceString: Public transport was modified, and museums throughout China were temporarily closed.
targetString: Ezokuthutha zomphakathi zathuthukiswa, futhi amanyuziyemu kulo lonke elase-China avalwa isikhashana.
translated: ['Izithuthi zomphakathi zaguqulwa, futhi iminyuziyamu kulo lonke elaseChina yavalwa okwesikhashana.']

sourceString: Control of public movement was applied in many cities, and it has been estimated that about 760 million people (more than half the population) faced some form of outdoor restriction.After the outbreak entered its global phase in March, Chinese authorities took strict measures to prevent the virus from "importing" from other countries.
targetString: Ukulawula ukunyakaza komphakathi kwafakwa kumadolobha amaningi, futhi kuqhathaniswe ukuthi okungenani izigidi zabantu ezingu-760 (okungaphezulu kwengxenye yenani labantu) zabhekana nohlobo lomkhawulo wangaphandle. Ngemuva kokuthi ukuqubuka kungene esigabeni sakho sembulunga ngo-March, amagunya ase-China athatha izinyathelo eziqinile zokuvikela igciwane ukuthi "lingangeni" livela kwamanye amazwe.
translated: ['Ukulawulwa kokuhamba komphakathi kwasetshenziswa emadolobheni amaningi, futhi kuye kwalinganiselwa ukuthi cishe abantu abayizigidi ezingama-760 (ngaphezu kwengxenye yabantu) babhekene nohlobo oluthile lokuvinjelwa kwangaphandle. Ngemuva kokuthi lesi sifo singene esigabeni saso somhlaba wonke ngoMashi, iziphathimandla zaseChina zathatha izinyathelo eziqinile zokuvimbela leli gciwane "ukungenisa" kwamanye amazwe.']

sourceString: For example, Beijing has imposed a 14-day mandatory quarantine for all international travellers entering the city.On 23 March, mainland China only one case had transmitted domestically in the five days prior, in this instance via a traveller returning to Guangzhou from Istanbul.
targetString: Ngokwesibonelo, i-Beijing ibeke ukuvalewa okuyimpoqo kwezinsuku ezingu-14 kubo bonke abahambi bamazwe abafikayo edolobheni. Ngo-23 March, izwe eliyinhloko e-China bekunesibonelo esisodwa kuphela sokudlulisela ngaphakathi ezinsukwini ezinhlanu ngaphambili, kulesi senzakalo ngomhambi obebuyela e-Guangzhou evela e-Istanbul.
translated: ['Isibonelo, iBeijing ibeke i-quarantine ephoqelekile yezinsuku ezingu-14 kubo bonke abahambi bamazwe omhlaba abangena edolobheni. Ngo-23 Mashi, izwe laseChina icala elilodwa kuphela lalidlulisele ekhaya ezinsukwini ezinhlanu ngaphambili, kulesi sigameko ngomhambi obuyela eGuangzhou esuka e-Istanbul.']

sourceString: On 24 March 2020, Chinese Premier Li Keqiang reported that the spread of domestically transmitted cases has been basically blocked and the outbreak has been controlled in China.
targetString: On 24 March 2020, uNdunankulu wase-China u-Li Keqiang wabika ukuthi ukusabalala kwezibonelo ezidluliselene ngaphakathi bekuvinjiwe nokuthi ukuqubuka bekulawuliwe e-China.
translated: ['Ngo-24 Mashi 2020, uNdunankulu waseChina uLi Keqiang ubike ukuthi ukusabalala kwamacala adluliselwa ekhaya ngokuyisisekelo kuvinjiwe futhi ukuqubuka kuye kwalawulwa eChina.']

sourceString: The same day travel restrictions were eased in Hubei, apart from Wuhan, two months after the lockdown was imposed.The Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs announced on 26 March 2020 that entry for visa or residence permit holders would be suspended from 28 March onwards, with no specific details on when this policy will end.
targetString: Ngosuku olufanayo lokwenziwa lula kwemikhawulo yokuhamba e-Hubei, ngaphandle kwe-Wuhan, izinyanga ezimbili ngemva kokuphoqelelwa kokuvala phansi. I-Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs yamemezela ngo-26 March 2020 ukuthi ukungena kwabanama-visa noma abanezimvume zokuhlala kuzomiswa kusukela ngo-28 March kuqhubeke, ngaphandle kwemininingwane eqondile yokuthi lenqubomgomo izophela nini.
translated: ['Ngosuku olufanayo imikhawulo yokuhamba yancishiswa eHubei, ngaphandle kweWuhan, ngemuva kwezinyanga ezimbili kubekwe ukuvalwa kwezwe. UMnyango Wezangaphandle waseChina wamemezela ngomhlaka-26 Mashi 2020 ukuthi ukungena kwabanikazi bezimvume ze-visa noma zokuhlala kuzomiswa kusukela ngomhlaka-28 Mashi kuya phambili, kungekho mininingwane eqondile yokuthi le nqubomgomo izophela nini.']

sourceString: Those who wish to enter China will have to apply for visas in Chinese embassies or consulates.
targetString: Labo abafisa ukungena e-China kuzomele bafake isicelo sama-visas kumahhovisi amanxusa ase-China noma kumahhovisi amanxusa e-China.
translated: ['Labo abafisa ukungena eChina kuzodingeka bafake izicelo zama-visa ezindlini zamanxusa zaseChina noma ama-consulates.']

sourceString: The Chinese government encouraged businesses and factories to re-open on 30 March, and provided monetary stimulus packages for firms.The State Council declared a day of mourning to begin with a national three-minute moment of silence on 10:00 4 April, coinciding with Qingming Festival, although the central government asked families to pay their respects online in observance of physical distancing as to avoid a renewed COVID-19 outbreak.
targetString: Uhulumeni wase-China ukhuthaze amabhizinisi nezimboni ukuthi zivule kabusha ngo-30 March, futhi wahlinzekela izinkampani ngogqozi lwezishuqulu zemali. I-State Council imemezele usuku lokuzila oluqala ngemizuzu emithathu yesikhathi sokuthula ezweni lonke ngo-10:00 4 April, okuqondana ne-Qingming Festival, yize uhulumeni omkhulu ucele imikhaya ukuthi ibonise ukwazisa kwayo nge-inthanethi ukuze kuqaphelwe ukuzihlukanisa ngokomzimba bese kugwenywe ukuqubuka kabusha kwe-COVID-19.
translated: ['Uhulumeni waseChina wakhuthaza amabhizinisi kanye namafektri ukuba avule kabusha ngomhlaka-30 Mashi, futhi wanikeza amaphakheji okuvuselela imali kumafemu. UMkhandlu woMbuso wamemezela usuku lokuzila ukuqala ngomzuzu kazwelonke wemizuzu emithathu wokuthula ngo-10: 00 4 Ephreli, okuhambisana ne-Qingming Festival, nakuba uhulumeni omkhulu wacela imindeni ukuba ihloniphe ku-intanethi ngokugcina ukuhlukana ngokomzimba mayelana nokugwema ukuqubuka kabusha kwe-COVID-19.']

sourceString: COVID-19 was confirmed to have spread to South Korea on 20 January 2020 from China.
targetString: I-COVID-19 yaqinisekiswa ukuthi isisabalale yaya e-South Korea ngo-20 January 2020 ivela e-China.
translated: ['I-COVID-19 yaqinisekiswa ukuthi isabalale eNingizimu Korea ngomhlaka-20 Januwari 2020 isuka eChina.']

sourceString: The nation's health agency reported a significant increase in confirmed cases on 20 February, largely attributed to a gathering in Daegu of a new religious movement known as the Shincheonji Church of Jesus.
targetString: Abemeleli bezezempilo zezwe babike ukuphakama okuqaphelekayo kwezibonelo eziqinisekisiwe ngo-20 February, okubhekwa ngokuyinhloko njengomphumela wombuthwano wase-Daegu weqembu elisha lenkolo elaziwa ngokuthi i-Shincheonji Church of Jesus.
translated: ['Inhlangano yezempilo yezwe ibike ukwanda okukhulu kwamacala aqinisekisiwe ngomhlaka-20 Febhuwari, ikakhulukazi ngenxa yokuhlangana eDaegu kwenhlangano entsha yenkolo eyaziwa ngokuthi iShincheonji Church of Jesus.']

sourceString: Shincheonji devotees visiting Daegu from Wuhan were suspected to be the origin of the outbreak.
targetString: Abazinikele ku-Shincheonji bevakashele e-Daegu bevela e-Wuhan basolwa ngokuba ngabasusi bokuqubuka.
translated: ['Abazinikele eShincheonji abavakashela uDaegu waseWuhan basolwa ukuthi bayimvelaphi yokuqubuka kwalesi sifo.']

sourceString: As of 22 February, among 9,336 followers of the church, 1,261 or about 13% reported symptoms.South Korea declared the highest level of alert on 23 February 2020.
targetString: Kusukela ngo-22 February, phakathi kwabalandeli abangu-9,336 besonto, u-1,261 noma okungenani u-13% wabika izimpawu. I-South Korea yamemezela isixwayiso sezinga eliphezulu ngo-23 February 2020.
translated: ['Kusukela ngomhlaka-22 Febhuwari, phakathi kwabalandeli besonto abangu-9 336, abangu-1 261 noma cishe abangu-13% babike izimpawu. INingizimu Korea yamemezela izinga eliphakeme kakhulu lokuqwashisa ngo-23 February 2020.']

sourceString: On 28 February, more than 2,000 confirmed cases were reported in Korea, rising to 3,150 on 29 February.
targetString: Ngo-28 February, izibonelo eziqinisekisiwe ezidlule ku-2,000 zabikwa e-Korea, zakhuphuka zafika ku-3,150 ngo-29 February.
translated: ['Ngomhlaka-28 Febhuwari, kwabikwa izigameko ezingaphezu kuka-2 000 eziqinisekisiwe eKorea, zakhuphukela ku-3 150 ngomhlaka-29 Febhuwari.']

sourceString: All South Korean military bases were quarantined after tests confirmed that three soldiers were positive for the virus.
targetString: Zonke izizinda samasosha e-South Korea ziye zavalwa ngemuva kokuthi ukuhlola kuthole amasosha amathathu enesifo ngokuqinisekisiwe..
translated: ['Zonke izizinda zempi zaseNingizimu Korea zivalelwe ngemuva kokuhlolwa kuqinisekisile ukuthi amasosha amathathu anegciwane.']

sourceString: Airline schedules were also affected and therefore they were changed.South Korea introduced what was considered the largest and best-organized programme in the world to screen the population for the virus, and isolate any infected people as well as tracing and quarantining those who contacted them.
targetString: Amashejuli okundiza nawo athinteka futhi kanjalo ashintshwa. I-South Korea yethule okubhekwe njengohlelo olukhulu futhi oluhlelwe ngobugcweti emhlabeni lokuthi kubhekwe inani labantu ukuthi alinalo yini igciwane, bese kuhlukaniswa noma ubani othelelekile futhi kulandelelwe bese kuvalelwa labo abathintane nabo.
translated: ['Izinhlelo zezindiza nazo zathinteka ngakho-ke zashintshwa. INingizimu Korea yethule uhlelo oluthathwa njengolukhulu futhi oluhlelwe kahle emhlabeni ukuhlola abantu ngaleli gciwane, nokuhlukanisa noma yibaphi abantu abanegciwane kanjalo nokulandelela nokuvalela labo abaxhumana nabo.']

sourceString: Screening methods included mandatory self-reporting of symptoms by new international arrivals through mobile application, drive-thru testing for the virus with the results available the next day, and increasing testing capability to allow up to 20,000 people to be tested every day.
targetString: Izindlela zokubuka zihlanganisa ukuzibika wena okuphoqiwe lapho unezimpawu kulabo abavela emazweni angaphandle ngokusebenzisa ujlelo lukamakhal-ekhukhwini, ukuhlola igciwane ngokudlula ngemoto lapho imiphumela itholakala ngosuku olulandelayo, nokukhuphula ukukwazi ukuhlola okuzovumela abantu abangu-20,000 ukuthi bahlolwe usuku nosuku.
translated: ['Izindlela zokuhlola zazihlanganisa ukuzibika okuphoqelekile kwezimpawu ngokufika okusha kwamazwe ngamazwe ngokusebenzisa isicelo seselula, ukuhlolwa kwe-drive-thru yegciwane ngemiphumela etholakalayo ngosuku olulandelayo, nokwandisa amandla okuhlola ukuvumela abantu abafika ku-20 000 ukuthi bahlolwe nsuku zonke.']

sourceString: South Korea's programme is considered to be a success in controlling the outbreak despite not quarantining entire cities.The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: Uhlelo lwe-South Korea lubhekwa njengempumelelo programme ekulawuleni ubhubhane yize kungavalwa ngokuphelele amadolobha. Umphakathi wase-South Korea wawuhlukene ngombono ekuqaleni lapho Umongameli u-Moon Jae-in esabela kule nkinga.
translated: ['Uhlelo lwaseNingizimu Korea luthathwa njengempumelelo ekulawuleni lesi sifo yize lungavalelani amadolobha wonke. Umphakathi waseNingizimu Korea waqala wahlukaniswa ngokuphendula kukaMongameli uMoon Jae-in kule nkinga.']

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.
targetString: Abantu abaningi baseKorea basayine izincwadi zesicelo sokuba kwenziwe uphenyo ngoMoon ngemva kwezinsolo zokuthi uhulumeni akazange asisingathe kahle isimo lapho kuqubuka igciwane, kanti abanye basayine izincwadi zokumncoma ngezinyathelo azithathile.
translated: ['Abantu abaningi baseKorea basayine izicelo zokuthi kuxoshwe uMoon ngalokho abathi ukungaphathwa kahle kukahulumeni ngalesi sifo, noma ukuncoma impendulo yakhe.']

sourceString: On 23 March, it was reported that South Korea had the lowest one-day case total in four weeks.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-23 Mashi, kwabikwa ukuthi inani lababetheleleke ngaleli gciwane eSouth Korea lalehle ukwedlula zonke ezinye izinsuku amasontweni amane.
translated: ['Ngomhlaka-23 Mashi, kwabikwa ukuthi iNingizimu Korea inesibalo esiphansi kakhulu secala losuku olulodwa emasontweni amane.']

sourceString: On 29 March it was reported that beginning 1 April all new overseas arrivals will be quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-29 Mashi, kwabikwa ukuthi kusukela ngomhla ka-1 Ephreli wonke umuntu owayefika evela kwelinye izwe wayezogcinwa endaweni ehlukanisiwe nabanye abantu ukuze lingasakazeni igciwane kuze kuphela amasonto amabili.
translated: ['Ngomhlaka-29 Mashi kwabikwa ukuthi kusukela ngomhlaka-1 Ephreli bonke abantu abasha abafika phesheya kwezilwandle bazogcinwa amasonto amabili.']

sourceString: Per media reports on 1 April, South Korea has received requests for virus testing assistance from 121 different countries.
targetString: Ngokwemibiko yabezindaba eyakhishwa ngo-1 Ephreli, iSouth Korea yayithole izicelo ezivela emazweni angu-121 ukuba ilekelele ekuhloleni leli gciwane.
translated: ['Ngokwemibiko yabezindaba ngomhlaka-1 Ephreli, iNingizimu Korea ithole izicelo zosizo lokuhlola igciwane ezivela emazweni ahlukene angu-121.']

sourceString: Iran reported its first confirmed cases of SARS-CoV-2 infections on 19 February in Qom, where, according to the Ministry of Health and Medical Education, two people died later that day.
targetString: Umbiko wokuqala wezibalo zababetholakale benegciwane le-SARS-CoV-2 e-Iran wakhishwa ngo-19 Febhuwari eQom, okuyilapho ngokombiko weMinistry of Health and Medical Education, kwashonela khona abantu ababili kamuva ngalolo suku.
translated: ['I-Iran ibike ngezigameko zayo zokuqala eziqinisekisiwe zokutheleleka nge-SARS-CoV-2 ngomhlaka-19 Febhuwari eQom, lapho, ngokusho koMnyango Wezempilo Nezemfundo Yezokwelapha, kwashona abantu ababili ngasekupheleni kwalo lonke lolo suku.']

sourceString: Early measures announced by the government included the cancellation of concerts and other cultural events, sporting events, and Friday prayers, and closures of universities, higher education institutions, and schools.
targetString: Izinyathelo zokuqala ezathathwa uhulumeni kwaba ukumiswa kwamakhonsathi neminye imikhosi yokugubha amasiko endawo, ezemidlalo nemithandazo eyenziwa njalo ngoLwesihlanu, ukuvalwa kwamanyuvesi nezikhungo zemfundo ephakeme kanye nezikole.
translated: ['Izinyathelo zokuqala ezimenyezelwe uhulumeni zihlanganisa ukuchithwa kwamakhonsathi neminye imicimbi yamasiko, imicimbi yezemidlalo, nemithandazo yangoLwesihlanu, nokuvalwa kwamanyuvesi, izikhungo zemfundo ephakeme, nezikole.']

sourceString: Iran allocated five trillion rials to combat the virus.
targetString: I-Iran yakhipha imali engama-trillion ayisihlanu ama-rial ukuze ikwazi ukulwisana naleli gciwane.
translated: ['I-Iran yabela ama-rials ayizigidi ezinhlanu ukulwa naleli gciwane.']

sourceString: President Hassan Rouhani said on 26 February 2020 that there were no plans to quarantine areas affected by the outbreak, and only individuals would be quarantined.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-26 Febhuwari 2020, uMongameli uHassan Rouhani wathi zazingekho izinhleko zokuba izindawo okutholakale kuzo leli gciwane zigcinwe zivaliwe kodwa abantu kuphela ababezohlaliswa ezindaweni ezivikelekile ukuze bangalisakazi igciwane kwabanye.
translated: ['UMongameli Hassan Rouhani uthe ngomhlaka-26 Febhuwari 2020 azikho izinhlelo zokuvalela izindawo ezithintekile ngenxa yokuqubuka kwalesi sifo, kanti abantu kuphela abazovalelwa.']

sourceString: Plans to limit travel between cities were announced in March, although heavy traffic between cities ahead of the Persian New Year Nowruz continued.
targetString: Izinhlelo zokunciphisa ukuhamba kwabantu besuka kwamanye amadolobha beya kwamanye zamenyezelwa ngoMashi, nakuba isiminyaminya sezimoto saqhubeka sikhona ngenxa yokusondela kweholidi lokugujwa konyaka omusha iNowruz.
translated: ['Izinhlelo zokunciphisa ukuhamba phakathi kwamadolobha zamenyezelwa ngoMashi, nakuba ithrafikhi enzima phakathi kwamadolobha ngaphambi koNyaka Omusha wasePheresiya iNowruz yaqhubeka.']

sourceString: Shia shrines in Qom remained open to pilgrims until 16 March 2020.Iran became a centre of the spread of the virus after China during February.
targetString: Amathempeli enkolo yobuShia aseQom aqhubeka evuliwe kwaze kwaba umhla ka-16 Mashi 2020. NgoFebhuwari I-Iran yaba iziko lokubhebhetheka kwaleli gciwane, ilandela iChina.
translated: ['Izindawo ezingcwele zamaShia eQom zahlala zivulelekile kubahambeli kuze kube umhlaka-16 Mashi 2020.I-Iran yaba yisikhungo sokusabalala kwaleli gciwane ngemuva kweChina ngesikhathi sikaFebhuwari.']

sourceString: Amidst claims of a cover-up of the extent of the outbreak in Iran, more than ten countries had traced their cases back to Iran by 28 February, indicating that the extent of the outbreak may be more severe than the 388 cases reported by the Iranian government by that date.
targetString: Izinsolo zokuthi i-Iran iye yanciphisa inani langempela labantu abanalesi sifo ukuze idlulisele isithombe okungesona zenza ukuba amazwe angaphezu kweshumi ayenabantu ababenalesi sifo aphenye ngomsuka waso. Athola ukuthi lesi sifo sase sikhona e-Iran ngoFebhuwari 28, usuku uhulumeni wase-Iran abika ngalo ukuthi babengu-388 kuphela abantu ababenaso, okungase kusho ukuthi inani lalingaphezulu kakhulu kunalokho okwabikwa.
translated: ['Phakathi kwezinsolo zokufihlwa kobukhulu bokuqubuka kwalesi sifo e-Iran, amazwe angaphezu kweshumi ayelandele amacala awo emuva e-Iran ngomhlaka-28 Febhuwari, okubonisa ukuthi ubukhulu bokuqubuka kwalesi sifo bungase bube nzima kakhulu kunamacala angu-388 abikwe uhulumeni wase-Iran ngalolo suku.']

sourceString: The Iranian Parliament was shut down, with 23 of its 290 members reported to have had tested positive for the virus on 3 March.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-3 Mashi, iPhalamende lase-Iran lavalwa ngemva kokuthola ukuthi amalungu alo angu-23 kwangu-290 ayenaleli gciwane.
translated: ['IPhalamende lase-Iran lavalwa, amalungu alo angu-23 kwangu-290 okubikwa ukuthi ahlolwe ukuthi analeli gciwane ngomhlaka-3 Mashi.']

sourceString: On 12 March, the Human Rights Watch urged the Iranian prison authorities to unconditionally release the human rights defenders detained for peaceful dissent, and to also temporarily release all the eligible prisoners.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-12 Mashi, iHuman Rights Watch yanxusa iziphathimandla zamajele ase-Iran ukuba zikhulule ngaphandle kwemibandela labo ababeboshwe bebhikisha ngokuthula belwela amalungelo abantu, nokuba kudedelwe okwesikhashana iziboshwa ezaziziphethe kahle.
translated: ['Ngomhlaka-12 Mashi, i-Human Rights Watch yanxusa iziphathimandla zasejele lase-Iran ukuba zikhulule ngaphandle kwemibandela abalwela amalungelo abantu ababoshiwe ngenxa yokungaboni ngaso linye ngokuthula, futhi baphinde bakhulule okwesikhashana zonke iziboshwa ezifanelekile.']

sourceString: It stated that there is a greater risk of the virus to spread in closed institutions like detention centres, which also lack adequate medical care.
targetString: Le nhlangano yachaza ukuthi ayemaningi amathuba okusakazeka kwegciwane ezindaweni ezivalelekile, njengasemajele esikhashana angenazo nezinto ezanele zokwelapha.
translated: ['Ichaze ukuthi kunengozi enkulu yokuthi leli gciwane lisabalale ezikhungweni ezivaliwe njengezikhungo zokuboshwa, nazo ezingenalo usizo lwezokwelapha olwanele.']

sourceString: On 15 March, the Iranian government reported 100 deaths in a single day, the most recorded in the country since the outbreak began.
targetString: NgoMashi 15, uhulumeni wase-Iran wabika ukuthi babengu-100 abantu ababeshonile ngosuku olulodwa; okwakuyinani elaliphakeme ukuwedlula wonke kusukela leli gciwane lafika.
translated: ['Ngomhlaka-15 Mashi, uhulumeni wase-Iran wabika ukufa kwabantu abangu-100 ngosuku olulodwa, okubhalwe kakhulu ezweni kusukela kuqale ukuqubuka kwalesi sifo.']

sourceString: At least 12 sitting or former Iranian politicians and government officials had died from the disease by 17 March.
targetString: NgoMashi 17 kwase kushone osopolitiki base-Iran neziphathimandla zikahulumeni ezingaphezu kuka-12, okuhlanganisa labo ababesebenza esikhathini esingaphambili nalabo abebesasebenza khona namanje.
translated: ['Okungenani abangu-12 abahlezi noma ababengosopolitiki base-Iran nezikhulu zikahulumeni babeshonile ngenxa yalesi sifo ngomhlaka-17 Mashi.']

sourceString: By 23 March, Iran was experiencing 50 new cases every hour and one new death every ten minutes due to coronavirus.
targetString: NgoMashi 23, base bengu-50 abantu ababethola leli gciwane ngehora kanti njalo ngemva kwemizuzu eyishumi kwakufa umuntu oyedwa ngenxa yegciwane le-corona.
translated: ['Ngo-23 Mashi, i-Iran yayihlangabezana namacala amasha angama-50 njalo ngehora kanye nokufa okukodwa okusha njalo ngemizuzu eyishumi ngenxa ye-coronavirus.']

sourceString: According to a WHO official, there may be five times more cases in Iran than what is being reported.
targetString: Othile osebenzela inhlangano i-WHO, wathi kungenzeka ukuthi amanani angempela ase-Iran aphindwe kasihlanu kunalawo abikwayo.
translated: ['Ngokusho kwesikhulu se-WHO, kungase kube namacala aphindwe kahlanu e-Iran kunalokho okubikwayo.']

sourceString: It is also suggested that U.S. sanctions on Iran may be affecting the country's financial ability to respond to the viral outbreak.
targetString: Waphinde wathi kungenzeka ukuthi izindleko iMelika ezikhokhisa i-Iran zinomthelela endleleni leli zwe elingakwazi ukusingatha ngayo le nkinga ngokwezimali.
translated: ['Kuphakanyiswa nokuthi izigwebo zaseMelika e-Iran zingase zithinta ikhono lezezimali lezwe lokuphendula ukuqubuka kwegciwane.']

sourceString: The UN High Commissioner for Human Rights has demanded economic sanctions to be eased for nations most affected by the pandemic, including Iran.
targetString: I-UN High Commissioner for Human Rights ikhiphe isiqondiso sokuthi kuncishiswe izindleko ezikhokhiswa amazwe alimale kakhulu kwezomnotho ngenxa yaleli gciwane elihlasele emhlabeni wonke, okubalwa kuwo ne-Iran.
translated: ['I-UN High Commissioner for Human Rights ifune ukuthi kukhululwe izigwebo zomnotho emazweni ahlaselwe kakhulu yilolu bhubhane, kuhlanganise ne-Iran.']

sourceString: The outbreak was confirmed to have spread to Italy on 31 January, when two Chinese tourists tested positive for SARS-CoV-2 in Rome.
targetString: NgoJanuwari 31, kwaqinisekiswa ukuthi leli gciwane lase lisakazeke laze lafika nase-Italy ngesikhathi izivakashi ezazivela eChina zitholakala zinegciwane iSARS-CoV-2 eRome.
translated: ['Ukuqubuka kwalesi sifo kuqinisekiswe ukuthi kusabalele e-Italy ngomhlaka-31 Januwari, lapho izivakashi ezimbili zaseChina zihlolwe ukuthi zine-SARS-CoV-2 eRoma.']

sourceString: Cases began to rise sharply, which prompted the Italian government to suspend all flights to and from China and declare a state of emergency.
targetString: Amanani abanaleli gciwane anyuka ngokushesha, okwaholela ekutheni uhulumeni wase-Italy amise wonke amabhanoyi ayeya eChina nalawo ayebuya khona, wabe esekhipha isimemezelo sokuthi izwe lilonke lase lingaphansi kwesimo esibucayi.
translated: ['Amacala aqala ukukhuphuka kakhulu, okwabangela ukuthi uhulumeni wase-Italy amise zonke izindiza eziya nezibuya eChina futhi amemezele isimo esibucayi.']

sourceString: An unassociated cluster of COVID-19 cases was later detected, starting with 16 confirmed cases in Lombardy on 21 February.On 22 February, the Council of Ministers announced a new decree-law to contain the outbreak, including quarantining more than 50,000 people from 11 different municipalities in northern Italy.
targetString: Kamuva endaweni ehlukile kwatholakala elinye iqembu labantu abangu-16 ababenesifo se-COVID-19, imibiko ngabo yaqala ukutholakala ngoFebhuwari 21 eLombardy. NgoFebhuwari 22, i-Council of Ministers yakhipha isimemezelo esingokomthetho sezinyathelo zokuvimba ukuba leli gciwane lingasakazeki, esasihlanganisa nokuhlukaniswa emphakathini kwabantu abangaphezu kuka-50 000 abanaleli gciwane emadolobheni angu-11 asezindaweni ezisenyakatho ye-Italy.
translated: ['Iqoqo elingafakwanga lamacala e-COVID-19 kamuva latholakala, laqala ngamacala angu-16 aqinisekisiwe eLombardy ngomhlaka-21 Febhuwari.Ngomhlaka-22 Febhuwari, uMkhandlu weziNgqongqoshe wamemezela umthetho omusha wokunqanda lesi sifo, kufaka phakathi ukuvalela abantu abangaphezu kuka-50 000 abavela komasipala abahlukene abangu-11 enyakatho ye-Italy.']

sourceString: Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte said, "In the outbreak areas, entry and exit will not be provided.
targetString: UPrime Minister uGiuseppe Conte wathi, "Ngeke kube namuntu ovunyelwa ukungena noma ukuphuma kulezi zindawo ezinamanani amakhulu egciwane.
translated: ['UNdunankulu uGiuseppe Conte uthe, "Ezindaweni zokuqubuka kwalesi sifo, ukungena nokuphuma ngeke kunikezwe.']

sourceString: Suspension of work activities and sports events has already been ordered in those areas."On 4 March, the Italian government ordered the full closure of all schools and universities nationwide as Italy reached 100 deaths.
targetString: Sekumiswe yonke imisebenzi kanye nezemidlalo kulezi zindawo." NgoMashi 4, uhulumeni wase-Italy wamemezela ukuvalwa kwazo zonke izikole namanyuvesi kulo lonke elase-Italy ngemva kokuba inani lababulawe yileli gciwane lifinyelele u-100.
translated: ['Ukumiswa kwemisebenzi yomsebenzi nemicimbi yezemidlalo sekuyalelwe kulezo zindawo." Ngo-4 Mashi, uhulumeni wase-Italy wayala ukuvalwa ngokugcwele kwazo zonke izikole namanyuvesi ezweni lonke njengoba i-Italy yafinyelela ekufeni kwe-100.']

sourceString: All major sporting events, including Serie A football matches, were to be held behind closed doors until April, but on 9 March, all sport was suspended completely for at least one month.
targetString: Yonke imidlalo emikhulu, kuhlanganise nemidlalo yeSerie A, yayizoqhubeka kodwa ngaphandle kwezihlwele kuze kube inyanga ka-Ephreli, kodwa ngomhla ka-9 Mashi yavele yamiswa ngokuphelele yonke imidlalo isikhathi esingangenyanga.
translated: ['Yonke imicimbi emikhulu yezemidlalo, kufaka phakathi imidlalo yebhola leSerie A, kwakufanele ibanjwe ngemuva kweminyango evaliwe kuze kube ngu-Ephreli, kodwa ngo-9 Mashi, yonke imidlalo yamiswa ngokuphelele okungenani inyanga eyodwa.']

sourceString: On 11 March, Prime Minister Conte ordered stoppage of nearly all commercial activity except supermarkets and pharmacies.On 6 March, the Italian College of Anaesthesia, Analgesia, Resuscitation and Intensive Care (SIAARTI) published medical ethics recommendations regarding triage protocols that might be employed.
targetString: NgoMashi 11, uPrime Minister uConte wakhipha isiqondiso sokuba kumiswe cishe zonke ezamabhizinisi ngaphandle kwezitolo zokudla nalezo ezidayisa imithi yokwelapha. Ngomhla ka-6 Mashi ikolishi lase-Italy okuthiwa i-Italian College of Anaesthesia, Analgesia, Resuscitation and Intensive Care (i-SIAARTI) lakhulula imithetho yokuziphatha kwezisebenzi zezokwelapha eyayizosiza ekuqondiseni izindlela ezazingasetshenziswa lapho kucwaningwa ngalesi sifo.
translated: ['Ngomhlaka-11 Mashi, uNdunankulu uConte wayala ukuba kumiswe cishe wonke umsebenzi wezohwebo ngaphandle kwezitolo ezinkulu namakhemisi. Ngo-6 Mashi, i-Italian College of Anaesthesia, i-Analgesia, i-Resuscitation and Intensive Care (SIAARTI) yashicilela izincomo zokuziphatha kwezokwelapha mayelana nemigomo yokuhlola engase iqashwe.']

sourceString: On 19 March, Italy overtook China as the country with the most coronavirus-related deaths in the world after reporting 3,405 fatalities from the pandemic.
targetString: NgoMashi 19, ngemva kokukhipha inani labantu abangu-3,405 ababebulawe yisifo secorona, i-Italy yadlula iChina okwakuyiyona eyayinamanani edlula wonke amanye amazwe emhlabeni.
translated: ['Ngomhlaka-19 Mashi, i-Italy yadlula eChina njengezwe elinabantu abaningi abashonile abahlobene ne-coronavirus emhlabeni ngemuva kokubika abantu abangu-3 405 abashonile ngenxa yalolu bhubhane.']

sourceString: On 22 March, it was reported that Russia had sent nine military planes with medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: NgoMashi 22, kwabikwa ukuthi i-Russia yayithumele amabhanoyi ezempi ayisishiyagalolunye ukuba ahambise izinto zokwelapha e-Italy.
translated: ['Ngo-22 Mashi, kwabikwa ukuthi iRussia ithumele izindiza zempi eziyisishiyagalolunye ezinemishini yezokwelapha e-Italy.']

sourceString: As of 5 April, there were 128,948 confirmed cases, 15,887 deaths, and 21,815 recoveries in Italy, with the majority of those cases occurring in the Lombardy region.
targetString: Kusukela ngomhla ka-5 Ephreli, e-Italy kwase kunabantu abangu-128 948 abanesifo secorona, bengu-15 887 asebebulawe yiso nabangu- 21 815 ababeluleme kuso. Iningi lala manani lalivela endaweni yaseLombardy.
translated: ['Kusukela ngomhlaka-5 Ephreli, kwakukhona amacala angu-128 948 aqinisekisiwe, kwashona abangu-15 887, kwabuyiswa abangu-21 815 e-Italy, iningi lalezo zigameko zenzeka esifundeni saseLombardy.']

sourceString: A CNN report indicated that the combination of Italy's large elderly population and inability to test all who have the virus to date may be contributing to the high fatality rate.
targetString: Umbiko we-CNN ubonise ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi imbangela yokwenyuka kwenani labantu ababulawa yileli gciwane e-Italy inani eliphakeme labantu abakhulile ngeminyaka nokuntuleka kwezindlela zokuhlolwa kwalabo abanaleli gciwane.
translated: ['Umbiko we-CNN ukhombise ukuthi inhlanganisela yabantu abaningi asebekhulile base-Italy kanye nokungakwazi ukuhlola bonke abanaleli gciwane kuze kube manje kungase kube nomthelela kwizinga eliphezulu lokufa.']

sourceString: The United Kingdom's response to the virus first emerged as one of the most relaxed of the affected countries, and until 18 March 2020, the British government did not impose any form of social distancing or mass quarantine measures on its citizens.
targetString: Indlela izwe lase-UK elisabele ngayo lapho kuvela lesi sifo okokuqala ibonise ukungasukumeli phezulu uma iqhathaniswa nakwamanye amazwe athintekile, futhi kwaze kwaba umhla ka-18 Mashi 2020, uhulumeni waseBrithani ungazenzile izinhlelo zokuba abantu banciphise amazinga okusondelana noma zokuba labo abanegciwane bahlukaniswe emphakathini ukuze isifo singasakazeki.
translated: ['Ukuphendula kwe-United Kingdom kuleli gciwane kwaqala ukuvela njengenye yamazwe akhululekile kakhulu kulabo abathintekayo, futhi kuze kube ngu-18 Mashi 2020, uhulumeni waseBrithani akazange abeke noma yiluphi uhlobo lokuhlukanisa umphakathi noma izinyathelo zokuhlala ngobuningi kwizakhamuzi zakhe.']

sourceString: As a result, the government received criticism for the perceived lack of pace and intensity in its response to concerns faced by the public.On 16 March, Prime Minister Boris Johnson made an announcement advising against all non-essential travel and social contact, suggesting people work from home where possible and avoid venues such as pubs, restaurants, and theatres.
targetString: Ngenxa yalokho, abantu bawugxekile uhulumeni ngokungayithatheli phezulu le ndaba nangendlela osabele ngayo lapho umphakathi uzwakalisa ukukhathazeka. NgoMashi 16, uPrime Minister uBoris Johnson wenza isimemezelo ngokuphathelene nokuhamba ngokungadingekile nokuthintana kwabantu, wanxusa ukuba abantu basebenzele emakhaya uma kungenzeka futhi bagweme izindawo ezinjengezindawo zokuphuza, ezokudla nezemidlalo yasemashashalazini namabhayisikobho.
translated: ['Ngenxa yalokho, uhulumeni wathola ukugxekwa ngokubonakala kokuntuleka kwejubane nokuqina ekuphenduleni kwayo ukukhathazeka okubhekene nomphakathi. Ngomhlaka-16 Mashi, uNdunankulu uBoris Johnson wenza isimemezelo eseluleka ngakho konke ukuhamba okungabalulekile nokuxhumana nomphakathi, okusikisela ukuthi abantu basebenze emakhaya lapho kungenzeka khona futhi bagweme izindawo ezifana nezindawo zokudlela, izindawo zokudlela, nezindawo zemidlalo yaseshashalazini.']

sourceString: On 20 March, the government announced that all leisure establishments such as pubs and gyms were to close as soon as possible, and promised to pay up to 80% of workers' wages to a limit of £2,500 per month to prevent unemployment in the crisis.On 23 March, the Prime Minister announced tougher social distancing measures, banning gatherings of more than two people and restricting travel and outdoor activity to that deemed strictly necessary.
targetString: NgoMashi 20, uhulumeni wamemezela ukuthi izindawo zikaqedisizungu ezinjengezindawo zokuphuza nezokujima zazizovalwa ngokushesha, wathembisa ukukhokhela izisebenzi ingxenye yomholo engaba ngu-80% kodwa engeke ibe ngaphezu kuka-2 500 ngenyanga ukuze kugwenywe ukulahleka kwemisebenzi ngale nkathi. NgoMashi 23, uPrime Minister wamemezela ukuthi kwakuzobekwa imithetho eqinile ngokuphathelene nokusondelana kwabantu, wavala ngokuphelele ukuhlangana kwabantu abangaphezu kwababili, wanciphisa izinga lokuhamba kwabantu nokuba ngaphandle ngokungadingekile.
translated: ['Ngo-20 Mashi, uhulumeni wamemezela ukuthi zonke izikhungo zokuzilibazisa ezifana nezindawo zokudlela nezindawo zokuzivocavoca kwakufanele zivale ngokushesha, futhi wathembisa ukukhokha kuze kufike ku-80% wamaholo abasebenzi kuze kube umkhawulo we-£ 2,500 ngenyanga ukuvimbela ukungasebenzi kule nkinga. Ngomhlaka-23 Mashi, uNdunankulu wamemezela izinyathelo ezinzima zokuhlukanisa umphakathi, ukuvimbela ukuhlangana kwabantu abangaphezu kwababili nokuvimbela ukuhamba kanye nomsebenzi wangaphandle kulokho okubonwa kudingekile ngokuqinile.']

sourceString: Unlike previous measures, these restrictions were enforceable by police through the issuing of fines and the dispersal of gatherings.
targetString: Ngokungafani nezinyathelo zangaphambili, kulokhu kwabekwa amaphoyisa ayezoqikelela ukuthi abantu bayazilandela iziqondiso futhi ehlawulisa labo abangazilaleli, ayehlakaza namaqembu.
translated: ['Ngokungafani nezinyathelo zangaphambilini, lezi zivimbelo zaziphoqelelwa ngamaphoyisa ngokukhishwa kwezinhlawulo kanye nokuhlakazeka kwemibuthano.']

sourceString: Most businesses were ordered to close, with exceptions for businesses deemed "essential", including supermarkets, pharmacies, banks, hardware shops, petrol stations, and garages.
targetString: Amabhizinisi amaningi athola isiqondiso sokuba avalwe, ngaphandle kwalawo ayesebenza ngezinto "eziyisidingo" njengezitolo ezidayisa ukudla, izitolo ezidayisa imithi yokwelapha, amabhange, izitolo ezidayisa amathuluzi, amagaraji kaphethiloli nalawo akhanda izimoto.
translated: ['Amabhizinisi amaningi ayalelwa ukuba avale, ngaphandle kwamabhizinisi athathwa ngokuthi "abalulekile", kufaka phakathi izitolo ezinkulu, amakhemisi, amabhange, izitolo ze-hardware, iziteshi zikaphethroli, namagaraji.']

sourceString: On 20 January, the first known case of COVID-19 was confirmed in the Pacific Northwest state of Washington in a man who had returned from Wuhan on 15 January.
targetString: NgoJanuwari 20, kwakhishwa umbiko wokuqala wesifo se-COVID-19 endaweni esePacific Northwest eWashington, esasitholakale kowesilisa owayekade ebuye ngoJanuwari 15 evela eWuhan.
translated: ['Ngo-20 Januwari, isigameko sokuqala esaziwayo se-COVID-19 saqinisekiswa esifundazweni sasePacific Northwest eWashington endodeni eyayibuye eWuhan ngomhlaka-15 Januwari.']

sourceString: The White House Coronavirus Task Force was established on 29 January.
targetString: NgoJanuwari 29, kwamiswa ithimba okuthiwa iWhite House Coronavirus Task Force.
translated: ['I-White House Coronavirus Task Force yasungulwa ngo-29 Januwari.']

sourceString: On 31 January, the Trump administration declared a public health emergency, and placed restrictions on entry for travellers from China.
targetString: NgoJanuwari 31, ihhovisi likaTrump lamemezela isimo esiphuthumayo kwezokwelapha zomphakathi, labe selibeka imingcele eyayizolawula ukungena kwabantu abavela eChina.
translated: ['Ngo-31 Januwari, ukuphathwa kukaTrump kwamemezela isimo esiphuthumayo sezempilo yomphakathi, futhi kwabeka imikhawulo yokungena kwabahambi abavela eChina.']

sourceString: On 28 January 2020, the Center for Disease Control—the leading public health institute of the U.S. government—announced they had developed their own testing kit.
targetString: NgoJanuwari 28 2020, isikhungo sikahulumeni waseMelika esihamba phambili kwezokwelapha, i-Center for Disease Control, sakhipha isimemezelo sokuthi sase sizenzele ithuluzi lokuhlola leli gciwane.
translated: ['Ngo-28 January 2020, iCentre for Disease Control—isikhungo sezempilo somphakathi esihamba phambili sikahulumeni wase-Us—yamemezela ukuthi bahlakulele ikhithi yabo yokuhlola.']

sourceString: Despite doing so, the United States had a slow start in testing, which obscured the true extent of the outbreak at the time.
targetString: Naphezu kwalezi zinyathelo, iMelika yephuza ukuqalisa izinhlelo zokuhlola ukuthi babebangaki abase benalo leli gciwane okwenza langasheshe lacaca izinga lesi sifo esase sisakazeke ngalo.
translated: ['Naphezu kokwenza kanjalo, i-United States yaba nesiqalo esincane ekuhlolweni, okwakufihla ubukhulu beqiniso bokuqubuka ngaleso sikhathi.']

sourceString: Testing was marred by defective test kits produced by the federal government in February, a lack of federal government approval for non-government test kits (by academia, companies and hospitals) until the end of February, and restrictive criteria for people to qualify for a test until early March (a doctor's order was required thereafter).
targetString: Ukuhlola izinga lokusakazeka kwalesi sifo kwaphazanyiswa nawungabi namathuluzi okuhlola asebenza kahle njengoba lawo ayethunyelwe ihhovisi likahulumeni ngoFebhuwari ayefile, ukungayitholi imvume kahulumeni yokusebenzisa amathuluzi okuhlola ayevela ezinhlanganweni ezizimele (njengezikhungo zokucwaninga nezemfundo, izinkampani nezibhedlela) kwaze kwaphela inyanga kaFebhuwari kanye nayimibandela yokuhlolwa kwabantu kwaze kwaba sekuqaleni kukaMashi (ngemva kwalokho kwakudingeka incwadi kadokotela).
translated: ['Ukuhlolwa kwaphazanyiswa amakhithi okuhlola angenasici akhiqizwa uhulumeni wezwe ngoFebhuwari, ukungabikho kwemvume kahulumeni we-federal yamakhithi okuhlola angekho ngaphansi kukahulumeni (yizifundiswa, izinkampani nezibhedlela) kuze kube sekupheleni kukaFebhuwari, kanye nemigomo yokuvimbela abantu ukuba bafaneleke ukuhlolwa kuze kube ekuqaleni kukaMashi (umyalelo kadokotela wawudingeka ngemuva kwalokho).']

sourceString: By 27 February, The Washington Post reported fewer than 4,000 tests had been conducted in the United States.
targetString: NgoFebhuwari 27, iphephandaba i-The Washington Post, labika ukuthi babengaphansana kuka-4 000 abantu abase behlolelwe leli gciwane eMelika.
translated: ['Ngomhlaka-27 Febhuwari, iThe Washington Post ibike ukuthi sekwenzeke izivivinyo ezingaphansi kuka-4 000 e-United States.']

sourceString: By 13 March, The Atlantic reported that less than 14,000 tests had been conducted.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-13 Mashi, iphephandaba i-The Atlantic labika ukuthi babengaphansi kuka-14 000 abantu abase behlolelwe leli gciwane.
translated: ['Ngomhlaka-13 Mashi, iThe Atlantic yabika ukuthi sekwenzeke izivivinyo ezingaphansi kuka-14 000.']

sourceString: On 22 March, the Associated Press reported: "Many people who have symptoms and a doctor's order have waited hours or days for a test."After the first death in the United States was reported in Washington state on 29 February, Governor Jay Inslee declared a state of emergency, an action that was soon followed by other states.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-22 Mashi iphephandaba i-Associated Press labika: "Abantu abaningi ababonisa izimpawu nabanezincwadi zikadokotela balinde amahora abanye izinsuku ukuze bahlolwe." Ngemva kombiko wokufa komuntu wokuqala eWashington ngoFebhuwari 29, uGovernor uJay Inslee wamemezela isimo esiphuthumayo, isinyathelo esalandelwa nakwezinye izingxenye zaseMelika.
translated: ['Ngomhlaka-22 Mashi, i-Associated Press yabika: "Abantu abaningi abanezimpawu nomyalelo kadokotela balinde amahora noma izinsuku ukuze bahlolwe." Ngemuva kokushona kokuqala e-United States kwabikwa esifundazweni saseWashington ngomhlaka-29 Febhuwari, uMbusi uJay Inslee wamemezela isimo esibucayi, isenzo esalandelwa ngokushesha ezinye izifundazwe.']

sourceString: Schools in the Seattle area cancelled classes on 3 March, and by mid-March, schools across the country were shutting down.On 6 March 2020, the United States was advised of projections for the impact of the new coronavirus on the country by a group of epidemiologists at Imperial College London.
targetString: NgoMashi 3, izikole ezisendaweni yaseSeattle zavalwa, kwathi maphakathi noMashi nezinye izikole ezweni lonke zaqala ukuvala. NgoMashi 6, 2020 iqembu elicwaninga ngezifo nendlela ezisakazeka ngayo lase-Imperial College London, laxwayisa izwe laseMelika ngezinga leli gciwane elisha le-corona alalisazosabalala ngalo.
translated: ['Izikole endaweni yaseSeattle zachitha amakilasi ngomhlaka-3 Mashi, futhi maphakathi no-Mashi, izikole ezweni lonke zazivala. Ngo-6 Mashi 2020, i-United States yelulekwa ngezibikezelo zomthelela we-coronavirus entsha ezweni yiqembu lezazi zezifo e-Imperial College London.']

sourceString: On the same day President Trump signed the Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, which provided $8.3 billion in emergency funding for federal agencies to respond to the outbreak.
targetString: Ngalolo suku, uMongameli uTrump wasayina isivumelwano somthetho esibizwa ngokuthi iCoronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, esasizokhipha imali engamadola angu-8.3 billion eyayizosiza izikhungu zikahulumeni ekubhekaneni nezindleko eziphuthumayo sokulwisana nalesi sifo.
translated: ['Ngosuku olufanayo uMongameli uTrump wasayina umthetho we-Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, owanikeza u- $ 8.3 billion wemali ephuthumayo yezinhlangano zikahulumeni ukuphendula kulesi sifo.']

sourceString: Corporations imposed employee travel restrictions, cancelled conferences, and encouraged employees to work from home.
targetString: Izinkampani zabekela izisebenzi zazo imingcele ngokuphathelene nokuhamba, zamisa imihlangano emikhulu ebihleliwe, zakhuthaza izisebenzi ukuba zisebenzele emakhaya.
translated: ['Izinkampani zabeka imikhawulo yokuhamba kwabasebenzi, zachitha izingqungquthela, futhi zakhuthaza abasebenzi ukuba basebenze emakhaya.']

sourceString: Sports events and seasons were cancelled.On 11 March, Trump announced travel restrictions for most of Europe, excluding the United Kingdom, for 30 days, effective 13 March.
targetString: Izinhlelo zemidlalo emikhulu zamiswa. NgoMashi 11, uTrump wakhipha isimemezelo sokuthi ukuya emazweni amaningi aseYurophu kwakuzomiswa izinsuku ezingu-30 kusukela noMashi 13, ngaphandle kokuya e-UK.
translated: ['Imicimbi yezemidlalo kanye nezinkathi zonyaka zachithwa. Ngo-11 Mashi, uTrump wamemezela imikhawulo yokuhamba iningi laseYurophu, ngaphandle kwe-United Kingdom, izinsuku ezingama-30, kusukela ngo-13 Mashi.']

sourceString: The following day, he expanded the restrictions to include the United Kingdom and Ireland.
targetString: Ngosuku olulandelayo waqinisa le mingcele ngokuyifaka i-UK ne-Ireland ohlwini lwamazwe okwakungeke kusayiwa kuwo.
translated: ['Ngosuku olulandelayo, wandisa imikhawulo ukuze ifake i-United Kingdom ne-Ireland.']

sourceString: On 13 March, he declared a national emergency, which made federal funds available to respond to the crisis.
targetString: NgoMashi 13, wamemezela isimo esiphuthumayo okwaholela ekukhululweni kwezimali zikahulumeni ezazizosiza ekubhekaneni nalesi simo esibucayi.
translated: ['Ngo-13 Mashi, wamemezela isimo esiphuthumayo sikazwelonke, okwenza izimali zikahulumeni zatholakala ukuphendula kule nkinga.']

sourceString: Beginning on 15 March, many businesses closed or reduced hours throughout the U.S. to try to reduce the spread of the virus.
targetString: Kusukela ngoMashi 15, amabhizinisi amaningi avalwa amanye anciphisa amahora okusebenza kulo lonke elaseMelika ukuze kunqandwe ukusakazeka kwegciwane.
translated: ['Kusukela ngomhlaka-15 Mashi, amabhizinisi amaningi avala noma anciphisa amahora kulo lonke elase-US ukuzama ukunciphisa ukusabalala kwaleli gciwane.']

sourceString: By 17 March, the epidemic had been confirmed in all 50 states and in the District of Columbia.On 23 March, it was reported that New York City had 10,700 cases of the coronavirus, more than the total number of cases in South Korea.
targetString: NgoMashi 17, lesi sifo sase sibikwe kuzo zonke izingxenye ezingu-50 zezwe laseMelika kuhlanganise naseColumbia. NgoMashi 23, kwabikwsa ukuthi idolobha laseNew York lalinabantu abangu-10 700 abanegciwane le-corona, okuyinani elingaphezu kwenani labanegciwane sebebonke eSouth Korea.
translated: ['Ngomhlaka-17 Mashi, lolu bhubhane lwase luqinisekisiwe kuzo zonke izifundazwe ezingama-50 naseDistrict of Columbia.Ngomhlaka-23 Mashi, kwabikwa ukuthi iNew York City inezigameko ezingu-10 700 ze-coronavirus, ngaphezu kwenani eliphelele lamacala eNingizimu Korea.']

sourceString: On 25 March, the governor said that social distancing seemed to be working, as estimates of case doubling slowed from 2.0 days to 4.7 days.
targetString: NgoMashi 25, undunankulu wathi ukugwema ukusondelana kwabantu kwakubonakala kusebenza, ngoba ukulinganisa kokuphindeka kabili kwezibonelo kuye kwanensa ekusukeni ezinsukwini ezingu-2.0 kuye ezinsukwini ezingu-4.7.
translated: ['Ngomhlaka-25 Mashi, umbusi wathi ukuhlukanisa umphakathi kubonakala kusebenza, njengoba izilinganiso zokuphinda kabili kwamacala zehlile kusuka ezinsukwini ezingu-2.0 kuya ezinsukwini ezingu-4.7.']

sourceString: As of 28 March, there were 32,308 confirmed cases in New York City, and 672 people had died from the virus.On 26 March, the United States was reported to have more confirmed coronavirus infection cases than any other country in the world, including China and Italy.As of 8 April, 400,335 cases have been confirmed in the United States, and 12,841 people have died.
targetString: Kusukela ngoMashi 28, base bengu-32,308 abantu abanegciwane edolobheni laseNew York, bengu-672 abase bebulawe yileli gciwane. NgoMashi 26, kwabikwa ukuthi inani labanesifo se-corona eMelika lase liwedlula amanani akwamanye amazwe emhlabeni wonke, okuhlanganisa iChina ne-Italy. Kusukela ngo-Ephreli 8, sekubikwe izibonelo ezingu-400,335 e-United States, kanti sekufe abangu-12,841.
translated: ['Kusukela ngomhlaka-28 Mashi, bangu-32 308 abantu abaqinisekisiwe eNew York City, kanti bangu-672 abantu asebeshonile ngenxa yaleli gciwane. Ngomhlaka-26 Mashi, i-United States yabikwa inezigameko eziningi eziqinisekisiwe zokutheleleka nge-coronavirus kunanoma yiliphi elinye izwe emhlabeni, kufaka phakathi iChina ne-Italy.As ngomhlaka-8 Ephreli, sekuqinisekiswe izigameko ezingu-400 335 e-United States, kanti kushone abantu abangu-12 841.']

sourceString: Per media reports on 30 March, U.S. President Trump has decided to extend social distancing guidelines until 30 April.
targetString: Ngombiko okhishwe abezindaba ngomhla ka-30 Mashi, uMongameli waseMelika uTrump unqume ukunweba isikhathi ebesibekiwe ukuze kusiqinisekiswe ukungasondelani kwabantu kuze kube u-Ephreli 30.
translated: ['Ngokwemibiko yabezindaba ngomhlaka-30 Mashi, uMengameli waseMelika uTrump unqume ukunweba imihlahlandlela yokuhlukanisa abantu kuze kube umhlaka-30 Ephreli.']

sourceString: On the same day, the USNS Comfort, a hospital ship with about 1000 beds, made anchor in New York.
targetString: Ngololo suku, umkhumbi oyisibhedlela onemibhede engaba ngu-1 000, i-USNS Comfort, wafika eNew York.
translated: ['Ngosuku olufanayo, i-USNS Comfort, umkhumbi wesibhedlela onemibhede engaba ngu-1000, wenza i-anchor eNew York.']

sourceString: On 3 April, the U.S. had a record 884 deaths due to the coronavirus in a 24-hour period.
targetString: Ngo-Ephreli 3, i-U.S. ibe nesibalo esingu-884 sabafile ngenxa ye-coronavirus enkathini yamahora angu-24.
translated: ['Ngomhlaka-3 Ephreli, i-US yaba nerekhodi lokufa kwabantu abangu-884 ngenxa ye-coronavirus esikhathini samahora angu-24.']

sourceString: In the state of New York the cases have exceeded 100,000 people on 3 April.The White House has been criticized for downplaying the threat and controlling the messaging by directing health officials and scientists to coordinate public statements and publications related to the virus with the office of Vice-President Mike Pence.
targetString: E-New York, inani labantu abanegciwane lase ledlulile ku-100 000 ngo-Ephreli 3. IPhalamende iWhite House igxekiwe ngokulithatha kancane leli gciwane nangokuthonya imibiko ekhishwa abezomnyango wezempilo nososayensi ngokukhipha isiqondiso sokuba iziphathimandla zezempilo zibambisane noSekela-Mongameli uMike Pence ekukhipheni imibiko eya emphakathini ngokuphathelene naleli gciwane.
translated: ['Esifundazweni saseNew York amacala adlule kubantu abangu-100 000 ngomhlaka-3 Ephreli.I-White House igxekwe ngokubukela phansi ingozi nokulawula imiyalezo ngokuqondisa izikhulu zezempilo kanye nososayensi ukuba bahlanganise izitatimende zomphakathi kanye nezincwadi ezihlobene naleli gciwane nehhovisi lePhini likaMengameli uMike Pence.']

sourceString: Overall approval of Trump's management of the crisis has been polarized along partisan lines.
targetString: Ukwamukelwa kwethimba elimiswe uTrump ukuba lihole kulesi simo esibucayi kubonakala kunokuchema futhi kusekelwa abalandeli beqembu lakhe.
translated: ['Ukuvunyelwa jikelele kokuphathwa kukaTrump kwenkinga kuye kwahlukaniswa emigqeni yeqembu.']

sourceString: Some U.S. officials and commentators criticized the U.S. reliance on importation of critical materials, including essential medical supplies, from China.
targetString: Ezinye iziphathimandla zaseMelika nabezindaba ziyigxekile iMelika ngokuncika kakhulu kwezohwebo nezwe laseChina ukuze ithole izinto eziyisidingo ezihlanganisa nezinto ezidingekayo kwezokwelapha.
translated: ['Ezinye izikhulu zaseMelika kanye nabahlaziyi bagxeka ukuthembela kwe-US ekungeniseni izinto ezibucayi, kufaka phakathi izinto zokwelapha ezibalulekile, ezivela eChina.']

sourceString: An analysis of air travel patterns was used to map and predict patterns of spread and was published in The Journal of Travel Medicine in mid-January 2020.
targetString: Ucwaningo lenqubo yokuhamba komoya lasebenziswa ukuze kuhlelwe futhi kuqagelwe inqubo yokusakazeka lase lunyatheliswa nge-The Journal of Travel Medicine maphakathi noJanuwari 2020.
translated: ['Ukuhlaziywa kwamaphethini okuhamba ngezindiza kwasetshenziselwa ukuhlola nokubikezela amaphethini okusabalala futhi kwanyatheliswa ku-The Journal of Travel Medicine maphakathi noJanuwari 2020.']

sourceString: Based on 2018 information from the International Air Transport Association, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo, and Taipei had the largest volume of travellers from Wuhan.
targetString: Ngokwalokho okwakukhishwe ngo-2018 yiqembu le-International Air Transport Association, iBangakok, iHong Kong, iTokyo neTapei kwakungamazwe anezivakashi eziningi ezivela eWuhan.
translated: ['Ngokusekelwe olwazini lwe-2018 oluvela ku-International Air Transport Association, eBangkok, eHong Kong, eTokyo, naseTaipei kwakunomthamo omkhulu wabahambi abavela eWuhan.']

sourceString: Dubai, Sydney, and Melbourne were also reported as popular destinations for people travelling from Wuhan.
targetString: IDubai, iSydney neMelborne nawo ayizindawo ezithandwa kakhulu abantu abavela eWuhan.
translated: ['I-Dubai, iSydney, neMelbourne nazo zabikwa njengezindawo ezithandwayo zabantu abahamba besuka eWuhan.']

sourceString: Bali was reported as least able among the 20 most popular destination cities in terms of preparedness, while cities in Australia were considered most able.Australia released its Emergency Response Plan for Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) on 7 February.
targetString: Phakathi kwezindawo ezingu-20 ezithandwa kakhulu yizivakashi zakwamanye amazwe, kwabikwa ukuthi iBali yayingakulungele kunazo zonke ukubhekana naleli gciwane, amadolobha ase-Australia ayehamba phambili phakathi kwezindawo ezikulungele kangcono. I-Australia yakhipha izinhlelo zayo zokubhekana naleli gciwane embikweni wayo i-Emergency Response Plan for Novel Coronavirus(COVID-19) ngoFebhuwari 7.
translated: ['I-Bali yabikwa njengengakwazi kangako phakathi kwamadolobha athandwa kakhulu we-20 ngokuya ngokulungiselela, kanti amadolobha ase-Australia ayebhekwa njengamandla kakhulu. I-Australia ikhiphe uhlelo lwayo lwe-Emergency Response Plan for Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) ngomhlaka-7 Febhuwari.']

sourceString: It stated that much was yet to be discovered about COVID-19, and that Australia would emphasize border control and communication in its response to the pandemic.
targetString: Yabonisa ukuthi kwakukuningi okwakungakaziwa nge-COVID-19, nokuthi enye yezindlela zokubhekana nalesi sifo kwakuwukuqinisa ekuqapheni imingcele yezwe nangokungagodli lutho okumelwe kwaziswe abantu.
translated: ['Ichaze ukuthi kuningi okungakatholakala nge-COVID-19, nokuthi i-Australia izogcizelela ukulawulwa kwemingcele nokuxhumana ekuphenduleni kwayo lolu bhubhane.']

sourceString: On 21 March, a human biosecurity emergency was declared in Australia.
targetString: NgoMashi 21, i-Australia yakhipha isimemezelo esiphuthumayo sesifo esibulalayo.
translated: ['Ngo-21 Mashi, kwamenyezelwa isimo esiphuthumayo se-biosecurity yomuntu e-Australia.']

sourceString: Owing to the effective quarantine of public transport in Wuhan and Hubei, several countries have planned to evacuate their citizens and diplomatic staff from the area, primarily through chartered flights of the home nation, with Chinese authorities providing clearance.
targetString: Ngemva kokusebenza kwesinyathelo sokuvalwa kwezinto zokuthutha umphakathi eWuhan naseHubei, amazwe amaningi ahlele ukukhipha izakhamuzi zawo nabameleli bamazwe abo kulezi zindawo esebenzisa izindiza eziqashiwe zasemazweni awo ngemvume yeziphathimandla zaseChina.
translated: ['Ngenxa yokuhlala ngempumelelo kwezithuthi zomphakathi eWuhan naseHubei, amazwe amaningana ahlele ukukhipha izakhamuzi zawo kanye nabasebenzi bezobudlelwane kule ndawo, ngokuyinhloko ngokusebenzisa izindiza eziqashiwe zezwe lasekhaya, iziphathimandla zaseChina zinikeza imvume.']

sourceString: Canada, the United States, Japan, India, Sri Lanka, Australia, France, Argentina, Germany, and Thailand were among the first to plan the evacuation of their citizens.
targetString: Amazwe okuqala alanda izisebenzi zawo kwakuyiCanada, iMelika, iJapan, i-India, iSri Lanka, i-Australia, iFrance, i-Argentina, iGermany neThailand.
translated: ['ICanada, i-United States, iJapan, i-India, iSri Lanka, i-Australia, iFrance, i-Argentina, iJalimane neThailand zaziphakathi kwabokuqala ukuhlela ukukhishwa kwezakhamuzi zabo.']

sourceString: Pakistan has said that it will not be evacuating any citizens from China.
targetString: IPakistan ithe ngeke ibuyise muntu oseChina.
translated: ['IPakistan ithe ngeke ikhiphe noma yiziphi izakhamuzi eChina.']

sourceString: On 7 February, Brazil evacuated 34 Brazilians or family members in addition to four Poles, a Chinese person, and an Indian citizen.
targetString: NgoFebhuwari 7, iBrazil yathutha ngokushesha amalungu omndeni waseBrazil angu-34, ngaphezu kwalabo abane basePoland, oyedwa waseChina nomunye wase-India.
translated: ['Ngo-7 Februwari, iBrazil yakhipha abantu baseBrazil abangu-34 noma amalungu omndeni ngaphezu kwamaPoland amane, umuntu waseChina, nesakhamuzi saseNdiya.']

sourceString: The citizens of Poland, China, and India deplaned in Poland, where the Brazilian plane made a stopover before following its route to Brazil.
targetString: Lezi zakhamuzi zasePoland, eChina nase-India zazehle ePoland okuyilapho le ndiza yaseBrazil ayayizoma khona isikhashana ngaphambi kokuqhubeka nomzila wayo oya eBrazil.
translated: ['Izakhamuzi zasePoland, eChina, naseNdiya zakhipha indiza ePoland, lapho indiza yaseBrazil yenza khona indawo yokumisa ngaphambi kokulandela umzila wayo oya eBrazil.']

sourceString: Brazilian citizens who went to Wuhan were quarantined at a military base near Brasília.
targetString: Izakhamuzi zaseBrazil ezazikade ziseWuhan zazihlaliswe endaweni yamasosha eseduze kwaseBrasilia njengesinyathelo sokuvimbela ukusabalala kwegciwane.
translated: ['Izakhamuzi zaseBrazil ezaya eWuhan zagcinwa endaweni yezempi ngaseBrasília.']

sourceString: On the same day, 215 Canadians (176 from the first plane, and 39 from a second plane chartered by the U.S. government) were evacuated from Wuhan to CFB Trenton to be quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: Ngalolo suku kwalandwa izakhamuzi zaseCanada ezingu-215 eWuhan (ezingu-176 zazisendizeni yokuqala, ezingu-39 zisendizeni yesibili eyayiqashwe uhulumeni waseMelika) zayiswa e-CFB Trenton ukuze zihlale lapho amasonto amabili ukuze kuvinjwe ukusabalala kwegciwane.
translated: ['Ngosuku olufanayo, abantu baseCanada abangu-215 (176 abavela endizeni yokuqala, kanye no-39 abavela endizeni yesibili eqashwe nguhulumeni wase-US) bakhishwa eWuhan baya eCFB Trenton ukuze bavalelwe amasonto amabili.']

sourceString: On 11 February, another plane of 185 Canadians from Wuhan landed at CFB Trenton.
targetString: Ngo-11 February, elinye ibhanoyi elinabantu abangu-185 base-Canada elivela e-Wuhan lafika e-CFB Trenton.
translated: ['Ngo-11 Februwari, enye indiza yabantu baseCanada abangu-185 abavela eWuhan yafika eCFB Trenton.']

sourceString: Australian authorities evacuated 277 citizens on 3 and 4 February to the Christmas Island Detention Centre, which had been repurposed as a quarantine facility, where they remained for 14 days.
targetString: Amagunya ase-Australia athutha amalungu omphakathi angu-277 ngo-3 no-4 February bayiswa e-Christmas Island Detention Centre, ebilungiswe kabusha ukuze ibe indawo yokuvalelwa, bahlala khona izinsuku ezingu-14.
translated: ['Iziphathimandla zase-Australia zakhipha izakhamuzi ezingu-277 ngomhlaka-3 no-4 Febhuwari eChristmas Island Detention Centre, eyayiphinde yasetshenziswa njengendawo yokuhlala, lapho zahlala khona izinsuku ezingu-14.']

sourceString: A New Zealand evacuation flight arrived in Auckland on 5 February; its passengers (including some from Australia and the Pacific) were quarantined at a naval base in Whangaparoa, north of Auckland.
