sourceString: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme.Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as Kurzarbeit.
targetString: Phakathi nengxenye eyesibili yaMashi, abasebenzi abangu-4 million  baseFrance babhalisele izibonelelo zesikhashana kanye nabasebenzi baseBrithani abangu-1 million babhalisele i-universal credit scheme. Izinkampani ezingase zibe yisigamu sesigidi eJalimane baye bayisa abasebenzi ohlelweni lukahulumeni lokusebenza isikhathi esincishisiwe esibizwa ngokuthi iKurzarbeit.
translated: ['Phakathi nengxenye yesibili kaMashi, abasebenzi baseFrance abayizigidi ezingu-4 bafaka isicelo sezinzuzo zesikhashana zokungasebenzi kanye nabasebenzi baseBrithani abayizigidi ezingu-1 bafaka isicelo sohlelo lwesikweletu jikelele. Izinkampani ezicishe zibe yingxenye yesigidi eJalimane zithumele abasebenzi bazo ezinhlelweni zokusebenza zesikhathi esifushane ezixhaswe nguhulumeni ezaziwa ngokuthi iKurzarbeit.']

sourceString: The German short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by France and Britain.
targetString: Lolu hlelo lwaseJalimane lokusebenza isikhathi esifushanisiwe liye lathathwa nayiFrance neBrithani.
translated: ['Uhlelo lwesinxephezelo somsebenzi wesikhathi esifushane saseJalimane lwamukelwe yiFrance neBrithani.']

sourceString: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly affected by the pandemic, impacting organizations' operations as well as individuals—both employed and independent—globally.
targetString: Izimboni zobiciko namasiko intinteke ngokuphawulekayo yilolubhubhane kwaphazamiseka ukusebenza kwezinhlangano nabantu siqu -abaqashiwe nabazimele -emhlabeni wonke
translated: ['Imikhakha yobuciko bokusebenza kanye namafa amasiko iye yathinteka kakhulu kulolu bhubhane, yaba nomthelela ekusebenzeni kwezinhlangano kanye nabantu ngabanye-abaqashiwe nabazimele-emhlabeni jikelele.']

sourceString: Arts and culture sector organizations attempted to uphold their (often publicly funded) mission to provide access to cultural heritage to the community, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists where possible.
targetString: Izinhlangano zezobuciko nezamasiko zizame ukuqhubezaizinhlelo zazo, ngokuvamile ezixhaswa uhulumeni, ukuvulela umphakathi izidawo nokugcine izisebenzi zabo nomphakathi bephephile kanye nokusekela izihlabani.
translated: ['Izinhlangano zomkhakha wezobuciko namasiko zazama ukugcina umsebenzi wazo (ovame ukuxhaswa ngemali yomphakathi) ukuhlinzeka ukufinyelela kumafa amasiko emphakathini, ukugcina ukuphepha kwabasebenzi bazo kanye nomphakathi, nokusekela abaculi lapho kungenzeka khona.']

sourceString: By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
targetString: Kwathi ngoMashi 2020, emhlabeni wonke nangamazinga angafani, amamuseaums, amalibrary, izindawo okudlala nezindawo zamasiko zavalwa isikhathi esinganqunyiwe, imicibi nemidlalo asulwa noma yahlehliswa.
translated: ['NgoMashi 2020, emhlabeni wonke nangamazinga ahlukene, iminyuziyamu, imitapo yezincwadi, izindawo zokusebenza, kanye nezinye izikhungo zamasiko zazivaliwe isikhathi esingenamkhawulo ngemibukiso yazo, imicimbi kanye nokusebenza kwakhanselwa noma kuhlehlisiwe.']

sourceString: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms.Another recent and rapidly accelerating fallout of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.
targetString: Kwasatshelwa ngokuthi kwenziwe imizamo yokuba izidingo zitholakale ngezindlela zobuchwepheshe. Okunye okusha nokushesha kakhulu ukwesulwa kwezihnhlelo zenkolo, ezemidlalo neminye imicimbi yabantu njengamafestival namaconcert namaconference ezobuchwepheshe kanye nawezemfashini.
translated: ['Ekuphenduleni kwakukhona imizamo enamandla yokuhlinzeka ngezinye izinsizakalo ngokusebenzisa amapulatifomu edijithali. Okunye ukuwa kwalesi sifo kwakamuva futhi okusheshayo ngokushesha ukukhanselwa kwezinsizakalo zenkolo, imicimbi emikhulu kwezemidlalo, neminye imicimbi yomphakathi, njengemikhosi yomculo namakhonsathi, izingqungquthela zobuchwepheshe, nemibukiso yemfashini.']

sourceString: The film industry has also experienced disruption.The Vatican announced that Holy Week observances in Rome, which occur during the last week of the Christian penitential season of Lent, have been cancelled.
targetString: Imboni yezemidlalo ebukwayo iye yaphazamiseka. iVatican imemezele ukuthi ukukhunjulwa kweHoly Week eRoma, okwenzeka ngesonto lokugcina kwenyanga yamaKristu yeLent isuliwe.
translated: ['Imboni yamafilimu nayo ihlangabezane nokuphazamiseka. IVatican imemezele ukuthi ukugcinwa kweSonto Elingcwele eRoma, okwenzeka phakathi nesonto lokugcina lesikhathi sokujeziswa kobuKristu seLent, kukhanseliwe.']

sourceString: Many dioceses have recommended older Christians to stay at home rather than attending Mass on Sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.
targetString: Amadioceses aye akhuthaza amaKristu asekhulile ukuba ahlale emakhaya kunokuya emasontweni ngamaSonto. Amanye amasonto enze izinhlelo zawo zatholakak ngosmakazo, i-live streaming noma ngethelevision.
translated: ['Ama-dioceses amaningi aye ancoma amaKristu amadala ukuba ahlale ekhaya kunokuba aye eMiseni ngeSonto; amanye amasonto enze izinsizakalo zesonto zatholakala ngomsakazo, ukusakazwa bukhoma kwe-intanethi noma ithelevishini ngenkathi amanye enikeza ukukhulekela kwe-drive-in.']

sourceString: With the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rome closing its churches and chapels and St. Peter's Square emptied of Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also cancelled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.
targetString: Ngokuthi iRoman Catholic Diocese of Rome ivale amasonto ayo kanye neSt Peter's Square ikhiphe wonke amapilgrim nezinye izinhlangano ziye zasula izinhlelo noma zaba nemibuthano elinganiselwe emasontweni, amamosques, amasinagoge, amathempeli namagurdwaras
translated: ["Njengoba i-Diocese yamaRoma Katolika yaseRoma ivala amasonto ayo kanye nama-chapels futhi iSt Peter's Square yakhipha izihambeli zobuKristu, ezinye izinhlaka zenkolo nazo zakhansela izinsizakalo kanye nemibuthano yomphakathi elinganiselwe emasontweni, ema-mosque, emasinagogeni, emathempelini nasema-gurdwaras."]

sourceString: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and shrines were later closed, while Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.
targetString: Umnyango Wezempilo eIran wamemezela ukusulwa kwemithandazo yangolwesihlanu ezindaweni ezithintwe yilolubhubhane nezindawo ezokukhonza zavalwa kanti eSaudi Arabia kwavinjelwa kwamakholwa amanye amazwe nezakhamuzi akhona ukungena ezakhiweni ezingcwele eMecca naseMedina.
translated: ['UMnyango wezeMpilo e-Iran umemezele ukukhanselwa kwemithandazo yangoLwesihlanu ezindaweni ezithintekile ngenxa yokuqubuka kwalesi sifo kanti izindawo ezingcwele zavalwa kamuva, kanti iSaudi Arabia ivimbe ukungena kwezihambeli zakwamanye amazwe kanjalo nabahlali bayo ezindaweni ezingcwele eMecca naseMedina.']

sourceString: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the Second World War.
targetString: Lolu bhubhane ludale ukuphazamiseka okukhulu kunakho konke ezinhlelweni zezemidlalo emhlabeni wonke kusukela eMpini Yezwe Yesibili.
translated: ['Ubhubhane lubangele ukuphazamiseka okukhulu kakhulu ekhalendeni yezemidlalo emhlabeni wonke kusukela ngeMpi Yezwe Yesibili.']

sourceString: Most major sporting events have been either cancelled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season, and 2019–20 NHL season.
targetString: Eziningi ezemidlalo emikhulu ziye zahlehliswa noma zayekwa ngokuphelele, kuhlanganise i-2019 kuya ku-2020 UEFA Champions League, i-2019 kuya ku-2020 Premier League, i-UEFA Euro ka-2020, i-2019 kuya ku-2020 NBA Season kanye ne-2019  kuya ku-2020 NHL season.
translated: ['Imicimbi eminingi emikhulu yezemidlalo ikhanseliwe noma ihlehlisiwe, kufaka phakathi i-2019-20 UEFA Champions League, i-2019-20 Premier League, i-UEFA Euro 2020, isizini ye-2019-20 NBA, nesizini ye-2019-20 NHL.']

sourceString: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of July; the International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event will be "rescheduled to a date beyond 2020 but not later than summer 2021".Casinos and other gaming venues worldwide have closed and live poker tournaments have been either postponed or cancelled.
targetString: Lokhu qubuka kuphazamise izinhlelo ze-2020 Summer Olympics ezazikade zihlelelwe ukuqala ngasekupheleni kuka-July; I-International Olympic Committee yamemezela ngo-24 March ukuthi lemidlalo "izophinde sihlelelwe inkathi engemva kuka-2020 kodwa kukakadluli i-hlobo ka-2021". Ama-Casino nezinye izindawo zemidlalo emhlabeni wonke zivaliwe nemiqhudelwano ye-poker ebukhoma ihlehlisiwe noma ihoxiswe.
translated: ['Ukuqubuka kwaphazamisa izinhlelo ze-2020 Summer Olympics, okwakuhlelwe ukuthi ziqale ekupheleni kukaJulayi; i-International Olympic Committee yamemezela ngomhlaka-24 Mashi ukuthi lo mcimbi "uzohlelwa kabusha kuze kube usuku olungaphezu kuka-2020 kodwa kungakapheli ihlobo lika-2021". Amakhasino nezinye izindawo zokudlala emhlabeni wonke zivaliwe futhi imiqhudelwano ye-poker ebukhoma ihlehlisiwe noma ikhanseliwe.']

sourceString: This has led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting significant increases in their rates of new sign-ups.The entertainment industry has also been affected, with various music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.
targetString: Loku kuye kwaholela ekutheni abagembuli baye-online, ama-site amaningi okugembula abike ukwanda okukhulu kwama-sign-ups. Imboni yokuzijabulisa nayo ithintekile, amaqembu omculo aye amisa noma ahoxisa uhambo lwama-concert.
translated: ['Lokhu kuye kwaholela abagembuli abaningi ukuhambisa inthanethi, eziningi izingosi zokugembula inthanethi ukubika ukwanda okukhulu amazinga abo entsha sign-ups. Imboni yezokuzijabulisa nayo ithintekile, amaqembu omculo ahlukahlukene amisa noma akhansele izinkambo zamakhonsathi.']

sourceString: Many large theatres such as those on Broadway also suspended all performances.
targetString: Imidlalo eminingi yezeshashalazi njengaleyo ese-Broadway iyeyamisa yonke imibukiso.
translated: ['Izindawo eziningi ezinkulu zemidlalo yaseshashalazini ezifana nalezo zaseBroadway nazo zamisa yonke imisebenzi.']

sourceString: Some artists have explored ways to continue to produce and share work over the internet as an alternative to traditional live performance, such as live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute, and publicize their work.
targetString: Abaculi abathile bahlole izindlela zokuqhubeka beqopha nezokwabelana ngomsebenzi wabo nge-internet esikhundleni sokudlala bukhoma njengokuvamile, njengokwenza i-live streaming yama-concert noma ukusungula "imicimbi" e-web based yokuthi abaculi badlale, basakaze futhi bazise abantu kabanzi ngomsebenzi wabo.
translated: ['Abanye abaculi baye bahlola izindlela zokuqhubeka nokukhiqiza nokwabelana ngomsebenzi nge-intanethi njengenye indlela yokusebenza bukhoma kwendabuko, njengamakhonsathi okusakaza bukhoma noma ukudala "imikhosi" esekelwe kuwebhu yabaculi ukwenza, ukusabalalisa, nokumemezela umsebenzi wabo.']

sourceString: Online, numerous coronavirus-themed Internet memes have spread as many turn to humour and distraction amid uncertainty.
targetString: Amamingi ama-meme aphathelene necorona-virus aye abhebhetheka online njengoba abaningi bephendukela emahlayeni neziphazamiso phakathi nokingaqiniseki.
translated: ['Ku-intanethi, ama-memes amaningi e-Inthanethi anezihloko ze-coronavirus asakazeke njengoba abaningi bephendukela ekuhlekiseni nasekuphazamisekeni phakathi kokungaqiniseki.']

sourceString: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, heightened prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been noted toward people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries.
targetString: Kusukela yagqashuka i-COVID -19, izinga eliphakeme lokubandlululwa, elokucwaswa ngobuzwe nelokucwaswa ngebala liye laphawulwa ngokuqondene nabantu imvelaphi yabo engeyase-China nase-East Asia futhi nangokumelene nabantu abavela ezindaweni ezithile e-Europe , e-United States kanye namanye amazwe.
translated: ['Kusukela kuqubuke i-COVID-19, ukuphakama kobandlululo, ukucwasa ama-xenophobia, kanye nobuhlanga kuye kwaphawulwa kubantu bokuzalwa baseChina naseMpumalanga Asia, kanye nabantu abavela ezindaweni ezishisayo eYurophu, e-United States nakwamanye amazwe.']

sourceString: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed in many countries, particularly in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region.
targetString: Izigameko zokwesaba, ukusola nobutha ziye zaqhashelwa emazweni amaningi ikakhulukazi e-Europe, East Asia, North America kanye nasesifundeni sase-Asia-Pacific.
translated: ['Izehlakalo zokwesaba, ukusolwa, nobutha ziye zabonwa emazweni amaningi, ikakhulukazi eYurophu, eMpumalanga Asia, eNyakatho Melika, nasesifundeni sase-Asia-Pacific.']

sourceString: Reports from February (when the majority of the cases had still been confined to China) have documented racist sentiments expressed in various groups worldwide of Chinese people deserving the virus or receiving what has been claimed as justified retribution.
targetString: Imibiko yango-February, lapho iningi abagulayo babesangaphakathi kwemingcele yase-China, yaphawula imizwa yokucwaswa ngebala ivezwa amaqembu ahlukahlukene emhlabeni ngokuthi abantu base-China bafanelwe yile-virus noma bathola okuthiwa impindiselo ebafanele.
translated: ['Imibiko kusukela ngoFebhuwari (lapho iningi lamacala lalisavalelwe eChina) ibhale imizwa yobuhlanga echazwe emaqenjini ahlukahlukene emhlabeni wonke yabantu baseChina abafanelwe yileli gciwane noma ukuthola lokho okuye kwathiwa njengokuphindisela okufanele.']

sourceString: Some countries in Africa have also seen a rise in anti-Chinese sentiment.
targetString: Amanye amazwe ase-Africa aye abona ukwanda kokungabathandisisi abase-China.
translated: ['Amanye amazwe ase-Afrika nawo abonile ukukhuphuka kwemizwa yokulwa neChina.']

sourceString: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.
targetString: Izakhamuzi eziningi zaseWuhan naseHubei zibike ukubandululwa ngenxa yezindawo abavela kuso
translated: ['Izakhamuzi eziningi zaseWuhan naseHubei zibike ubandlululo olusekelwe emvelaphi yazo yesifunda.']

sourceString: There has been support for the Chinese, both on and offline, and towards those in virus-stricken areas.
targetString: Kubekhona ukusekelwa kwabase-China kokubili ezingosini zokuxhumana nanokoqobo kulabo abasezindaweni ezihaqwe yile-virus.
translated: ['Kube nokwesekwa kwamaShayina, kokubili ngaphakathi nangaphandle kokuxhumana, nakulabo abasezindaweni ezihlaselwe yigciwane.']

sourceString: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19, could also be subjected to suspicion and xenophobia.Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, and South Korea initially signed petitions lobbying to ban Chinese people from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.
targetString: Okulandele ukuqhubekela kwamanye amazwe athile kwaloku kugqashuka, abantu base-Italy, okuyizwe lokuqala e-Europe lokuba nokugqashuka kwe-Covid-19 okubucayi, bangase babhekane nokusolwa nangokucwaswa ngobuzwe. Izakhamuzi zamazwe ahlanganisa i-Malaysia, i-New Zealand, i-Singapore ne-South Korea zike zaqala usayina izicelo ezihambisana nemikhankaso yokuvimbela abantu base-China ukuthi bangangeni emazweni akubo njengomzamo wokunqanda lesifo.
translated: ['Ngemuva kokuqhubekela phambili kokuqubuka kwalesi sifo emazweni amasha avuthayo, abantu abavela e-Italy, izwe lokuqala eYurophu ukuthola ukuqubuka okukhulu kwe-COVID-19, nabo bangasolwa futhi bahlukunyezwe ama-xenophobia. Izakhamuzi emazweni ahlanganisa iMalaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, neSouth Korea zaqala zasayina izicelo zokugqugquzela ukuthi abantu baseChina bangene emazweni abo ngemizamo yokumisa lesi sifo.']

sourceString: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan trended on Twitter.
targetString: E-Japan, i-hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan iye yaba edumile ku-Twitter.
translated: ['EJapan, i-hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan ihamba phambili ku-Twitter.']

sourceString: Chinese people as well as other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States have reported increasing levels of racist abuse, as well as assaults.
targetString: Abantu base-China namanye ama-Asian e-United Kingdom nase-United States babike amazinga andayo okuhlukunyezwa ngenxa yokucwaswa ngebala kanye nokushaywa.
translated: ['Abantu baseChina kanye nabanye abantu base-Asia e-United Kingdom nase-United States babike ukwanda kwamazinga okuhlukunyezwa ngokwebala, kanye nokuhlaselwa.']

sourceString: U.S. president Donald Trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese Virus", a term considered by critics to be racist and anti-Chinese.
targetString: Umongameli wase-U.S u-Donald Trump usebhekane nokugxekwa ngokubhekisela kwi-coronavirus ngokuthi "i-Chinese Virus", igama abagxeki abalibheka njengelicwasa ngokwebala futhi elibonisa ukungabathandisisi abaseChina.
translated: ['Umengameli waseMelika uDonald Trump ubhekane nokugxekwa ngokubhekisela kwi-coronavirus ngokuthi "i-Chinese Virus", igama elithathwa ngabagxeki njengobandlululo futhi eliphikisana namaShayina.']

sourceString: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying Ukrainian and foreign evacuees from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary.
targetString: Ababhikishi e-Ukraine bahlasele amabhasi athwele abase-Ukraine kanye nabakwamanye amazwe ababuyiswe e-Wuhan bayiswa e-Novi Sanzhary.
translated: ['Ababhikishi e-Ukraine bahlasele amabhasi abethwele abaphunyuka e-Ukraine nakwamanye amazwe besuka eWuhan baya eNovi Sanzhary.']

sourceString: Students who come from Northeast India, which shares a border with China, and study in major Indian cities have reportedly experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Abafundi abavela e-Northeast India, enomgcele ne-China futhi abafunda emadolobheni amakhulu e-India, ngokwemibiko, sebetholane nokuhlushwa okuphathelene nokugqashuka kwe-coronavirus.
translated: ['Abafundi abavela eNyakatho-mpumalanga ye-India, ehlanganyela umngcele neChina, futhi bafunda emadolobheni amakhulu aseNdiya kuthiwa bahlangabezane nokuhlukunyezwa okuhlobene nokuqubuka kwe-coronavirus.']

sourceString: The Bharatiya Janata Party's State unit president in West Bengal Dilip Ghosh stated that the Chinese had destroyed nature and "that's why the God took revenge against them."
targetString: Umongameli we-The Bharatiya Janata Party e-West Bengal u-Dilip Ghosh wathi abase-China bayibulele imvelo futhi "yingakho unkulunkulu eziphindiselelile kubona"
translated: ['Umongameli weyunithi yoMbuso weBharathiya Janata Party eWest Bengal uDilip Ghosh wachaza ukuthi amaShayina abhubhise imvelo futhi "yingakho uNkulunkulu eziphindiselela kubo."']

sourceString: The remarks were later condemned by the Chinese consulate in Kolkata, calling it "erroneous".In China, xenophobia and racism agains non-Chinese residents has been inflamed by the pandemic, with foreigners described as "foreign garbage" and targeted for "disposal".
targetString: Lezi zinkulumo ziye zalahlwa ihhovisi lenxusa lase-China e-Kolkata, lizibiza ngokuthi "ziyiphutha". E-China, ukuchwasa ngobuzwe nokuchwasa ngebala kulabo abangebona abase-China kuye kwanikezwa umfutho yilolubhubhane, abavela kwamanye amazwe bebebizwa ngokuthi "izibi zangaphandle" futhi zihlelelwe "ukuchithwa"
translated: ['Kamuva la mazwi agxekwa yinxusa laseChina eKolkata, athi "kuyiphutha". E-China, ukucwasana kwama-xenophobia kanye nobuhlanga futhi abahlali abangewona amaShayina kuye kwavutha ngenxa yalolu bhubhane, abantu bakwamanye amazwe bachazwa ngokuthi "udoti wangaphandle" futhi bahlose "ukulahlwa".']

sourceString: Many newspapers with paywalls have removed them for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.
targetString: Amaphephandaba amaningi akhokhelwayo akuhoxisile okuthile ukukhokhelwa noma akuyekise ngokuphelele ngokuqondene nezindaba eziphathelene ne-coronavirus.
translated: ['Amaphephandaba amaningi ane-paywalls awasuse kwabanye noma konke ukumbozwa kwabo kwe-coronavirus.']

sourceString: Many scientific publishers made scientific papers related to the outbreak available with open access.
targetString: Abanyathelisi bezesayensi abaniningi benze amaphepha esayensi aphathelene nalokhu kugqashuka atholokala ngokukhululekile.
translated: ['Abashicileli abaningi besayensi benza amaphepha esayensi ahlobene nokuqubuka atholakala ngokufinyelela okuvulekile.']

sourceString: Some scientists chose to share their results quickly on preprint servers such as bioRxiv.
targetString: Abanye ososayensi bakhethe ukwabelana nabanye imiphumela yabo ngokushesha kuma-preprint servers anjenge-bioRxiv.
translated: ['Abanye ososayensi bakhetha ukwabelana ngemiphumela yabo ngokushesha kumaseva we-preprint afana ne-bioRxiv.']

sourceString: Emerging infectious disease – Infectious disease of emerging pathogen, often novel in its outbreak range or transmission mode
targetString: Izifo ezintsha ezithelelanayo – Izifo ezithelelanayo zamagciwane amasha, ngokuvamile masha ebangeni lawo lokuqubuka noma endleleni yodluliselana
translated: ['Isifo esithathelwanayo esivelayo - Isifo esithathelwanayo se-pathogen evelayo, ngokuvamile inoveli ebangeni layo lokuqubuka noma imodi yokudlulisa']

sourceString: Globalization and disease – Overview of globalization and disease transmission
targetString: Ukusondelana emhlabeni – Ukubuka konke ukusondelana emhlabeni nokudlulisa izifo
translated: ['Ukuhlanganiswa kwembulunga yonke kanye nezifo - Uhlolojikelele lwe-globalization kanye nokudluliselwa kwezifo']

sourceString: List of epidemics and pandemics – A list of death tolls due to infectious disease
targetString: Uhlu lobhubhane nemishayabhuqe – Uhlu lwezibalo zokufa ngenxa yesifo esithathelanayo
translated: ['Uhlu lwezifo eziwubhubhane kanye nobhubhane – Uhlu lwezibalo zokufa ngenxa yezifo ezithathelwanayo']

sourceString: Wildlife smuggling and zoonoses – Health risks associated with the trade in exotic wildlife
targetString: Ukushushumbisa izilwane zasendle nezifo zezilwane ezidluliselwa kubantu  – Izingozi zezempilo ezihlobene nokuhwebelana ngezilwane zasendle
translated: ['Ukushushumbisa izilwane zasendle kanye nama-zoonoses - Izingozi zempilo ezihambisana nokuhweba ngezilwane zasendle ezingavamile']

sourceString: Laboratory testing for the respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the associated SARS-CoV-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.
targetString: Ukuhlolelwa kwe-repiratory coronavirus disease 2019 Covid-19 kanye ne-SARS-CoV-2 virus ephathelene nayo inhlanganisa izindlela zokubona ukubakhona kwe-virus kanye nalezo ezibona ama-antibodies akhekayo njengomphumela uma umuntu etheleleka.
translated: ['Ukuhlolwa kwelabhoratri kwesifo sokuphefumula se-coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) kanye negciwane elihambisana ne-SARS-CoV-2 kufaka phakathi izindlela ezithola ukuba khona kwegciwane nalezo ezithola ama-antibodies akhiqizwa ngokuphendula ukutheleleka.']

sourceString: The presence of viruses in samples is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the coronavirus'  RNA.
targetString: Ukubakhona kwama-viruses kuma-samples kuqinisekiswa i-RT-PCR ebona ukubakhona kwe-RNA ye-coronavirus.
translated: ['Ukuba khona kwamagciwane kumasampula kuqinisekiswa yi-RT-PCR, ethola i-RNA ye-coronavirus.']

sourceString: This test is specific and is designed to only detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: lolucwaningo lwenzelwe ngokukhethekile ukuhlola i-RNA ye-SARS-Cov-2 virus.
translated: ['Lokhu kuhlolwa kuqondile futhi kwenzelwe ukuthola kuphela i-RNA yegciwane le-SARS-CoV-2.']

sourceString: It is used to confirm very recent or active infections.
targetString: Isebenziselwa ukuqinisekisa ukutholeka kwesifo okusanda kwedlula noma okusekhona.
translated: ['Isetshenziselwa ukuqinisekisa izifo zakamuva kakhulu noma ezisebenzayo.']

sourceString: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and population surveillance.
targetString: Ukuwaningela kwama-antibodies ,i-serology, kungasebenziselwa kokubili ukuhlolwa kwesifo esikumuntu noma ukuqashwa komphakhathi.
translated: ['Ukutholakala kwama-antibodies (serology) kungasetshenziselwa kokubili ukuxilongwa nokuqapha abantu.']

sourceString: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, including those whose symptoms were too minor to report or who were asymptomatic.
targetString: Ukuhlolwa kama-antibody kubonisa ukuthi bangaki abantu asebeke baba naso isifo kuhlanganise nalabo izimpawu zabo zazincane kakhulu ukuthi zazingabikwa noma abangenazo nhlobo izimpawu.
translated: ['Ukuhlolwa kwe-antibody kukhombisa ukuthi bangaki abantu abaye baba nalesi sifo, kuhlanganise nalabo abanezimpawu ezincane kakhulu ukubika noma ababengenazo izimpawu.']

sourceString: An accurate mortality rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined from the results of this test.
targetString: Isibalo esinembile sezinga lokufa kwabantu ngalesifo kanye nezinga lokungatheleleki kweningi emphakathini kungatholakala emphumelweni yalolu vivinyo.
translated: ['Izinga lokufa elinembile lesi sifo kanye nezinga lokuvikeleka komhlambi kubantu linganqunywa emiphumeleni yalokhu kuhlolwa.']

sourceString: Due to limited testing, as of March 2020 no countries had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population.
targetString: Ngenxa yokulinganiselwa kwamanani okuhlolwa, ngesikhathi sika-March 2020, awekho amazwe abenezibalo ezingathenjwa mayelana nesibalo sokusabalala kwe-virus emphakathini wawo.
translated: ['Ngenxa yokuhlolwa okulinganiselwe, kusukela ngoMashi 2020 awekho amazwe ayenemininingwane ethembekile ngokusabalala kwaleli gciwane kubantu bawo.']

sourceString: By 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of their population, and there are massive variations in how much testing has been done across countries.
targetString: Ngo-23 March, alikho izwe ebeselihlole ngaphezu kuka-3 % wabantu abasemazweni awo futhi kukhona ukuhluka okukhulu kwenani lezibalo zokuhlolwa osekwenziwe emazweni ahlukahlukene.
translated: ['Ngo-23 Mashi, alikho izwe ebelihlole ngaphezu kwe-3% yabantu babo, futhi kunokuhlukahluka okukhulu kokuthi kungakanani ukuhlolwa okwenziwe kuwo wonke amazwe.']

sourceString: This variability is also likely to be significantly affecting reported case fatality rates, which are likely to be significantly over-estimated in some countries.
targetString: Loku kuhluka kungenzeka ukuthi kuthinta kakhulu amanani okufa kwabantu abikiwe okungenzeka zeqe ngehaba kwamazwe athile.
translated: ['Lokhu ukuguquguquka futhi kungenzeka ukuthi kuthinta kakhulu amazinga okushona kwamacala abikiwe, okungenzeka ukuthi kulinganiselwa kakhulu ngokweqile kwamanye amazwe.']

sourceString: Using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) the test can be done on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.
targetString: Ngokusetshenziswa kwe-real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction, i-rRt-PCR, lokuhlola kungenziwa kuma-respiratory samples atholwe ngezindlela ezihlukahlukene, kuhlanganise ne-nasopharyngeal swab noma i-sputum sample.
translated: ['Ukusebenzisa i-real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) ukuhlolwa kungenziwa kumasampula okuphefumula atholwe ngezindlela ezihlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi i-nasopharyngeal swab noma isampula ye-sputum.']

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to 2 days.
targetString: Imiphumela ngokuvamile itholakala phakathi namahora amabili kuya ezinsukwini ezingu-2.
translated: ['Imiphumela ngokuvamile itholakala kungakapheli amahora ambalwa kuya ezinsukwini ezi-2.']

sourceString: The RT-PCR test performed with throat swabs is only reliable in the first week of the disease.
targetString: Ukuhlola okubizwa nge-RT-PCR okwenziwa ngama-swab omphimbo kungaba nokuthenjelwa esontweni lokuqala kuphela kokophathwa yisifo.
translated: ['Ukuhlolwa kwe-RT-PCR okwenziwe nge-throat swabs kunokwethenjelwa kuphela ngesonto lokuqala lesi sifo.']

sourceString: Later on the virus can disappear in the throat while it continues to multiply in the lungs.
targetString: Ngokuzayo, i-virus inganyamalala emphinjeni kodwa ibe iqhubeka yanda emaphaphini.
translated: ['Kamuva kuleli gciwane linganyamalala emphinjeni ngenkathi liqhubeka nokwanda emaphashini.']

sourceString: For infected people tested in the second week, alternatively sample material can then be taken from the deep airways by suction catheter or coughing up material (sputum) can be used.
targetString: Kubantu abenegciwane abahlolwe ngesonto lesibili, okunye i-sample material ingakhishwa ekujuleni kwemizila yokuhogela nge-suction catheter noma ngokukhwehlela i-material, sputum, ingasebenziswa.
translated: ['Kubantu abanegciwane abahlolwe ngesonto lesibili, ngenye indlela impahla yesampula ingathathwa emigudwini yomoya ejulile nge-catheter yokuncelisa noma ukukhwehlela impahla (sputum) ingasetshenziswa.']

sourceString: One of the early PCR tests was developed at Charité in Berlin in January 2020 using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), and formed the basis of 250,000 kits for distribution by the World Health Organization (WHO).
targetString: Ezinye zezindlela zokuhlola zokuqala ze-PCR zathuthukiswa e-Charite e-Berlin ngo-January 2020 kusebenziswa i-real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction ,irRT-PCR, okwenza isisekelo sokusakazwa kwama khithi angu-250,000 yi-World Health Organization, WHO.
translated: ['Enye yezivivinyo zokuqala ze-PCR yasungulwa eCharité eBerlin ngoJanuwari 2020 isebenzisa i-real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), futhi yakha isisekelo samakhithi we-250,000 wokusabalalisa yi-World Health Organization (WHO).']

sourceString: The United Kingdom had also developed a test by 23 January 2020.The South Korean company Kogenebiotech developed a clinical grade, PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerChek Coronavirus) on 28 January 2020.
targetString: I-United Kingdom nayo yayisithuthukise indlela yokuhlola ngo-23 January 2020. Inkampany yase-South Korea i-Kogenebiotech yathuthukisa iPCR-based SARSCoV-2 kit yokuhlola esezingeni lokusebenza emtholampilo ngo-28 January 2020.
translated: ['I-United Kingdom nayo yayithuthukise ukuhlolwa ngo-23 Januwari 2020.Inkampani yaseNingizimu Korea iKogenebiotech yathuthukisa ibanga lomtholampilo, i-PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerChek Coronavirus) ngo-28 Januwari 2020.']

sourceString: It looks for the "E" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene specific to SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from China's National Medical Products Administration for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit.In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel to public health labs through the International Reagent Resource.
targetString: Ithungatha "i-E gene" efanayo kuwo wonke ama-beta coronaviruses kanye ne-RdRp gene etholakala kuphela kuyi-SARS-CoV-2. E-China, iBGI Group yayingezinye zezinkampani ezathola ukuvunyelwa wezikhathi ezibucayi i-National Products Administration yase-China ukusebenzisa i-kit yokuhlola i-PCR-based SARS-CoV-2. E-United States, i-Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, CDC, isakaza i-2019-Novel Coronavirus, 2019-Novel, Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel ezikhungweni zomtholampilo zokuhlola ngokusebenzisa i-International Reagent Resource.
translated: ['Ibheka ufuzo lwe- "E" olwabiwe yiwo wonke ama-coronavirus e-beta, kanye ne-gene ye-RdRp eqondene ne-SARS-CoV-2.In China, i-BGI Group yayingenye yezinkampani zokuqala ukuthola imvume yokusetshenziswa okuphuthumayo kusuka ku-National Medical Products Administration yaseChina yekhithi yokuthola i-SARS-CoV-2 esekelwe ku-PCR. E-United States, i-Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) isabalalisa i-2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel kumalebhu ezempilo yomphakathi ngokusebenzisa i-International Reagent Resource.']

sourceString: One of three genetic tests in older versions of the test kits caused inconclusive results due to faulty reagents, and a bottleneck of testing at the CDC in Atlanta; this resulted in an average of fewer than 100 samples a day being successfully processed throughout the whole of February 2020.
targetString: Ezintathu zama-genetic tests ezindleleni eziyisdala zama-kit okuhlola zabangela imiphumela engacacile ngenxa yaba-reagants angasebenzi kahle nokucinana kokuhlola e-CDC e-Atlanta, lokhu kwaphumela esilinganisweni sama-samples esingaphansi kwang-100 ngosuku aphumelela kuwo wonke u-February 2020.
translated: ['Esinye sezivivinyo ezintathu zofuzo ezinguqulweni ezindala zamakhithi okuhlola sabangela imiphumela engaqinisekisiwe ngenxa yama-reagents anephutha, kanye nebhodlela lokuhlolwa e-CDC e-Atlanta; lokhu kwaholela ekutheni isilinganiso samasampula angaphansi kwe-100 ngosuku sicutshungulwe ngempumelelo kulo lonke uFebhuwari 2020.']

sourceString: Tests using two components were not determined to be reliable until 28 February 2020, and it was not until then that state and local laboratories were permitted to begin testing.
targetString: Ukuhlola kusebenziswa izingxenye ezimbili akutholwanga kungathenjelwa kwaze kwaba u-28 February 2020 futhi kwaze kwaba yileso sikhathi lapho izikhungo zokuhlola zesifundazwe nezendawo zivunyelwa ukuqala ukuhlola.
translated: ['Ukuhlolwa okusebenzisa izingxenye ezimbili akuzange kunqunywe ukuthi kuthembeke kuze kube ngu-28 February 2020, futhi kwaze kwaba yileso sikhathi lapho ama-laboratories esifundazwe nawendawo avunyelwe ukuqala ukuhlolwa.']

sourceString: The test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authorization.US commercial labs began testing in early March 2020.
targetString: Lendlela yokuhlola yagunyazwa i-Food and Drug Administration ngaphansi kwe-Emergency Use Authorization. Izikhungo zokuhlola ezizimele zaqala ukuhlola ekuqaleni kuka-March 2020.
translated: ['Ukuhlolwa kwavunywa yi-Food and Drug Administration ngaphansi kwe-Emergency Use Authorization.US amalebhu okuhweba aqala ukuhlola ekuqaleni kukaMashi 2020.']

sourceString: As of 5 March 2020 LabCorp announced nationwide availability of COVID-19 testing based on RT-PCR.
targetString: Ngo-5 March 2020 i-LabCorp yamemezela ukutholakala ezweni lonke kokuhlolelwa kwe-COVID-19 okusekelwe kwi-RT-PCR
translated: ['Kusukela ngo-5 Mashi 2020 iLabCorp yamemezela ukutholakala kwezwe lonke kokuhlolwa kwe-COVID-19 ngokusekelwe ku-RT-PCR.']

sourceString: Quest Diagnostics similarly made nationwide COVID-19 testing available as of 9 March 2020.
targetString: I-Quest Diagnostics ngokufanayo yenze ukuhlolelwa i-COVID-19 kwatholakala ngokusukela kuka-9 March 2020
translated: ['I-Quest Diagnostics ngokufanayo yenza ukuhlolwa kwe-COVID-19 ezweni lonke kutholakale kusukela ngo-9 Mashi 2020.']

sourceString: No quantity limitations were announced; specimen collection and processing must be performed according to CDC requirements.
targetString: Akukho ukulinganiselwa kwezibalo okwamenyezelwa, ukuqoqwa nokugaywa kwama-specimen kufanele kwenziwe ngokwezimfuneko ze-CDC.
translated: ['Akukho ukulinganiselwa kobuningi okumenyezelwe; ukuqoqwa kwe-specimen nokucubungula kumele kwenziwe ngokuvumelana nezidingo ze-CDC.']

sourceString: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by the State Research Center of Virology and Biotechnology VECTOR.
targetString: E-Russia , ukuhlolela i-COVID-19 kwathuthukiswa futhi kwakhiqizwa i-State Research Center of Virology and Biotechnology VECTOR
translated: ['ERussia, ukuhlolwa kwe-COVID-19 kwakhiwa futhi kwakhiqizwa yi-State Research Center of Virology ne-Biotechnology VECTOR.']

sourceString: On 11 February 2020 the test was registered by the Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare.On 12 March 2020, Mayo Clinic was reported to have developed a test to detect COVID-19 infection.On 13 March 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for a test which could be performed within 3.5 hours in high volume, thus allowing one machine to do approximately 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period.
targetString: Ngo-11 February 2020 lendlela yokuhlolwa yabhaliswa i-Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare. Ngo-12 March 2020, kwabikwa ukuthi i-Mayo Clinic isithuthuthukise uhlobo lokuhlolela ukuphathwa i-COVID-19. Ngo-13 March 2020, iRoche Diagnostics yathola imvumo ye-FDA yohlobo lokuhlola olungenziwa phakathi namahora angu-3.5 ngokwenza kanjalo kuvumele umshini owodwa ukuthi wenze ukuhlola okungu-4128 esikhathini esingamahora angu-24.
translated: ['Ngo-11 February 2020 ukuhlolwa kwabhaliswa yi-Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare.Ngo-12 Mashi 2020, iMayo Clinic yabikwa ukuthi ithuthukise ukuhlolwa ukuthola ukutheleleka kwe-COVID-19. Ngo-13 Mashi 2020, iRoche Diagnostics yathola imvume ye-FDA yokuhlolwa okungenziwa kungakapheli amahora angu-3.5 ngevolumu ephezulu, ngaleyo ndlela ivumela umshini owodwa ukuthi wenze cishe ukuhlolwa kwe-4,128 esikhathini samahora angama-24.']

sourceString: On 19 March 2020, the FDA issued emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for a test on Abbott's m2000 system; the FDA had previously issued similar authorization to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.
targetString: Ngo-19 March 2020, i-FDA ikhiphele i-Abbot Laboratories ukugunyazwa kwezikhathi ezibucayi ,i-EUA, ukuthi ihlole ngesimiso se-Abbott m2000, i-FDA ibikade inikeze i-Hologic, LabCorp ne-Thermo Fisher Scientific ukugunyazwa okufanayo.
translated: ['Ngo-19 Mashi 2020, i-FDA yakhipha imvume yokusetshenziswa okuphuthumayo (EUA) ku-Abbott Laboratories ukuhlolwa ohlelweni lwe-m2000 luka-Abbott; i-FDA ngaphambilini yayikhiphe imvume efanayo ku-Hologic, LabCorp, ne-Thermo Fisher Scientific.']

sourceString: On 21 March 2020, Cepheid similarly received EUA from the FDA for a test that takes about 45 minutes.
targetString: Ngo 21-March 2020, i-Cepheid ngokufanayo ithole i-EUA nge-FDA yohlobo lokuhlola oluthatha imizuzu engabe ngu-45.
translated: ['Ngo-21 Mashi 2020, uCepheid ngokufanayo wathola i-EUA kusuka ku-FDA ukuhlolwa okuthatha cishe imizuzu engu-45.']

sourceString: The FDA has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.
targetString: I-FDA ivumele uhlobo lokuhlola olusebenzisa i-isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology esikhundleni se-PCR.
translated: ['I-FDA ivume ukuhlolwa okusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe bokukhulisa i-isothermal nucleic acid esikhundleni se-PCR.']

sourceString: Since this does not require a series of alternating temperature cycles this method can deliver positive results in as little as five minutes and negative results in 13 minutes.
targetString: Ngenxa yokuthi lolu aludingi uchungechunge lwemijikelezo yokubanda nokushisa, loluhlobo lunganikeza imiphumela e-positive emizuzwini emncane kangangemihlanu ne-negative emizuzwini engu-13.
translated: ['Njengoba lokhu kungadingi uchungechunge lwemijikelezo yokushisa eshintshashintshayo le ndlela ingaletha imiphumela emihle ngemizuzu emihlanu nje nemiphumela emibi ngemizuzu engu-13.']

sourceString: There are currently about 18,000 of these machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to ramp up manufacturing to deliver 50,000 tests per day.A test which uses a monoclonal antibody which specifically binds to the nucleocapsid protein (N protein) of the novel coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the hope that it can provide results in 15 to 20 minutes just like a rapid influenza test.
targetString: Njengamanje kunemishini engase ibe ngu-18,000 e-U.S futhi i-Abbott ilindele ukukhuphula ukuqhiqizwa kwayo ukuze kwenziwe ukuhlola okungu-50 000 ngosuku. Ukuhlola okusebenzisa i-monoclonal antibody ngokukhethekile enamathela kwi-nucleocapsid protein, i-N protein, ye-novel coronavirus iyathuthukiswa e-Taiwan ngethemba lokuthi kungakwazi ukuthi lunikeze imiphumela emizuzwini engu-15 kuya kwengu-20 okufana njengokuhlolela i-influenza.
translated: ['Njengamanje kunemishini engaba ngu-18 000 yale mishini e-US kanti u-Abbott ulindele ukukhuphula ukukhiqiza ukuletha izivivinyo ezingu-50 000 ngosuku. Ukuhlolwa okusebenzisa i-antibody ye-monoclonal ebopha ngokukhethekile kumaprotheni e-nucleocapsid (N amaprotheni) we-coronavirus entsha kuthuthukiswa eTaiwan, ngethemba lokuthi inganikeza imiphumela ngemizuzu engu-15 kuya kweyi-20 njengokuhlolwa komkhuhlane okusheshayo.']

sourceString: A March 2020 literature review concluded that "chest radiographs are of little diagnostic value in early stages, whereas CT [computed tomography] findings may be present even before symptom onset."
targetString: Ukubuyekezwa lwemibhalo lwango-March 2020 kwaphetha ngokuthi "ama-radiograph esifuba akasizi ngangako ezigabeni zokuqala kanti okutholwa i-CT, computer tomography, kungase kubekhona ngaphambi kokuba izimpawu zesifo ziqale ukubakhona.
translated: ['Ukubuyekezwa kwezincwadi zika-March 2020 kwaphetha ngokuthi "ama-radiographs esifuba anenani elincane lokuxilonga ezigabeni zokuqala, kanti okutholakele kwe-CT [computed tomography] kungase kube khona ngisho nangaphambi kokuqala kwezimpawu."']

sourceString: Typical features on CT include bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacificities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution.
targetString: Izici ezivamile ze-CT zihlanganisa i-bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacifities ene-periheral, asymetricand posterior distribution.
translated: ['Izici ezijwayelekile ku-CT zihlanganisa ama-opacificities amabili we-multilobar ground-glass nge-peripheral, asymmetric kanye nokusatshalaliswa kwe-posterior.']

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving and consolidation develop as the disease evolves.
targetString: i-Subpleural dominance, crazy paving ne-consolidation kuyakhula njengoba isifo siziguqula.
translated: ['Ukubusa kwe-subpleural, i-crazy paving nokuhlanganiswa kukhula njengoba lesi sifo siguquka.']

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan at the point of origin of the current pandemic has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: Inhlolovo eqhathanisa i-PCR ne-CT e-Wuhan endaweni okwaqala kuyo lolubhubhane lusikisele ukuthi i-CT izwela kakhulu kune-PCR kodwa ayinayo imininingwane , izici eziningi zayo zihambisana nezamanye ama-pneumonia nezinqubo zezifo.
translated: ['Ucwaningo oluqhathanisa i-PCR ne-CT eWuhan endaweni yomsuka wobhubhane lwamanje luye lwaphakamisa ukuthi i-CT izwela kakhulu kune-PCR, nakuba ingaqondile kangako, ngezici zayo eziningi zokufanekisa zihlangana nezinye i-pneumonias nezinqubo zezifo.']

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".As of March 2020, the CDC recommends PCR for initial screening.
targetString: Ngokuka-March 2020, i-American College of Radiology ikhuthaza ukuba "i-CT ingasebenziselwa ukuhlunga noma ukuhlolela i-COVID-19 okokuqala" Ngokuka-March 2020, i-CDC ikhuthaza i-PCR ekusefeni okokuqala"
translated: ['Kusukela ngoMashi 2020, i-American College of Radiology incoma ukuthi "i-CT akufanele isetshenziselwe ukuhlola noma njengokuhlolwa komugqa wokuqala ukuxilonga i-COVID-19". Kusukela ngoMashi 2020, i-CDC incoma i-PCR ukuhlolwa kokuqala.']

sourceString: Part of the immune response to infection is the production of antibodies including IgM and IgG.
targetString: Ingxenye ye-immune response ekuphathweni yisifo ukukhiqizeka kwama-antibodies kuhlanganise -Igm ne I-gG.
translated: ['Ingxenye yokuphendula kwamasosha omzimba ekuthelelekeni ukukhiqizwa kwama-antibodies kufaka phakathi i-IgM ne-IgG.']

sourceString: These can be used to detect infection in individuals starting 7 days or so after the onset of symptoms, to determine immunity, and in population surveillance.Assays can be performed in central laboratories (CLT) or by point-of-care testing (PoCT).
targetString: Lezi zingasebenziselwa ukuhlola ukuba khona kwesifo kusukela sekudlule izinsuku ezingu-7 noma ngaphezulu kwaqala izimpawu zokuba nesifo, ukuze kubonakale ukungatheleleki nokuqashwa komphakathi. Ama-Assay angenziwa izikhungo zokuhlola eziyinhloko , ama-CLT, noma nge-point-of-care testing , i-PoCT.
translated: ['Lezi zingasetshenziselwa ukuthola ukutheleleka kubantu abaqala izinsuku ezingu-7 noma ngaphezulu ngemuva kokuqala kwezimpawu, ukunquma ukuzivikela, nasekuqapheni kwabantu. Ukuhlolwa kungenziwa kuma-laboratories aphakathi (CLT) noma ngokuhlolwa kwe-point-of-care (PoCT).']

sourceString: The high-throughput automated systems in many clinical laboratories will be able to perform these assays but their availability will depend on the rate of production for each system.
targetString: Izinga eliphakeme lokusebenza kwama-automated systems ezikhungweni eziningi zokuhlolela ezokwelapha lizokwazi ukusebenza ngama-essays kodwa ukutholakala kwawo kuzoxhomeka esivininini sokikhiqizwa kwayo ngayinye.
translated: ['Izinhlelo ezizenzakalelayo eziphezulu kuma-laboratories amaningi omtholampilo zizokwazi ukwenza lezi zivivinyo kodwa ukutholakala kwazo kuzoncika kwizinga lokukhiqiza uhlelo ngalunye.']

sourceString: For CLT a single specimen of peripheral blood is commonly used, although serial specimens can be used to follow the immune response.
targetString: Nge-CLT, sisodwa kuphela i-specimen se-peripheral blood esisebenziswa ngokujwayelekile, yize ama-specimen a-serial engasebenziselwa ukusabela kwamasosha omzimba.
translated: ['Ku-CLT isibonelo esisodwa segazi le-peripheral sivame ukusetshenziswa, nakuba izinhlobo ze-serial zingasetshenziselwa ukulandela ukuphendula komzimba.']

sourceString: For PoCT a single specimen of blood is usually obtained by skin puncture.
targetString: Nge-PoCT, i-specimen yegazi eyodwa ivame ukutholwa ngokujoja isikhumba.
translated: ['Ku-PoCT isibonelo esisodwa segazi sivame ukutholakala ngokubhoboza isikhumba.']

sourceString: Unlike PCR methods an extraction step is not needed before assay.On March 26, 2020, the FDA named 29 entities that provided notification to the agency as required and are now therefore able to distribute their antibody tests.
targetString: Ngokungafani nezindlela ze-PCR, isinyathelo sokuputshuzwa asidingekile ngaphambi kwe-essay. Ngo-26 March 2020, i-FDA yethula amagama ezinhlaka ezingu-29 ezabikela le-agency njengokudingekile futhi manje sezikwazi ukusakaza ama-antibody test azo.
translated: ['Ngokungafani nezindlela ze-PCR isinyathelo sokukhipha asidingeki ngaphambi kokuhlolwa. NgoMashi 26, 2020, i-FDA yabiza izinhlangano ze-29 ezanikeza isaziso kule nhlangano njengoba kudingeka futhi manje ngakho-ke ziyakwazi ukusabalalisa ukuhlolwa kwazo kwe-antibody.']

sourceString: As of April 7, 2020, only a single test has been approved by the FDA under an emergency use authorization.In late March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received European approvals for their test kits, which can detect IgG and IgA antibodies against the virus in blood samples.
targetString: Ngokuka-7 April 2020, yinye kuphela indlela yokuhlola evunyelwe i-FDA ngaphansi kokugunyazwa kwezimo ezibucayi. Ngasekupheleni kuka-March 2020, i-Euroiminium Medical Laboratoray Diagnostics and Epitome Diagnostics yathola ukuvunyelwa kwama-test kits ayo kwase-Europe angakwazi ukuhlolela ukubona ama-antibodies awe-IgG nawe-IgA ngokumelene ne-virus kuma-blood samples.
translated: ['Kusukela ngo-Ephreli 7, 2020, ukuhlolwa okukodwa kuphela okuvunywe yi-FDA ngaphansi kokugunyazwa kokusetshenziswa okuphuthumayo. Ngasekupheleni kukaMashi 2020, i-Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics ne-Epitope Diagnostics yathola imvume yaseYurophu yamakhithi abo okuhlola, angabona ama-antibodies e-IgG ne-IgA ngokumelene negciwane kumasampula egazi.']

sourceString: The testing capacity is several hundred samples within hours and therefore much faster than the conventional PCR assay of viral RNA.
targetString: Umthamo wokuhlola ungama-samples angamakhulu ambalwa phakathi nehora ngakho kushesha kakhulu kune-conventional PCR assay ye-Viral RNA.
translated: ['Umthamo wokuhlola ngamasampula angamakhulu amaningana kungakapheli amahora futhi ngakho-ke ngokushesha okukhulu kunokuhlolwa okujwayelekile kwe-PCR ye-viral RNA.']

sourceString: The antibodies are usually detectable 14 days after the onset of the infection.In early April, the UK found none of the antibody test kits it purchased were sufficiently good to use.
targetString: Ukuba khona kwama-antibodies kuvame ukuhloleka ngemva kwezinsuku ezingu-14 zokutholwa isifo. Ngo-April, i-UK yathola ukuthi yayingekho neyodwa kwama-antibody test kits eyayiwathengile ayezokwazi ukusebenziseka ngokuzuzisayo.
translated: ['Ama-antibodies avame ukutholakala ezinsukwini ezingu-14 ngemuva kokuqala kokutheleleka. Ekuqaleni kuka-Ephreli, i-UK yathola ukuthi akukho neyodwa yamakhithi okuhlola ama-antibody ayithengile ayelungile ngokwanele ukuyisebenzisa.']

sourceString: Hong Kong has set up a scheme where suspected patients can stay home, "emergency department will give a specimen tube to the patient", they spit into it, send it back and get a test result a while after.The British NHS has announced that it is piloting a scheme to test suspected cases at home, which removes the risk of a patient infecting others if they come to a hospital or having to disinfect an ambulance if one is used.In drive-through testing for COVID-19 for suspected cases, a healthcare professional takes sample using appropriate precautions.
targetString: E-Hong Kong kweziwe uhlelo lapho abasolwa ngokuba yiziguli bangahlala emakhaya, "umyango wezimo ezibucayi ozonikeza isiguli i-specimen tube", ukuze bakhafulele phakathi, bayibuyisele emuva bese bethola imiphumela ngemva kwesikhashana. I-British NHS imemezele ukuthi iqalisa uhlelo lokuhlolela emakhaya okuqeda usongo lokuthi isiguli sithelele abanye uma siya emtholampilo noma isidingo sokuhlanzela ukubulala amagciwane izithuthi zezuguli uma kukhona esisebenzisiwe. Mayelana nabasolwa ngokugula ezandaweni zokuhlolelwa i-COVID-19 ungehlile emotweni, isisebenzi sezempilo yiso esiyothatha ama-sample sisebenzisa ukuqhaphisisa okufanelekile.
translated: ['I-Hong Kong isungule uhlelo lapho iziguli ezicatshangelwayo zingahlala khona emakhaya, "umnyango wezimo eziphuthumayo uzonikeza isiguli i-specimen tube", bakhafulela amathe kuyo, bayibuyisele emuva futhi bathole umphumela wokuhlolwa isikhashana ngemuva kwalokho. I-NHS yaseBrithani imemezele ukuthi ishayela uhlelo lokuhlola izigameko ezisolwayo emakhaya, okususa ingozi yokuthi isiguli sithelele abanye uma sifika esibhedlela noma kufanele sibulale amagciwane kwi-ambulensi uma kusetshenziswa enye. Ekuhlolweni kwe-drive-through ye-COVID-19 yamacala asolwayo, uchwepheshe wezempilo uthatha isampula esebenzisa izinyathelo ezifanele.']

sourceString: Drive-through centers have helped South Korea do some of the fastest, most-extensive testing of any country.In Germany, the National Association of Statutory Health Insurance Physicians said on 2 March, that it had a capacity for about 12,000 tests per day in the ambulatory setting and 10.700 had been tested in the prior week.
targetString: Izikhungo zokudlula-ushayela kusize i-South Korea yenze ukuhlola okushesha kakhulu, okugxile kakhulu kunoma iliphi izwe. E-Germany, i-National Association of Statutory Health Insurance Physicians yakhuluma ngo-2 March, yathi inamadla okuqukatha ukuhlola okungaba ngu-12,000 ngosuku ngohlelo lokuthukusa futhi ukuhlola kwabangu-10.700 bekwenziwe ngeviki elidlule.
translated: ['Izikhungo zokushayela ziye zasiza iNingizimu Korea ukwenza okunye ukuhlolwa okusheshayo, okubanzi kunanoma yiliphi izwe. EJalimane, iNational Association of Statutory Health Insurance Physicians yathi ngomhlaka-2 Mashi, ukuthi inomthamo wokuhlolwa cishe kwe-12 000 ngosuku endaweni ye-ambulatory futhi i-10.700 ihlolwe ngesonto eledlule.']

sourceString: Costs are borne by the health insurance when the test is ordered by a physician.
targetString: Izindleko zithwalwa ngumshwalense wezezempilo lapho ukuhlola kubizwe ngudokotela.
translated: ['Izindleko zithwalwa umshwalense wezempilo lapho ukuhlolwa kuyalelwa udokotela.']

sourceString: According to the president of the Robert Koch Institute, Germany has an overall capacity for 160,000 tests per week.
targetString: Ngokusho kukamongameli we-Robert Koch Institute, i-Germany inamandla okuqukatha ukuhlola abangu-160,000 ngeviki.
translated: ['Ngokusho komongameli weRobert Koch Institute, iJalimane inomthamo jikelele wokuhlolwa kwe-160,000 ngesonto.']

sourceString: As of 19 March drive in tests were offered in several large cities.
targetString: Kusukela ngo-19 March ukuhlola ngokudlula-ushayela kwanikezwa emadolobheni amaningi amakhulu.
translated: ['Kusukela ngo-19 Mashi ukushayela ekuhlolweni kwanikezwa emadolobheni amakhulu amaningana.']

sourceString: As of 26 March 2020 the total number of tests performed in Germany was unknown, because only positive results are reported.
targetString: Kusukela ngo-26 March 2020 igqikithi yesibalo sokuhlola esenziwe yi-Germany besingaziwa, ngoba imiphumela eqinisile kuphela ebikwayo.
translated: ['Kusukela ngo-26 Mashi 2020 inani eliphelele lokuhlolwa okwenziwe eJalimane lalingaziwa, ngoba kubikwa imiphumela emihle kuphela.']

sourceString: A first lab survey revealed that as of calendar week 12/2020 a total of at least 483,295 samples were tested up to and including week 12/2020 and 33,491 samples (6.9%) tested positive for SARS-CoV-2.In Israel, researchers at Technion and Rambam Hospital developed and tested a method for testing samples from 64 patients simultaneously, by pooling the samples and only testing further if the combined sample is found to be positive.In Wuhan a makeshift 2000-sq-meter emergency detection laboratory named "Huo-Yan" (Chinese: 火眼, or "Fire Eye" in English) was opened on 5 February 2020 by BGI, which can process over 10,000 samples a day.
targetString: Inhlolovo yokuqala yelebhu yabonisa ukuthi kusukela ngeviki lekhalenda u-12/2020 ingqikithi yamasampula okungenani angu-483,295 ahlolwa kwaze kwafika futhi kwahlanganisa iviki u-12/2020 namasampula angu-33,491 u-(6.9%) lapho kuhlolwa waqinisekisela i-SARS-CoV-2. I-Israel, abacwaningi e-Technion and Rambam Hospital bakhe futhi bahlola indlela yokuhlola amasampula eziguli ezingu-64 patients kanye kanye, ngokuhlanganisa amasampula nokuhlola okwengeziwe kuphela lapho isampula elihlanganisiwe libonisa ukuqinisekisa. E-Wuhan idokodo elingu-2000-sq-meter lelebhu yophenyo lwesimo esiphuthumayo elibizwa ngokuthi "Huo-Yan" (Umbhalo wesi-China: 火眼, noma "Iso Lomlilo" nge-English) lavulwa yi-BGI ngo-5 February 2020, likwazi ukuqhubeza amasampula angaphezulu kuka-10,000 ngosuku.
translated: ['Ucwaningo lokuqala lwelebhu luveze ukuthi kusukela ngesonto lekhalenda 12 / 2020 ingqikithi yamasampula okungenani angama-483,295 ahlolwe kuze kufike ngesonto le-12 / 2020 kanye namasampula angama-33,491 (6.9%) ahlolwe ukuthi SARS-CoV-2.In-Israyeli, abacwaningi baseTechnion naseRambam Hospital bahlakulela futhi bahlola indlela yokuhlola amasampula avela ezigulini ezingama-64 ngesikhathi esisodwa, ngokuhlanganisa amasampula nokuhlola kuphela ngokwengeziwe uma isampula ehlangene itholakala inesifo. E-Wuhan i-laboratory yokuthola okuphuthumayo ye-2000-sq-meter ebizwa ngokuthi "Huo-Yan" (isiShayina: i-火ି眼, noma "i-Fire Eye" ngesiNgisi) yavulwa ngo-5 February 2020 yi-BGI, engakwazi ukucubungula amasampula angaphezu kwe-10,000 ngosuku.']

sourceString: With the construction overseen by BGI-founder Wang Jian and taking 5-days, modelling has show cases in Hubei would have been 47% higher and the corresponding cost of the tackling the quarantine would have doubled if this testing capacity hadn't come on line.
targetString: Njengoba isakhiwo besenganyelwa umsunguli we-BGI u-Wang Jian futhi sathatha izinsuku ezingu-5, ukufuzisela kubonisa ukuthi izibonelo e-Hubei ngabe ziphezulu ngo-47% futhi izindleko ezifanele zokuhlangabeza ukuvalelwa bezizophindwa kabili uma amandla okuqukatha ukuhlola engazange atholakale ngesikhathi.
translated: ['Njengoba ukwakhiwa kubhekwe ngumsunguli we-BGI uWang Jian futhi kuthatha izinsuku ezi-5, ukumodela kuye kwaba namacala okubonisa eHubei bekuyoba yi-47% ephakeme futhi izindleko ezihambisanayo zokubhekana ne-quarantine bezizophindwa kabili ukube lo mthamo wokuhlola awuzange ufike emgqeni.']

sourceString: The Wuhan Laboratory has been promptly followed by Huo-Yan labs in Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, and Shanghai, in a total of 12 cities across China.
targetString: I-Lebhu yase-Wuhan ilandelwe ngokushesha amalebhu e-Huo-Yan e-Shenzhen, e-Tianjin, e-Beijing, nase-Shanghai, ingqikithi yamadolobha angu-12 cities kulo lonke elase-China.
translated: ['I-Wuhan Laboratory ilandelwe ngokushesha ngamalebhu e-Huo-Yan eShenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, naseShanghai, emadolobheni angu-12 kulo lonke elaseChina.']

sourceString: By 4 March 2020 the daily throughput totals were 50,000 tests per day.Open source, multiplexed designs released by Origami Assays have been released that can test as many as 1122 patient samples for COVID19 using only 93 assays .  These balanced designs can be run in small laboratories without the need for robotic liquid handlers.
targetString: Kusukela ngo-4 March 2020 ingqikithi yokudluliswayo kosuku ibe ukuhlola okungu-50,000 ngosuku. Umthombo ovulekile, imidwebo eyinkimbinkimbi ekhululwe yi-Origami Assays ivulelekile ukuze ikwazi ukuhlola amasampula eziguli amaningi kuze kufike ku-1122 e-COVID19 kusebenziswa ama-assays angu-93 kuphela. Lemidwebo elinganisa ngobuchwepheshe ingasebenza kumalebhu amancane ngaphandle kwesidingo samarobhothi abamba uketshezi.
translated: ['Ngo-4 Mashi 2020 ingqikithi ye-throughput yansuku zonke kwakuyizivivinyo ze-50,000 ngosuku. Umthombo ovulekile, imiklamo ye-multiplexed ekhishwe yi-Origami Assays ikhishwe engahlola amasampula amaningi eziguli ze-1122 ze-COVID19 usebenzisa ukuhlolwa kwe-93 kuphela .  Le miklamo elinganiselayo ingaqhutshwa kuma-laboratories amancane ngaphandle kwesidingo sabaphathi be-robotic liquid.']

sourceString: By March, shortages and insufficient amounts of reagent has become a bottleneck for mass testing in the EU and UK and the US.
targetString: Kusukela ngo-March, ukuntuleka nesibalo esinganele se-reagent sesibe inkanankana yento ekuhloleni iningi phakathi ne-EU ne-UK kanye ne-US.
translated: ['NgoMashi, ukushoda kanye nenani elinganele le-reagent kuye kwaba yibhodlela lokuhlolwa okuningi e-EU nase-UK nase-US.']

sourceString: This has led some authors to explore sample preparation protocols that involve heating samples at 98 °C (208 °F) for 5 minutes to release RNA genomes for further testing.On 31 March it was announced United Arab Emirates was now testing more of its population for Coronavirus per head than any other country, and was on track to scale up the level of testing to reach the bulk of the population.
targetString: Lokhu kuholele ekutheni abanye abalobi bahlole izinqubomthetho zokulungiselela amasampula okuhilela ukushisisa amasampula ku-98 °C (208 °F) imizuzu engu-5 ukuze kudedeleke izakhi ze-RNA ezihlolwa ngokwengeziwe. Ngo 31 March kwamenyezelwa ukuthi i-United Arab Emirates manje ibisihlola inani labantu bayo elengeziwe ibheka i-Coronavirus ikhanda ngalinye kunanoma iliphi elinye izwe, futhi ibihamba ngonyawo oluhle ekukhuphuleni izinga lokuhlola ukuze ifinyelele ingxenye enkulu yenani labantu.
translated: ['Lokhu kuholele abanye abalobi ukuba bahlole izivumelwano zokulungiselela isampula ezibandakanya amasampula okushisa ku-98 ° C (208 ° F) imizuzu emi-5 ukukhulula ama-genomes e-RNA ukuhlolwa okwengeziwe. Ngo-31 Mashi kwamenyezelwa ukuthi i-United Arab Emirates manje ihlola abantu bayo abaningi ngeCoronavirus ngekhanda kunanoma yiliphi elinye izwe, futhi yayisendleleni yokukhulisa izinga lokuhlolwa ukuze ifinyelele inqwaba yabantu.']

sourceString: This was through a combination of drive-through capability, and purchasing a population-scale mass-throughput laboratory from Group 42 and BGI (based on their "Huo-Yan" emergency detection laboratories in China).
targetString: Lokhu bekuyinhlanganisela yokuqukatha amandla okudlula-ushayela, nokuthenga i-population-scale mass-throughput laboratory ku-Group 42 ne-BGI (esekelwe ku-"Huo-Yan" emergency detection laboratories e-China).
translated: ['Lokhu kwaba ngokuhlanganiswa kwekhono lokushayela, nokuthenga i-laboratory ye-mass-throughput yabantu kusuka ku-Group 42 ne-BGI (ngokusekelwe kuma-laboratories abo okuthola okuphuthumayo "Huo-Yan" eChina).']

sourceString: Constructed in 14 days, the lab is capable of conducting tens of thousands RT-PCR tests per day and is the first in the world of this scale to be operational outside of China.
targetString: Yakhiwe ezinsukwini ezingu-14, ilebhu ikwazi ukuqondisa amashumi ezinkulungwane zokuhlola nge-RT-PCR ngosuku futhi eyokuqala emhlabeni yalelizinga esebenzayo ngaphandle kwase-China.
translated: ['Yakhiwe ezinsukwini ezingu-14, ilebhu iyakwazi ukuqhuba amashumi ezinkulungwane zokuhlolwa kwe-RT-PCR ngosuku futhi iyona yokuqala emhlabeni walesi silinganiso ukusebenza ngaphandle kweChina.']

sourceString: Different testing recipes targeting different parts of the coronavirus genetic profile were developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan, and the United States.
targetString: Izinqubo ezingafani zokuhlola okuqonda kumalungu angafani ezakhi ze-coronavirus zakhiwa e-China, e-France, e-Germany, e-Hong Kong, e-Japan, nase-United States.
translated: ['Izindlela zokupheka ezahlukene zokuhlola ezibhekiswe ezingxenyeni ezahlukene zephrofayili yofuzo ye-coronavirus zakhiwa eChina, eFrance, eJalimane, eHong Kong, eJapane, nase-United States.']

sourceString: The World Health Organization adopted the German recipe for manufacturing kits sent to low-income countries without the resources to develop their own.
targetString: I-World Health Organization yakhetha inqubo yase-German yokwakhiwa kwamakhithi athunyelwa emazweni antulayo kwezemali angenazo izinsiza zokuzakhela awazo.
translated: ['I-World Health Organization yamukela iresiphi yaseJalimane yamakhithi okukhiqiza athunyelwe emazweni ahola kancane ngaphandle kwezinsiza zokuthuthukisa ezabo.']

sourceString: The German recipe was published on 17 January 2020; the protocol developed by the United States Centers for Disease Control was not available until 28 January, delaying available tests in the U.S.China and the United States had problems with the reliability of test kits early in the outbreak, and these countries and Australia were unable to supply enough kits to satisfy demand and recommendations for testing by health experts.
targetString: Inqubo yase-German yanyatheliswa ngo-17 January 2020; inqubomthetho eyasungulwa yi-United States Centers for Disease Control ayizange itholakale kwaze kwaba ngu-28 January, kwalibazisa ukuhlola okutholakalayu e-U.S. I-China ne-United States babhekana nezinkinga zokuthembakala kwamakhithi okuhlola ekuqaleni kokuqubuka, futhi lamazwe ne-Australia awakwazanga ukwakha nokukhipha amakhithi anele ukwanelisa isidingo nokukhuthaza kpchwepheshe bezezempilo.
translated: ['Iresiphi yaseJalimane yanyatheliswa ngo-17 Januwari 2020; i-protocol eyakhiwe yi-United States Centers for Disease Control yayingatholakali kuze kube ngu-28 Januwari, ukubambezela ukuhlolwa okutholakalayo e-US China nase-United States kwaba nezinkinga ngokuthembeka kwamakhithi okuhlola ekuqaleni kokuqubuka, futhi la mazwe ne-Australia abakwazanga ukuhlinzeka ngamakhithi anele ukwanelisa ukufunwa kanye nezincomo zokuhlolwa ochwepheshe bezempilo.']

sourceString: In contrast, experts say South Korea's broad availability of testing helped reduce the spread of the novel coronavirus.
targetString: Ngokungafani, ochwepheshe bathi ukutholakala okubanzi kokuhlola e-South Korea kusizile kwanciphisa ukusabalala kwe-coronavirus entsha.
translated: ['Ngokuphambene nalokho, ochwepheshe bathi ukutholakala okubanzi kweNingizimu Korea kokuhlolwa kwasiza ukunciphisa ukusabalala kwe-coronavirus entsha.']

sourceString: Testing capacity, largely in private sector labs, was built up over several years by the South Korean government.
targetString: Amandla okuqukatha ukuhlola, ikakhulukazi kumalebhu azimele, akhiwa esikhathini seminyaka eminingi nguhulumeni wase-South Korean.
translated: ['Amandla okuhlola, ikakhulukazi kumalebhu omkhakha wangasese, akhiwa eminyakeni eminingana nguhulumeni waseNingizimu Korea.']

sourceString: On 16 March, the World Health Organization called for ramping up the testing programmes as the best way to slow the advance of COVID-19 pandemic.High demand for testing due to wide spread of the virus caused backlogs of hundreds of thousands of tests at private U.S. labs, and supplies of swabs and chemical reagents became strained.
targetString: Ngo 16 March, i-World Health Organization yabizela ukunikwa amandla kwezinqubo zokuhlola njengendlela engcono kakhulu yokunensisa ukungenisa kobhubhane i-COVID-19. Isidingo esiphakeme sokuhlola ngenxa yobubanzi bokusabalala kwegciwane kwabangela ukunqwabelana komsebebenzi wamakhulu ezinkulungwane kumalebhu ase-U.S. azimele, futhi ukukhishwa kwama-swabs nama-chemical reagents kwacindezela.
translated: ['Ngomhlaka-16 Mashi, i-World Health Organization yabiza ukukhuphula izinhlelo zokuhlola njengendlela engcono kakhulu yokunciphisa ukuqhubekela phambili kobhubhane lwe-COVID-19. Isidingo esikhulu sokuhlolwa ngenxa yokusabalala okubanzi kwaleli gciwane sabangela ukusalela emuva kwamakhulu ezinkulungwane zokuhlolwa kumalebhu angasese ase-US, futhi ukuhlinzekwa kwama-swabs kanye nama-reagents amakhemikhali kwaba nobunzima.']

sourceString: In March 2020 China reported problems with accuracy in their test kits.
targetString: Ngo March 2020 i-China yabika izinkinga ngokunemba kwamakhithi okuhlola ayo.
translated: ['NgoMashi 2020 iChina yabika izinkinga ngokunemba kumakhithi abo okuhlola.']

sourceString: In the United States, the test kits developed by the CDC had "flaws;" the government then removed the bureaucratic barriers that had prevented private testing.Spain purchased test kits from Chinese firm  Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, but found that results were inaccurate.
targetString: E-United States, amakhithi okuhlola ayakhiwe i-CDC atholakala "enamaphutha;" uhulumeni wasusa izindonga zomthetho ebezivimbela ukuhlola ngasese. I-Spain yathenga amakhithi enkampanini yase-China i-Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, kodwa yathola ukuthi imiphumela yayinganembile.
translated: ['E-United States, amakhithi okuhlola akhiwa yi-CDC "ayenamaphutha;" uhulumeni wabe esesusa izithiyo ze-bureaucratic ezazivimbele ukuhlolwa kwangasese. ISpain ithenge amakhithi okuhlola enkampanini yaseChina iShenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, kodwa yathola ukuthi imiphumela yayingalungile.']

sourceString: The firm explained that the incorrect results may be a result of a failure to collect samples or use the kits correctly.
targetString: Inkampani yachaza ukuthi imiphumela eyiphutha kungenzeka ibangelwa ukwehlulela ukuqoqa amasampula noma ukusebenzisa amakhithi ngendlela efanele.
translated: ['Le nkampani ichaze ukuthi imiphumela engalungile ingaba umphumela wokwehluleka ukuqoqa amasampula noma ukusebenzisa amakhithi ngendlela efanele.']

sourceString: The Spanish ministry said it will withdraw the kits that returned incorrect results, and would replace them with a different testing kit provided by Shenzhen Bioeasy.80% of test kits the Czech Republic purchased from China gave wrong results.Slovakia purchased 1.2 million test kits from China which were found to be inaccurate.
targetString: I-Spanish ministry yathi izowakhipha amakhithi aveze imiphumela eyiphutha, futhi izofaka esikhaleni sawo amakhithi ahlukile ahlinzekelwe i-Shenzhen Bioeasy. U-80% owamakhithi okuhlola i-Czech Republic ewathenge e-China akhipha imiphumela eyiphutha. I-Slovakia yathenga amakhithi okuhlola ayizigidi ezingu-1.2 e-China atholakala ukuthi awanembile.
translated: ['Umnyango waseSpain uthe uzohoxisa amakhithi abuyise imiphumela engalungile, futhi uzowashintsha ngekhithi yokuhlola ehlukile enikezwe yiShenzhen Bioeasy.80% yamakhithi okuhlola iCzech Republic ethengwe eChina inikeze imiphumela engalungile. ISlovakia ithenge amakhithi okuhlola ayizigidi ezingu-1.2 eChina okwatholakala ukuthi awalungile.']

sourceString: Prime Minister Matovič suggested these be dumped into the Danube.Ateş Kara of the Turkish Health Ministry said the test kits Turkey purchased from China had a "high error rate" and did not "put them into use."The UK purchased 3.5 million test kits from China but in early April 2020 announced these were not usable.
targetString: I-Prime Minister u-Matovič waphakamisa ukuthi mawalahlwe ngokufakwa e-Danube. U-Ateş Kara we-Turkish Health Ministry uthe amakhithi okuhlola i-Turkeyewathenge e-China atholakala ene- "zinga eliphakeme lamaphutha" futhi awazange a-"asetshenziswe." I-UK yathenga amakhithi okuhlola eyizigidi ezingu-3.5 e-China kodwa ekuqaleni kuka-April 2020 yamemezela ukuthi awasebenziseki.
translated: ['UNdunankulu uMatovič uphakamise ukuthi lezi zilahlwe eDanube.U-Ateş Kara woMnyango Wezempilo waseTurkey uthe amakhithi okuhlola iTurkey athengwe eChina "anezinga eliphezulu lephutha" futhi akazange "awasebenzise." I-UK ithenge amakhithi okuhlola ayizigidi ezingu-3.5 eChina kodwa ekuqaleni kuka-Ephreli 2020 yamemezela ukuthi lezi azisebenziseka.']

sourceString: Testing, followed with quarantine of those who tested positive and tracing of those with whom the SARS-CoV-2 positive people had had contact, resulted in positive outcomes.
targetString: Ukuhlola, kulandelwe ukuvalelwa kwalabo abatholakala beqinisekisa lapho behlolwa futhi kwalandelelwa labo bantu ababe nokuthintana nabantu ababonise ukuqinisekisa uma kuhlolelwa i-SARS-CoV-2, imiphumela ibe ukuqinisekisa nakhona.
translated: ['Ukuhlolwa, kwalandela ngokuvalwa kwalabo abahlolwe ukuthi banesifo nokulandelela labo abantu abane-SARS-CoV-2 ababexhumane nabo, kwaholela emiphumeleni emihle.']

sourceString: Researchers working in the Italian town of Vò, the site of the first COVID-19 death in Italy, conducted two rounds of testing on the entire population of about 3,400 people, about ten days apart.
targetString: Abacwaningi abasebenza edolobheni lase-Italy i-Vò, indawo yokufa kokuqala kwe-COVID-19 e-Italy, baqondisa ukujikeleza okubili kokuhlola wlonke inani labantu abangu-3,400, okungenani izinsuku eziyishumi ngokuqhela.
translated: ['Abacwaningi abasebenza edolobheni lase-Italy iVò, indawo yokufa kokuqala kwe-COVID-19 e-Italy, benza imijikelezo emibili yokuhlolwa kubantu bonke abangaba ngu-3 400, cishe izinsuku eziyishumi.']

sourceString: About half the people testing positive had no symptoms, and all discovered cases were quarantined.
targetString: Okungenani ingxenye yabantu abaqisekisa lapho behlolwa babenganazo izimpawu, futhi zonke izibonelo ezatholakala zavalelwa.
translated: ['Cishe ingxenye yabantu abahlolwe ukuthi banesifo babengenazo izimpawu, futhi zonke izigameko ezitholakele zazivalelwe.']

sourceString: With travel to the commune restricted, this eliminated new infections completely.
targetString: Njengoba ukuvakashelana kukhawuliwe, lokhu kususa ukuthelelana okusha ngokuphelele.
translated: ['Njengoba ukuhamba ku-commune kuvinjelwe, lokhu kwaqeda izifo ezintsha ngokuphelele.']

sourceString: With aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, the 2020 coronavirus pandemic in Singapore has proceeded much more slowly than in other developed countries, but without extreme restrictions like forced closure of restaurants and retail establishments.
targetString: Ngokulandelela abathintiwe ngomdlandla, ukuvakasha okungenayo kukhawuliwe, ukuhlola, nokuvalela, ubhubhane luka-2020 lwe-coronavirus e-Singapore luqhubeke ngokunensa kakhulu kunamanye amazwe athuthukile, kodwa ngaphandle kwemingcele enzima njengokuphoqa ukuvalwa kwezitolo zokudla nezinye zokudayisa.
translated: ['Ngokulandelela abathintekayo ngobudlova, imikhawulo yokuhamba engenayo, ukuhlolwa, nokuvalelisa, ubhubhane lwe-coronavirus lwe-2020 eSingapore luqhubeke kancane kakhulu kwamanye amazwe athuthukile, kodwa ngaphandle kwemikhawulo eyedlulele njengokuvalwa ngenkani kwezindawo zokudlela nezindawo zokuthengisa.']

sourceString: Many events have been cancelled, and Singapore did start advising residents to stay at home on 28 March, but schools reopened on time after holiday break on 23 March.
targetString: Izenzakalo eziningi zikhanseliwe, futhi i-Singapore yaqala ukweluleka izakhamuzi ukuthi zihlale emakhaya ngo-28 March, kodwa izikole zavula ngesikhathi ngemuva kwekhefu lamaholidi ngo-23 March.
translated: ['Imicimbi eminingi ikhanseliwe, futhi iSingapore yaqala ukweluleka abahlali ukuthi bahlale emakhaya ngomhlaka-28 Mashi, kodwa izikole zavulwa ngesikhathi ngemuva kwekhefu lamaholidi ngomhlaka-23 Mashi.']

sourceString: Several other countries have also managed the pandemic with aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, but with less aggressive lock-downs, such as Iceland and South Korea.
targetString: Amazwe amaningana nawo akwazile ukunakekela ubhubhane ngomdlandla wokulandelela abathintanile, ukukhawula uhambo lwangaphakathi, ukuhlola, nokuvalelwa, kodwa ngezinga elincane ekuvaleni-phansi, njenge-Iceland ne-South Korea.
translated: ['Amanye amazwe amaningana nawo aphathe lolu bhubhane ngokulandelela abathintekayo ngobudlova, imikhawulo yokuhamba engenayo, ukuhlolwa, nokuvalelisa, kodwa ngokukhiya okuncane okunobudlova, njenge-Iceland neNingizimu Korea.']

sourceString: A statistical study has found that countries that have tested more, relative to the number of deaths, have much lower case fatality rates, probably because these countries are better able to detect those with only mild or no symptoms.
targetString: Ucwaningo lwezibalo luthole ukuthi amazwe ahlole ngokwengeziwe, uma kuqhathaniswa nesibalo sabafile, anezibonelo eziphansi zamazinga okufa, okungabangelwa isizathu sokuthi asesimweni esingcono sokuphenya labo abanezimpawu ezintukuntuku noma abangenazo nhlobo.
translated: ['Ucwaningo lwezibalo luthole ukuthi amazwe ahlole kakhulu, uma kuqhathaniswa nenani lokufa, anamazinga aphansi kakhulu okufa kwamacala, mhlawumbe ngoba la mazwe akwazi kangcono ukuthola labo abanezimpawu ezincane kuphela noma abangenazo.']

sourceString: WHO recommends that countries that do not have testing capacity and national laboratories with limited experience on COVID-19 send their first five positives and the first ten negative COVID-19 samples to one of the 16 WHO reference laboratories for confirmatory testing.
targetString: I-WHO ikhuthaza ukuthi amazwe angenawo amandla okuqukatha ukuhlola futhi anamalebhu esizwe anokuhlangenwe nakho okulinganiselwe nge-COVID-19 athumele amasampula aqinisekayo amahlanu okuqala nayishumi andulayo e-COVID-19 kweyodwa yamalebhu okuthenjwa angu-16 e-WHO azoqinisekisa ukuhlola.
translated: ['I-WHO incoma ukuthi amazwe angenayo amandla okuhlola kanye nama-laboratories kazwelonke anesipiliyoni esilinganiselwe ku-COVID-19 athumele ama-positive awo okuqala amahlanu kanye namasampula ayishumi okuqala amabi e-COVID-19 kwelinye lama-laboratories angu-16 okubhekisela ku-WHO ukuhlolwa kokuqinisekisa.']

sourceString: Out of the 16 reference laboratories, 7 are in Asia, 5 in Europe, 2 in Africa, 1 in North America and 1 in Australia.
targetString: Phakathi kwamalebhu okuthenjwa angu-16, angu-7 ase-Asia, angu-5 ase-Europe, angu-2 ase-Africa, engu-1 ise-North America futhi engu-1 ise-Australia.
translated: ['Kuma-laboratories angu-16 okubhekisela, angu-7 ase-Asia, angu-5 eYurophu, angu-2 e-Afrika, angu-1 eNyakatho Melika no-1 e-Australia.']

sourceString: In the following chart, the column “Positive as % of tests” is influenced by the country's testing policy.
targetString: Eshadini elilandelayo, ikholamu “Okuqinisekisayo % kokuhlola” kuthonywa inqubomgomo yokuhlola kwezwe.
translated: ['Eshadini elilandelayo, ikholomu ethi "Positive as % of tests" ithonywa inqubomgomo yokuhlola yezwe.']

sourceString: A country that only tests people admitted to hospitals will have a higher positive as % of tests than a country that tests all citizens, whether or not they are showing symptoms, other things being equal.
targetString: Izwe elihlola kuphela abantu abamukelwe ezibhedlela lizoba nabaningi abaqinisekiswayo nge-% yokuhlola kunezwe elihlola zonke izakhamuzi zalo, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi babonisa izimpawu yini noma cha, ezinye izinto zilingane.
translated: ['Izwe elihlola kuphela abantu abangeniswe ezibhedlela lizoba nokuhlolwa okuphezulu njenge-% yokuhlolwa kunezwe elihlola zonke izakhamuzi, noma ngabe zikhombisa izimpawu noma cha, ezinye izinto ziyalingana.']

sourceString: Hand washing (or handwashing), also known as hand hygiene, is the act of cleaning one's hands for the purpose of removing soil, grease, microorganisms, or other unwanted substances.
targetString: Ukuhlanza izandla (noma ukuwash'izandla), okaziwa futhi ngokuthi inhlanzeko yezandla, isenzo sokuzicoca izandla ngenhloso yokususa inhlabathi, ugrisi, izinto ezincane, noma izitaputapu ezingafuneki.
translated: ['Ukugeza izandla (noma ukugeza izandla), okwaziwa nangokuthi ukuhlanzeka kwezandla, kuyisenzo sokuhlanza izandla zomuntu ngenhloso yokususa umhlabathi, amafutha, ama-microorganisms, noma ezinye izinto ezingafuneki.']

sourceString: Hand washing with soap consistently at certain "critical moments" during the day prevents the spread of many diseases, for example diarrhoea and cholera, which are transmitted through fecal–oral route.
targetString: Ukuhlanza izandla ngensipho ngokungalibali kulezo "zikhathi ezibucayi" phakathi nosuku kuvikela ukusabalala kwezifo eziningi, ngokwesibonelo uhudo nekholera, okuthelelana ngenqubo yendle–yomlomo.
translated: ['Ukugeza izandla ngensipho ngokungaguquki "ngezikhathi ezibucayi" ezithile emini kuvimbela ukusabalala kwezifo eziningi, isibonelo isifo sohudo nekholera, ezidluliselwa ngomzila we-fecal-oral.']

sourceString: People can also become infected with respiratory diseases such as influenza or the common cold, for example, if they do not wash their hands before touching their eyes, nose, or mouth (i.e., mucous membranes).
