sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: Umuzwa ovamile womphakathi emhlabeni ubonakala uwukudangala ngokuphazamiseka kodwa ukukhululeka ngokucaciselwa namathuba okugxila emiphakathini yabo, i-Wikimedia kanye nokunye.
translated: ['Umqondo ojwayelekile ovela emphakathini womhlaba wonke ubonakala udabukile kokubili ngokuphazamiseka kodwa ukukhululeka ngokucacile kanye nekhono lokugxila emiphakathini yabo, i-Wikimedia nokunye.']

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, i-CRT isebenzela ukusetha ikhasi ku-Meta-Wiki ukuze kunikezwe isikhala somphakathi ukuze ubheke igalelo elibe khona futhi ulandele izingxoxo zethu nawo.
translated: ['Ukuya phambili, i-CRT isebenzela ukusetha ikhasi ku-Meta-Wiki ukuhlinzeka ngendawo yokuthi umphakathi uqaphe umthelela futhi ulandele ukuxhumana kwethu nabo.']

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: Ukuhlala sixhumene ngezindaba ezihlobene ne-COVID-19
translated: ['Ukuhlala uxhumana ngezindaba ezihlobene ne-COVID-19']

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: Sizothumela isimemo kumakhalenda akho ngoLwesine oluzayo, ngo-14:00 UTC/07:00 PT somhlangano okhethekile wezisebenzi.
translated: ['Sizobe sithumela isimemo kumakhalenda akho ngoLwesine oluzayo, 14: 00 UTC / 07: 00 PT emhlanganweni okhethekile wabasebenzi.']

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: Sizosebenzisa lesi sikhathi ukuze sabelane ngezinye izibuyekezo, siphendule imibuzo yakho futhi sichithe isikhathi esithile sixhumana.
translated: ['Sizosebenzisa lesi sikhathi ukwabelana ngezibuyekezo ezengeziwe, ukuphendula imibuzo yakho futhi sichithe isikhathi esithile ukuxhumana nomunye.']

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: Sisebenza ndawonye futhi sizokusiza nomaphi lapho sikwazi khona.
translated: ['Sikulokhu ndawonye futhi lapha ukusiza noma kunjalo singakwazi.']

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: Okwamanje, ungaqhubeka uthola ulwazi kule imeyili, nalo lonke olunye ulwazi olusemqoka lwe-COVID-19 oluhlobene, ku-Office Wiki.
translated: ['Okwamanje, ungaqhubeka nokuthola ulwazi oluvela kule imeyili, nayo yonke eminye imininingwane ebalulekile ehlobene ne-COVID-19, ku-Office Wiki.']

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: I-CRT izogcina la makhasi ebuyekeziwe nalo lonke ulwazi lusendaweni eyodwa.
translated: ['I-CRT izogcina la makhasi ebuyekeziwe nalo lonke ulwazi endaweni eyodwa.']

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: Siyasebenza futhi ukuze sigcine ukuxhumana kwasikhathi sonke nezisebenzi ezihlala emazweni okwamanje athinteke kakhulu.
translated: ['Sisebenzela futhi ukugcina ukuxhumana njalo nabasebenzi abahlala emazweni athinteka kakhulu njengamanje.']

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: Uma unemibuzo ngokuhamba, izenzakalo, umzila womsebenzi omkhulu, inselele yekhavareji, nanoma yini enye ongase udinge usizo kuyo, sicela unganqikazi ukutshela futhi usebenze ne-CRT.
translated: ['Uma unemibuzo mayelana nokuhamba, imicimbi, umsebenzi omkhulu, noma inselelo yokumboza, noma yini enye ongadinga usizo ngayo, sicela unganqikazi ukwazisa nokusebenza ne-CRT.']

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: Silapha ukuze sisize ekusekeleni nasekuxhumaniseni uma kudingeka.
translated: ['Silapha ukusiza ukuhlinzeka ukwesekwa noxhumana njengoba kudingeka.']

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: Uma unendaba eyimfihlo noma ebucayi, sicela uthumele i-imeyili kuBryan Judan - Umqondisi we-HR International Global Operations.
translated: ['Uma unodaba oluyimfihlo noma olubucayi, sicela uthumele i-imeyili uBryan Judan - Umqondisi we-HR International Global Operations.']

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: Azikho kulezi zinguquko okufanele zibhekwe njengokushiya umsebenzi nezibopho zethu.
translated: ['Akukho kulezi zinguquko okufanele kubonwe njengokulahla umsebenzi nezibopho zethu.']

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: Kunalokho, ziwukuqaphela ukuthi kulesi sikhathi, umsebenzi nezibopho zethu cishe kuzodinga ukuvunyelaniswa ngendlela engakaze ibe khona ngaphambili.
translated: ['Kunalokho, ziwukuqaphela ukuthi ngalesi sikhathi, umsebenzi wethu nezibopho zethu cishe kuzodingeka zivumelane ngendlela esingekho ngayo esikhathini esedlule.']

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: Lezi izinyathelo ezikholelwa ukuthi ziyadingeka ukuze sisekelane ukuze siqhubeke nomsebenzi, sinikeze iqembu lethu ukusekela elikudingayo, nomhlaba siwunike isevisi othembele kuyo.
translated: ['Lezi yizinyathelo esikholelwa ukuthi ziyadingeka ukusekelana lokhu ukuze siqhubeke nokusebenza, sinikeze ukunyakaza kwethu ukwesekwa abakudingayo, kanye nomhlaba ngenkonzo abathembele kuyo.']

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: Umsebenzi esiwuhlelile uzobe usilindile uma isikhathi sifika.
translated: ['Umsebenzi wethu ohleliwe uzoba khona usilindile uma kufika isikhathi.']

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: Okwamanje, yisikhathi sokusekelana futhi kwakhiwe isikhala somsebenzi obalulekile ongase ube khona emavikini kanye nasezinyangeni ezizayo.
translated: ['Okwamanje, sekuyisikhathi sokusekelana nokudala isikhala somsebenzi obalulekile ozobe ufika emasontweni futhi okungenzeka izinyanga ezizayo.']

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: Sidinga ukuba nonke nikwenze kwenzeke lokho, ngakho sidinga ukuba nonke nizinakekele nina nemindeni yenu ukuze nibe senikulungele ngokugcwele lapho isidingo siphakama.
translated: ['Sidinga nonke ukuba nenze lokho kwenzeke, futhi ngakho sidinga ukuba nonke nizinakekele wena nemindeni yenu ukuze nikwazi ukuba sezingeni lakho uma kuvela isidingo.']

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: Manje, siyacela -- gezani izandla zenu futhi ningazithinti ebusweni!
translated: ['Manje, sicela -- geza izandla zakho futhi ungathinti ubuso bakho!']

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
targetString: UKatherine, i-CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), nalo lonke Ithimba Labaholi (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
translated: ['UKatherine, i-CRT (u-Amanda K, u-Amy V, uBryan J, uDoreen D, uGregory V, uJaime V, uJoel L, uLynette L, uRyan M, noTony S), kanye nalo lonke iThimba Lobuholi (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, noTony N).']

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: I-b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) yi-enzyme ehlezi ngaphandle (kulwelwesi lweseli) kwamaseli emaphashini, imithambo, inhliziyo, izinso, namathumbu.
translated: ["i-enzyme eguqula i-b'Angiotensin 2 (ACE2) iyi-enzyme enamathiselwe ebusweni bangaphandle (ulwelwesi lwamaseli) lwamaseli emaphashini, imithambo, inhliziyo, izinso, namathumbu."]

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: I-ACE2 ilwa nokusebenza kwe-angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) ngokunciphisa inani le-angiotensin-II nokukhuphula i-Ang(1-7) iyenze ibe umuthi othembisayo wokwelapha izifo zenhliziyo negazi. I-ACE2 iphinde isebenze njengendawo yokungena kumaseli kuma-coronavirus athile.
translated: ['I-ACE2 iphikisana nomsebenzi we-enzyme ehlobene ne-angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) ngokunciphisa inani le-angiotensin-II nokwandisa i-Ang (1-7) okwenza kube yinto ethembisayo yezidakamizwa zokwelapha izifo zenhliziyo. I-ACE2 iphinde isebenze njengendlela yokungena kumaseli amanye ama-coronavirus.']

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: Uhlobo lomuntu lwe-enzyme kuvame ukubhekiselwa kulo ngokuthi yi-hACE2.
translated: ['Inguqulo yomuntu ye-enzyme ivame ukubizwa ngokuthi i-hACE2.']

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: I-angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 iyi-metalloenzyme ene-zinc etholakala ebusweni be-endothelial namanye amaseli.
translated: ['I-enzyme eguqula i-Angiotensin 2 iyi-zinc equkethe i-metalloenzyme etholakala ebusweni be-endothelial namanye amaseli.']

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: Iphrotheni le-ACE2 liqukethe idomeyini ye-N-terminal peptidase M2 kanye nedomeyini ye-C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter.
translated: ['Iprotheni ye-ACE2 iqukethe isizinda se-N-terminal peptidase M2 kanye nesizinda se-C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter.']

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: I-ACE2 iyiphrotheni yolwelwesi ewuhlobo I olunomzila owodwa, enedomeyini yayo esebenza ngama-enzyme echayeke ebusweni bamaseli emaphashini nakwezinye izicubu.
translated: ['I-ACE2 uhlobo olulodwa lwe-pass I membrane protein, nesizinda sayo esisebenzayo se-enzymatically esivezwe ebusweni beseli emaphashini nakwezinye izicubu.']

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: Idomeyini yangaphandle kweseli ye-ACE2 ihlukaniswa ukusuka kudomeyini ye-transmembrane nge-enzyme eyaziwa ngokuthi yi-sheddase, futhi iphrotheni encibilikayo eba khona ikhishelwa egazini futhi ekugcineni iphumela emchamweni.
translated: ['Isizinda se-extracellular se-ACE2 si-cleaved kusuka kusizinda se-transmembrane ngenye i-enzyme eyaziwa ngokuthi i-sheddase, futhi amaprotheni ancibilikayo aphumela akhishwa emfudlaneni wegazi futhi ekugcineni akhishwe kumchamo.']

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: I-ACE2 ikhona ezakhini zomzimba eziningi: i-ACE2 ihlangene nolwelwesi lweseli ikakhulu lwamaseli ohlobo II e-alveolar, ama-enterocytes amathumbu amancane, amaseli e-arterial nawe-venous endothelial namaseli ezicubu abushelelezi e-arterial ezakhini zomzimba eziningi.
translated: ['I-ACE2 ikhona ezithweni eziningi: I-ACE2 inamathele ku-membrane yeseli ikakhulukazi uhlobo lwamaphaphu II alveolar amaseli, ama-enterocytes emathunjini amancane, amaseli e-arterial kanye ne-venous endothelial kanye namaseli emisipha ebushelelezi ye-arterial ezithweni eziningi.']

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: I-ACE2 mRNA itholakala naku-cerebral cortex, ku-striatum, ku-hypothalamus, naku-brainstem.
translated: ['Ukubonakaliswa kwe-ACE2 mRNA kutholakala naku-cortex ye-cerebral, i-striatum, i-hypothalamus, ne-brainstem.']

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: Umsebenzi oyinhloko we-ACE2 uwukusebenza njengebhalansi ye-ACE.
translated: ['Umsebenzi oyinhloko we-ACE2 ukusebenza njengebhalansi yokuphikisana ne-ACE.']

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: I-ACE ihlukanisa ihomoni ye-angiotensin I ibe yi-vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
translated: ['ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone ku vasoconstricting angiotensin II.']

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: I-ACE2 ihlukanisa i-carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine ukusuka ku-angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) bese uyihlukanisa ibe yi-vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
translated: ['I-ACE2 nayo i-cleaves i-carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine evela ku-angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) futhi i-hydrolyses ibe yi-vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).']

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: ACE2 ingaphinde ihlukanise amanye ama-peptides amaningana okubandakanya i-[des-Arg9]-bradykinin, i-apelin, i-neurotensin, i-dynorphin A, ne-ghrelin.
translated: ['I-ACE2 nayo ingakwazi ukukhipha amanye ama-peptide amaningi kufaka phakathi [des-Arg9] -bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, ne-ghrelin.']

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: I-ACE2 iphinde ilawule ukuhamba kolwelwesi lwe-neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 futhi luhlanganisiwe esifweni sika-Hartnup.
translated: ['I-ACE2 iphinde ilawule ukuthengiswa kwe-membrane ye-amino acid transporter engathathi hlangothi i-SLC6A19 futhi iye yabandakanyeka kwisifo sikaHartnup.']

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: Njengephrotheni eliyi-transmembrane, i-ACE2 isebenza njengendawo yokungena eyinhloko kumaseli ama-coronavirus athile, okubandakanya i-HCoV-NL63; i-SARS-CoV (igciwane elibangela i-SARS); ne-SARS-CoV-2 (igciwane elibangela i-COVID-19).
translated: ['Njengeprotheni ye-transmembrane, i-ACE2 isebenza njengendawo eyinhloko yokungena kumaseli amanye ama-coronavirus, kufaka phakathi i-HCoV-NL63; I-SARS-CoV (igciwane elibangela i-SARS); ne-SARS-CoV-2 (igciwane elibangela i-COVID-19).']

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: Ngokuqondile, ukuhlangana kwephrotheni le-spike S1 ye-SARS-CoV ne-SARS-CoV2 kudomeyini eyi-enzyme ye-ACE2 ebusweni bamaseli kuphumela ku-endocytosis nakuhambeni kwakho kokubili igciwane ne-enzyme kuye ku-endosomes ephakathi kwamaseli.
translated: ['Ngokuqondile, ukubopha iprotheni ye-spike S1 ye-SARS-CoV ne-SARS-CoV2 kusizinda se-enzymatic se-ACE2 ebusweni bamangqamuzana kuphumela ku-endocytosis kanye ne-translocation kokubili igciwane kanye ne-enzyme ibe yi-endosomes etholakala ngaphakathi kwamaseli.']

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: Le nqubo yokungena iphinde idinge ukwenza i-S protein lenziwe lisebenze yi-serine protease TMPRSS2, isivimbeli esingaphansi kophenyo lwamanje njengesingaba yikhambi lesifo. Lokhu kuye kwaholela abathile ukuba baphethe ngokuthi ukunciphisa amaleveli e-ACE2, kumaseli, kungasiza ekulweni negciwane.
translated: ['Le nqubo yokungena iphinde idinga i-priming yamaprotheni e-S yi-host serine protease TMPRSS2, ukuvinjelwa kwayo okuphenywa njengamanje njengokwelashwa okungenzeka. Lokhu kuholele abanye ekutheni bacabanga ukuthi ukwehla kwamazinga e-ACE2, kumaseli, kungasiza ekulweni nalesi sifo.']

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: Nokho, izinhlangano eziningi eziphambili nezindikimba ezisebenzayo zikhuthaze ukuqhubeka ngesivimbeli esivamile se-ACE nokwelapha nge-ARB.
translated: ['Kodwa-ke, imiphakathi eminingi yobungcweti kanye nezinhlaka zokulawula ziye zancoma ukuqhubeka nokwelashwa okujwayelekile kwe-ACE inhibitor ne-ARB.']

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: Ukubuyekeza okuhleliwe nokuhlaziya okushicilelwe ngo-July 11, 2012, kuthole ukuthi "ukusebenzisa izivimbeli ze-ACE kwakuhlobene nokuncipha okukhulu okungu-34% engozini ye-pneumonia uma kuqhathaniswa nezilawuli."
translated: ['Ukubuyekezwa okuhlelekile nokuhlaziywa kwe-meta okushicilelwe ngoJulayi 11, 2012, kwathola ukuthi "ukusetshenziswa kwe-ACE inhibitors kwakuhlotshaniswa nokunciphisa okukhulu kwe-34% engozini ye-pneumonia uma kuqhathaniswa nokulawula."']

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: Ngaphezu kwalokho, "ingozi ye-pneumonia iye yancishiswa ezigulini ezelashwa ngezivimbeli ze-ACE ebezisengozini enkulu ye-pneumonia, ikakhulu lezo ezisifo sikanhlangothi nenhliziyo.
translated: ['Ngaphezu kwalokho, "ingozi ye-pneumonia nayo yancishiswa ezigulini eziphathwe nge-ACE inhibitors ezazisengozini enkulu ye-pneumonia, ikakhulukazi lezo ezinesifo sohlangothi nokuhluleka kwenhliziyo.']

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: Ukusetshenziswa kwezivimbeli ze-ACE kuye kwaphinde kwahlotshaniswa nokuncipha kweziguli ezibulawa yi-pneumonia, nakuba imiphumela ibingemibi kangako kunomonakalo ongadalwa yi-pneumonia."
translated: ['Ukusetshenziswa kwe-ACE inhibitors nakho kwakuhlotshaniswa nokwehliswa kokufa okuhlobene ne-pneumonia, nakuba imiphumela yayingaphansi kokuqina kunengozi yonke ye-pneumonia."']

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Isakhi esiyinhlanganisela somuntu i-ACE2 (rhACE2) kucatshangelwa ukuthi siyindlela yokwelapha entsha yokulimala kwephaphu okubi kakhulu, futhi kubonakala kuthuthukisa i-pulmonary hemodynamics ukuphuma komoya-mpilo ezingulubeni ezine-lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
translated: ['I-Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) icatshangelwa ukuthi iyindlela yokwelapha inoveli yokulimala kwamaphaphu okubukhali, futhi yabonakala ithuthukisa i-pulmonary hemodynamics kanye nokugcwala komoya-mpilo ezingulubeni ezine-lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.']

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: Uhhafu we-rhACE2 kubantu uthatha amahora angu-10 ukusebenza futhi uqala ukusebenza ngemva kwemizuzu engu-30 ngaphezu kwesikhathi osisebenzayo (inkathi) engamahora angu-24.
translated: ['Ukuphila kwesigamu se-rhACE2 kubantu cishe amahora angu-10 futhi ukuqala kwesenzo kuyimizuzu engu-30 ngaphezu kwenkambo yomphumela (isikhathi) samahora angu-24.']

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Ucwaningo oluthile lubonisa ukuthi i-rhACE2 lungaba umuthi ofanele walabo abangakwazi ukuphuza ama-renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) avamile noma ezifweni lapho i-angiotensin II ejikezelayo isidlondlobele. Ukugcwaliswa kwe-rhACE2 kuye kwahlolwa ocwaningweni lwezokwelapha ekwelapheni i-acute respiratory distress syndrome.
translated: ['Okutholakele okuningana kusikisela ukuthi i-rhACE2 ingaba yisidakamizwa esithembisayo kulabo abanokungabekezelelani ku-classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) noma ezifweni lapho ukujikeleza kwe-angiotensin II kuphakanyiswa khona. I-rhACE2 efakiwe ihlolwe ekuhlolweni komtholampilo ekwelapheni i-acute respiratory distress syndrome.']

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: Ama-app e-b'COVID-19 ayizinhlelo zesofthiwe yeselula eziklanyelwe ukusiza uthole izinombolo ngokuqondene nomqedazwe wango-2019-20 we-coronavirus, njengenqubo yokuthola abantu ("abathintwayo") okungenzeka baye bathintana nomuntu onegciwane.
translated: ['Izinhlelo zokusebenza ze-b\'COVID-19 yizicelo zesofthiwe yeselula ezenzelwe ukusiza ukulandelela abathintekayo ekuphenduleni ubhubhane lwe-coronavirus lwe-2019-20, okungukuthi inqubo yokuhlonza abantu ("oxhumana nabo") okungenzeka ukuthi bebexhumana nomuntu onegciwane.']

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: Kuye kwasungulwa noma kwacatshangelwa izinhlelo eziningana, ngokusekela komthetho kahulumeni kwezinye izindawo.
translated: ['Izicelo eziningi zakhiwa noma zaphakanyiswa, ngokusekelwa okusemthethweni kukahulumeni kwezinye izindawo nasezindaweni.']

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: Kuye kwasungulwa amafremuwekhi okwakha ama-app okuthungatha othintwayo.
translated: ['Izinhlaka eziningana zokwakha izinhlelo zokusebenza zokulandelela abathintekayo ziye zakhiwa.']

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: Kuye kwavezwa ukukhathazeka kobumfihlo, ikakhulukazi mayelana namasistimu asekelwe ekulandeleleni indawo abasebenzisi be-app abakuyo.
translated: ['Ukukhathazeka kobumfihlo kuphakanyisiwe, ikakhulukazi mayelana nezinhlelo ezisekelwe ekulandeleni indawo yendawo yabasebenzisi bohlelo lokusebenza.']

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Ezinye izindlela ezingadingi ulwazi oluyimfihlo zibandakanya ukusetshenziswa kwamasignali eBluetooth ukuze kufakwe indawo umsebenzisi akuyo kwamanye amaselula.
translated: ['Ezinye izindlela ezingangeneleli kangako zihlanganisa ukusetshenziswa kwezimpawu ze-Bluetooth ukuloga ukusondela komsebenzisi kwamanye omakhalekhukhwini.']

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-10 April 2020, i-Google ne-Apple zamemezela ukuthi zizokwakha indlela ukuze zisekele ama-app anjalo eBluetooth ngokuqondile kuma-OS e-Android ne-iOS.
translated: ['Ngo-10 April 2020, i-Google ne-Apple ngokuhlanganyela bamemezela ukuthi bazohlanganisa ukusebenza ukusekela izinhlelo zokusebenza ezinjalo ezisekelwe ku-Bluetooth ngqo ezinhlelweni zabo zokusebenza ze-Android ne-iOS.']

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: EChina, uhulumeni waseChina, usebenzelana ne-Alipay, usungule i-app evumela izakhamuzi ukuba zihlole ukuthi ziye zathintana yini nabantu abane-COVID-19.
translated: ['E-China, uhulumeni waseChina, ngokubambisana ne-Alipay, uthumele uhlelo lokusebenza oluvumela izakhamuzi ukuthi zihlole ukuthi ziye zaxhumana yini nabantu abane-COVID-19.']

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: Isetshenziswa emadolobheni angaphezu kuka-200 eChina. ESingapore, kusetshenziswa i-app ebizwa ngokuthi yi-TraceTogether.
translated: ['Isetshenziswa kuwo wonke amadolobha angaphezu kuka-200 aseShayina. ESingapore, kusetshenziswa uhlelo lokusebenza olubizwa ngeTraceTogether.']

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: Le app yasungulwa izisebenzi ze-IT zasendaweni, yakhishwa njengewuthombo ovulekile futhi izonikezwa uhulumeni. ENyakatho Macedonia kwakhishwa i-"StopKorona!", i-app esebenza ngeBluetooth ukuze kulandelelwe ukuchayeka kubantu okungenzeka banegciwane futhi kunikezwe ukusabela okusheshayo eziphathimandleni zezempilo.
translated: ['Uhlelo lokusebenza lwakhiwe ngumphakathi we-IT wendawo, lukhishwe njengomthombo ovulekile futhi luzonikezelwa kuhulumeni. INorth Macedonia yethule i- "StopKorona!", Uhlelo lokusebenza olusekelwe ku-Bluetooth ukulandelela ukuvezwa nabantu abangaba negciwane futhi lunikeze impendulo esheshayo kubaphathi bezempilo.']

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: Le app yasungulwa uMnyango Wezokuxhumana Nezobuchwepheshe noMnyango Wezempilo.
translated: ['Uhlelo lokusebenza lwakhiwe nguMnyango Wezokuxhumana Nobuchwepheshe kanye noMnyango Wezempilo.']

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: Kusukela ngomhla ka-14 April 2020, le app yayilindele ukugunyazwa yi-Google Play Store ne-Apple App Store.
translated: ['Kusukela ngo-14 Ephreli 2020, uhlelo lokusebenza lwalulindele imvume yi-Google Play Store ne-Apple App Store.']

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: Ngomhla ka-12 April, uhulumeni wathi i-app yokuthungatha umuntu yayisezingeni elithuthukile lokusungulwa, futhi yayizotholakalela ukukhishwa emavikini ambalwa. Kulungiselelwa i-app efanayo e-Ireland, naseFrance ("StopCovid").
translated: ['Ngomhlaka-12 Ephreli, uhulumeni wachaza ukuthi uhlelo lokusebenza lokulandelela abathintekayo lusesigabeni esiphezulu sokuthuthukiswa, futhi luzotholakala ukuze luthunyelwe kungakapheli amasonto. Uhlelo lokusebenza olufanayo luhlelwe e-Ireland, naseFrance ("StopCovid").']

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
targetString: Kokubili i-Australia neNew Zealand zicabangela ama-app asekelwe ku-app yaseSingapore i-TraceTogether nephrothokholi ye-BlueTrace. IRussia ihlose ukusungula i-app ebonisayo lapho umuntu eqa imingcele ayibekelwe yeziguli ezitholwe zine-COVID-19 ezihlala eMoscow, eklanyelwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abaphumi emakhaya.
translated: ['Bobabili i-Australia neNew Zealand bacabangela izinhlelo zokusebenza ezisekelwe kuhlelo lokusebenza lwe-TraceTogether lwaseSingapore kanye ne-BlueTrace protocol. IRussia ihlose ukwethula uhlelo lokusebenza lwe-geofencing lweziguli ezitholakale zine-COVID-19 ezihlala eMoscow, ezenzelwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi azishiyi ekhaya.']

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: URoss Anderson, uprofesa ongunjiniyela kwezokuvikeleka eCambridge University, ubale izinto eziningana ezingaba yinkinga ngamasistimu e-app, okubandakanya izixwayiso ezidukisayo namathuba okungasitholi isixwayiso uma amandla e-app elinganiselwe enanini elincane kuphela labantu.
translated: ['URoss Anderson, uprofesa wezobunjiniyela bezokuphepha eCambridge University, ubhale izinkinga eziningi ezingaba khona ezisebenzayo ngezinhlelo ezisekelwe kuhlelo lokusebenza, kufaka phakathi izinto ezinhle zamanga kanye nokuntuleka okungenzeka kokusebenza uma ukuthatha uhlelo lokusebenza kukhawulelwe engxenyeni encane kuphela yabantu.']

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: Ukuze ixazulule izinkinga ezimayelana nokubhebhetheka kwama-app "e-coronavirus" adukisayo noma ayingozi, i-Apple ibeke imingcele ezinhlotsheni zezinhlangano ezingafaka ama-app e-coronavirus ku-App Store yayo, yathi kuzoba yilawo "asemthethweni" kuphela noma izinhlangano ezethenjwayo.
translated: ['Ukubhekana nokukhathazeka mayelana nokusabalala kwezinhlelo zokusebenza ezidukisayo noma eziyingozi "ze-coronavirus", i-Apple yabeka imikhawulo lapho izinhlobo zezinhlangano zingangeza khona izinhlelo zokusebenza ezihlobene ne-coronavirus ku-App Store yayo, zibakhawulele ezinhlanganweni "ezisemthethweni" kuphela noma ezidumile ngenye indlela.']

sourceString: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.
targetString: I-Google ne-Amazon zisungule imingcele efanayo.
translated: ['I-Google ne-Amazon basebenzise imikhawulo efanayo.']

sourceString: Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.
targetString: Amaqabane alwela ubumfihlo aveze ukukhathazeka kwawo ngokuqondene nezinkinga zokuthungatha uquqaba lwabantu kusetshenziswa ama-app e-coronavirus, ngokukhethekile mayelana nokuthi uhlelo lokuthungatha olusungulelwe ukusingatha umqedazwe we-coronavirus luzoqaqwa lapho lolu songo seludlulile.
translated: ['Abagqugquzeli bobumfihlo bazwakalise ukukhathazeka kwabo mayelana nemithelela yokuqapha ngobuningi besebenzisa izinhlelo zokusebenza ze-coronavirus, ikakhulukazi mayelana nokuthi ingqalasizinda yokuqapha edalwe ukubhekana nobhubhane lwe-coronavirus izodilizwa uma ingozi isidlulile.']

sourceString: Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: I-Amnesty International nezinye izinhlangano ezingaphezu kuka-100 zikhiphe isitatimende esibeka imingcele kulolu hlobo lokuthungatha.
translated: ['I-Amnesty International nezinye izinhlangano ezingaphezu kuka-100 zikhiphe isitatimende esithi kumele kube nemikhawulo kulolu hlobo lokuqapha.']

sourceString: The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:
targetString: Lezi zinhlangano zimise imibandela eyisishiyagalolunye kumaphrojekthi kahulumeni:
translated: ['Izinhlangano zamemezela izimo eziyisishiyagalombili kumaphrojekthi kahulumeni:']

sourceString: surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";
targetString: ukuthungatha kufanele kube "semthethweni, okudingekile futhi kufaneleke";
translated: ['ukuqapha kwakuzodingeka kube "semthethweni, kudingekile futhi kulingane";']

sourceString: extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;
targetString: ukwelulwa kwenkathi yokuqapha nokuthungatha kufanele kube nemibandela yokushona kwelanga;
translated: ['izandiso zokuqapha nokuqapha kuzodingeka zibe nezigatshana zokushona kwelanga;']

sourceString: the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;
targetString: ukusetshenziswa kwedatha kuzofanele kulinganiselwe ezinjongweni ze-COVID-19;
translated: ['ukusetshenziswa kwedatha kuzodingeka kukhawulelwe ezinhlosweni ze-COVID-19;']

sourceString: data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;
targetString: ukuvikeleka kwedatha nokungaziwa kwamagama kuzodingeka kuvikelwe futhi kuboniswe njengokuvikelwe ngokusekelwe ebufakazini;
translated: ['ukuphepha kwedatha nokungaziwa kuzodingeka kuvikelwe futhi kuboniswe ukuthi kuvikelwe ngokusekelwe ebufakazini;']

sourceString: digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;
targetString: ukuhlolwa okuyidijithali kuzofanele kugweme ukwehlisa ububi bobandlululo nokunciphisa ukubaluleka kwezinto;
translated: ['ukuqapha kwedijithali kuzodingeka kugweme ukukhulisa ubandlululo nokubekelwa eceleni;']

sourceString: any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;
targetString: noma ikuphi ukwabelana ngedatha nabanye abantu kuzofanelwe kuchazwe ngokomthetho;
translated: ['noma yikuphi ukwabelana ngemininingwane nabantu besithathu kuzodingeka kuchazwe emthethweni;']

sourceString: there would have to be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens to respond to abuses;
targetString: kuzofanele kube nokuqapha ngokumelene nokusetshenziswa kabi kanye namalungelo ezakhamuzi okusabela ekusetshenzisweni kabi;
translated: ['kuzodingeka kube khona izindlela zokuvikela ukuhlukunyezwa kanye namalungelo ezakhamuzi okuphendula ukuhlukunyezwa;']

sourceString: meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" would be required, including that of public health experts and marginalised groups.The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.
targetString: ukuhlanganyela ngendlela ewusizo yibo bonke "abaneqhaza" kuzodingeka, okubandakanya ochwepheshe bezempilo bomphakathi namaqembu amancane. I-German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) ne-Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) nazo zikhiphe izinhlu zokuhlola.
translated: ['kuzodingeka ukubamba iqhaza okunenjongo yibo bonke "ababambiqhaza abafanele", kufaka phakathi lokho kochwepheshe bezempilo yomphakathi kanye namaqembu abekelwe eceleni. I-German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) ne-Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) nayo ikhiphe uhlu lokuhlola.']

sourceString: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of persistent surveillance by removing the tracing mechanism from their device operating systems once it is no longer needed.
targetString: Uhlelo oluhlongozwayo lwe-Google/Apple luhlose ukulungisa inkinga yokulandelelwa njalo ngokukhipha umsebenzi wokuthungatha kuma-OS edivayisi lapho ungasadingeki.
translated: ['Uhlelo oluhlongozwayo lwe-Google / Apple luhlose ukubhekana nenkinga yokuqapha okuqhubekayo ngokususa indlela yokulandelela kusuka ezinhlelweni zabo zokusebenza zedivayisi uma kungasadingeki.']

sourceString: Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and the ability to avoid tracking.
targetString: Amanye amazwe abesebenzisa ukuthungatha indawo ngokusekelwe kunethiwekhi kunama-app, okuqeda kokubili isidingo sokudawuniloda i-app nokugwema ukulandelelwa.
translated: ['Amanye amazwe asebenzisa ukulandelela indawo esekelwe kunethiwekhi esikhundleni sezinhlelo zokusebenza, ukuqeda kokubili isidingo sokulanda uhlelo lokusebenza kanye nokukwazi ukugwema ukulandelela.']

sourceString: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.
targetString: E-Israel, ukulandelela okusekelwe kunethiwekhi kwagunyazwa.
translated: ['Kwa-Israyeli, ukulandelela okusekelwe kwinethiwekhi kwavunywa.']

sourceString: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy problems.
targetString: Izixazululo ezisekelwe kunethiwekhi ezinokufinyelela kudatha yendawo engahlungiwe zingaba nezinkinga ezinkulu zobumfihlo.
translated: ['Izixazululo ezisekelwe kunethiwekhi ezinamandla okufinyelela idatha yendawo eluhlaza zinezinkinga ezibalulekile zobumfihlo ezingaba khona.']

sourceString: However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).
targetString: Nokho, akuwona wonke amasistimu anamaseva amakhulu okudingeka athole ukufinyelela kudatha yendawo yomuntu; inani lamasistimu avikela ubumfihlo liye lakhiwa asebenzisa amaseva amakhulu ukuze axhumane kuphela (bheka isigaba esingezansi).
translated: ['Kodwa-ke, akuzona zonke izinhlelo ezinamaseva aphakathi okudingeka zikwazi ukufinyelela idatha yendawo yomuntu siqu; kudalwe izinhlelo eziningi zokulondoloza ubumfihlo ezisebenzisa amaseva aphakathi kuphela ukuxhumana (bheka isigaba ngezansi).']

sourceString: In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to perform contact tracing.
targetString: ENingizimu Korea, isistimu engasekelwe ku-app yasetshenziswa ukuze kulandelelwe umuntu.
translated: ['ENingizimu Korea, kwasetshenziswa uhlelo olungasekelwe kuhlelo lokusebenza ukwenza ukulandelela abathintekayo.']

sourceString: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system gathered tracking information from a variety of sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to generate notices via text messages to potentially-infected individuals.
targetString: Esikhundleni sokusebenzisa i-app eqokiwe, isistimu iqongelela ulwazi lokuthungatha emithonjeni ehlukahlukene okubandakanya idatha yokulandelela idivayisi eyiselula nedatha yokuthenga ngekhadi, futhi ihlanganise lokhu ukuze ithumele izaziso ngemiyalezo yombhalo kubantu okungenzeka banegciwane.
translated: ['Esikhundleni sokusebenzisa uhlelo lokusebenza oluzinikele, uhlelo lwaqoqa ulwazi lokulandelela oluvela emithonjeni ehlukahlukene kufaka phakathi idatha yokulandelela idivayisi yeselula nedatha yokuthengiselana kwekhadi, futhi lwahlanganisa lezi ukukhiqiza izaziso ngemiyalezo yombhalo kubantu abangaba negciwane.']

sourceString: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has also made the location information publicly available, something permitted because of far-reaching changes to information privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.
targetString: Ngaphezu kokusebenzisa lolu lwazi ukuze kuxwayiswe abantu okungenzeka bathole igciwane, uhulumeni iphinde yenza ulwazi lwendawo lwatholakalela umphakathi, okuyinto evunyelwe ngenxa yezinguquko eziningi emithethweni yobumfihlo ngemva kokuqubuka kwe-MERS kulelo zwe.
translated: ['Ngaphezu kokusebenzisa lolu lwazi ukuxwayisa abathintekayo abangaba khona, uhulumeni uphinde wenza ulwazi lwendawo lwatholakala esidlangalaleni, into evunyelwe ngenxa yezinguquko ezifinyelela kude emithethweni yobumfihlo yolwazi ngemuva kokuqubuka kwe-MERS kuleliya lizwe.']

sourceString: This information is available to the public via a number of apps and websites.Countries including Germany considered using both centralized and privacy-preserving systems.
targetString: Lolu lwazi lutholakalela umphakathi ngama-app namawebusayithi. Amazwe abandakanya iGermany acabangele ukusebenzisa kokubili amasistimu amakhulu nalawo avikela ubumfihlo.
translated: ['Lolu lwazi luyatholakala emphakathini ngezinhlelo zokusebenza eziningi namawebhusayithi. Amazwe ahlanganisa iJalimane acabanga ukusebenzisa kokubili izinhlelo eziphakathi nendawo kanye nokulondoloza ubumfihlo.']

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, the details had not yet been released.
targetString: Kusukela ngomhla ka-6 April 2020, imininingwane ayikakhishwa.
translated: ['Kusukela ngomhlaka-6 Ephreli 2020, imininingwane ibingakakhishwa.']

sourceString: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Ukulandelela okuvikela ubumfihlo buyindlela eklanywe kahle, enezincwadi zocwaningo eziningi ezisukela emuva okungenani ngo-2013. Kusukela ngomhla ka-7 April 2020, amaqembu ochwepheshe angaphezu kuka-12 abefuna izisombululo ezikwamukelayo ubumfihlo, njengokusebenzisa i-Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) ukuze usondelanise umsebenzisi namanye amaselula.
translated: ['Ukulandelela ukuxhumana okulondoloza ubumfihlo kungumqondo osungulwe kahle, onomzimba omkhulu wezincwadi zocwaningo ezisukela okungenani 2013.As-7 April 2020, amaqembu ochwepheshe angaphezu kweshumi ayesebenza ngezixazululo ezinobungane bobumfihlo, njengokusebenzisa i-Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) ukuloga ukusondela komsebenzisi kwamanye omakhalekhukhwini.']

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.
targetString: Nokho, i-PEPP-PT ingumzamo wokuxhumanisa oqukethe kokubili izindlela ezinkulu nezihlukahlukene, futhi ayiyona iphrothokholi eyodwa. Amaphrothokholi ahlukahlukene abandakanya i-Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), i-Temporary Contact Numbers (i-TCN, i-fka Contact Event Numbers, i-CEN), i-Privacy Sensitive Protocols ne-Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) namanye.
translated: ['Kodwa-ke, i-PEPP-PT ngumzamo wokusebenzisana oqukethe kokubili izindlela eziphakathi nendawo nezihlukanisiwe, futhi akuyona iphrothokholi eyodwa. Izivumelwano ezihlukanisiwe zihlanganisa i-Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT / DP-3T), Izinombolo Zokuxhumana Zesikhashana (tCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Amaphrothokholi Abucayi Wobumfihlo kanye Nezindlela Zokulandelela Imininingwane Yeselula (PACT) nabanye.']

sourceString: In these protocols, identifiable personal data never leaves the device, and all matching happens on-device.
targetString: Kulawa maphrothokholi, idatha yomuntu ebonakalayo ayilokothi ishiye idivayisi, futhi konke ukumatanisa kwenzeka kudivayisi.
translated: ['Kulezi zinqubomgomo, idatha yomuntu siqu ebonakalayo ayikaze ishiye idivayisi, futhi konke ukufanisa kwenzeka kudivayisi.']

sourceString: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: I-Privacy Group e-MIT Media Lab ibilokhu isungula i-SafePaths, ipulatifomu yokusebenzisa amasu okuvikela ubumfihlo lapho iqongelela futhi isebenzisa indawo noma idatha engumzila oyisinqamuleli ukuze kulandelelwe ukubhebhetheka kwe-COVID-19.
translated: ['Iqembu Lobumfihlo e-MIT Media Lab belilokhu lithuthukisa ama-SafePaths, ipulatifomu yokusebenzisa amasu okulondoloza ubumfihlo lapho uqoqa futhi usebenzisa idatha yendawo noma yokuhlangana kwendlela ukulandelela ukusabalala kwe-COVID-19.']

sourceString: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" released in March 2020.Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company developing privacy technologies that was also originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.
targetString: Kusekelwe ocwaningweni oluvela ephepheni elimhlophe i-"Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" elakhishwa ngoMarch 2020. Omunye umzamo ofanayo yipulatifomu ye-SafeTrace ye-Enigma MPC, inkampane esungula ubuchwepheshe bobumfihlo eyasungulwa okokuqala e-MIT Media Lab.
translated: ['Kusekelwe ocwaningweni oluvela ephepheni elimhlophe elithi "Apps Gone Rogue: Ukugcina Ubumfihlo Bomuntu Siqu Kubhubhane" olukhishwe ngoMashi 2020.Omunye umzamo ofanayo yipulatifomu ye-SafeTrace yi-Enigma MPC, inkampani ethuthukisa ubuchwepheshe bobumfihlo nayo eyasungulwa ekuqaleni e-MIT Media Lab.']

sourceString: SafeTrace utilizes secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with other users and officials, without compromising the privacy of that data.
targetString: I-SafeTrace isebenzisa ubuchwepheshe behadiwe obuvikelekile ukuze ivumele abasebenzisi ukuba babelane ngedatha ebucayi yendawo nempilo nabanye abasebenzisi nabezomthetho, ngaphandle kokubeka ubumfihlo baleyo datha engozini.
translated: ['I-SafeTrace isebenzisa ubuchwepheshe be-hardware obuphephile ukuvumela abasebenzisi ukuthi babelane ngendawo ebucayi nedatha yezempilo nabanye abasebenzisi nezikhulu, ngaphandle kokuphazamisa ubumfihlo baleyo datha.']

sourceString: On 5 April 2020, the global TCN Coalition was founded by groups that had coalesced around what was essentially the same approach and largely overlapping protocols, with the goal to reduce fragmentation, and enable global interoperability of tracing and alerting apps, a key aspect of achieving widespread adoption.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-5 April 2020, i-TCN Coalition yomhlaba wonke yasungulwa amaqembu abehlanganiswe yilokho obekuyindlela efanayo namaphrothokholi ashiyana kakhulu, ngomgomo wokunciphisa ukuhlukana, futhi kuvunyelwe ukusebenziseka emhlabeni wonke kwama-app okuthungatha nokuxwayisa, isici esibalulekile ekwamukelweni kabanzi.
translated: ['Ngo-5 Ephreli 2020, i-TCN Coalition yomhlaba wonke yasungulwa ngamaqembu ayehlangene azungeze lokho ngokuyisisekelo okwakuyindlela efanayo kanye nemigomo ehlangana kakhulu, ngenhloso yokunciphisa ukuhlukaniswa, nokwenza ukusebenzisana komhlaba wonke kwezinhlelo zokusebenza zokulandelela nokuxwayisa, isici esiyinhloko sokufeza ukwamukelwa okubanzi.']

sourceString: On 9 April 2020, the Singaporean government announced that it had open-sourced the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government app.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-9 April 2020, uhulumeni waseSingapore wamemezela ukuthi wenza isimemo sephrothokholi ye-BlueTrace esetshenziswa yi-app wayo kahulumeni esemthethweni.
translated: ['Ngo-9 Ephreli 2020, uhulumeni waseSingapore wamemezela ukuthi uvule i-BlueTrace protocol esetshenziswa uhlelo lwayo lokusebenza lukahulumeni olusemthethweni.']

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracing, which they claimed would preserve privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-10 April 2020, i-Google ne-Apple, izinkampane ezilawula amapulatifomu eselula ye-Android ne-iOS, zamemezela indlela yokuthungatha abantu, futhi zagomela ngokuthi izobuvikela ubumfihlo, ngokusekelwe enhlanganiseleni yobuchwepheshe be-Bluetooth Low Energy ne-cryptography evikela ubumfihlo.
translated: ['Ngo-10 April 2020, i-Google ne-Apple, izinkampani ezilawula amapulatifomu weselula we-Android ne-iOS, zamemezela isinyathelo sokulandelela abathintekayo, abathi bazogcina ubumfihlo, ngokusekelwe ekuhlanganiseni ubuchwepheshe be-Bluetooth Low Energy kanye ne-cryptography yokulondoloza ubumfihlo.']

sourceString: They also published specifications of the core technologies used in the system.
targetString: Ziphinde zashicilela izici zobuchwepheshe obusetshenziswe kusistimu.
translated: ['Baphinde bashicilela ukucaciswa kobuchwepheshe obuyinhloko obusetshenziswa ohlelweni.']

sourceString: According to Apple and Google, the system is intended to be rolled out in three stages:
targetString: Ngokuvumelana ne-Apple ne-Google, isistimu kuhloswe ukuba ikhishwe ngezigaba ezintathu:
translated: ['Ngokusho kwe-Apple ne-Google, uhlelo kuhloswe ukuthi luqaliswe ngezigaba ezintathu:']

sourceString: rollout of tools to enable governments to create official privacy-preserving coronavirus tracing apps
targetString: ukukhishwa kwamathuluzi ukuze kuvunyelwe ohulumeni ukuba bakhe ama-app asemthethweni athungatha i-coronavirus avikela ubumfihlo
translated: ['ukuqaliswa kwamathuluzi okwenza ohulumeni bakwazi ukudala izinhlelo zokusebenza ezisemthethweni zokulondoloza ubumfihlo zokulandelela i-coronavirus']

sourceString: integration of this functionality directly into iOS and AndroidGoogle and Apple plan to address the take-up and persistent surveillance problems by first distributing the system through operating system updates, and later removing it in the same way once the threat has passed.
targetString: ukufakwa kwalesi sici ngokuqondile ohlelweni lwe-iOS ne-AndroidGoogle ne-Apple ukuze kulungiswe izinkinga zokuqalisa nokuqapha okuqhubekayo ngokuthumela kuqala isistimu ngezibuyekezo ze-OS, futhi kamuva ukusikhipha ngendlela efanayo lapho usongo seludlulile.
translated: ['ukuhlanganiswa kwalokhu kusebenza ngqo ku-iOS ne-AndroidGoogle ne-Apple bahlela ukubhekana nezinkinga zokuqapha zokuthatha nokuphikelela ngokusabalalisa kuqala uhlelo ngokusebenzisa izibuyekezo zohlelo lokusebenza, futhi kamuva ukuyisusa ngendlela efanayo uma ingozi idlulile.']

sourceString: b'Drug repositioning (also known as drug repurposing, re-profiling, re-tasking or therapeutic switching) is the repurposing of an approved drug for the treatment of a different disease or medical condition than that for which it was originally developed.
targetString: I-b'Drug repositioning (ephinde yaziwe ngokuthi ukusetshenziswa kabusha komuthi, i-re-profiling, i-re-tasking noma i-therapeutic switching) iwukusebenzisa kabusha umuthi ogunyaziwe ukuze kwelashwe esinye isifo noma isimo sezempilo esihlukile kuleso eyayakhelwe sona.
translated: ["i-b'Drug repositioning (eyaziwa nangokuthi i-drug repurposing, i-re-profiling, i-re-tasking noma i-therapeutic switching) yi-repurposing yomuthi ovunyelwe wokwelashwa kwesifo esihlukile noma isimo sezokwelapha kunaleso esathuthukiswa ekuqaleni."]

sourceString: This is one line of scientific research which is currently being pursued to develop safe and effective COVID-19 treatments.
targetString: Lolu uhlobo locwaningo lwezesayensi olwenziwayo njengamanje ukuze kusungulwe izindlela zokwelapha i-COVID-19 eziphephile neziphumelelayo.
translated: ['Lona omunye umugqa wokucwaninga kwesayensi okwamanje olandelwayo ukuthuthukisa ukwelashwa okuphephile nokusebenzayo kwe-COVID-19.']

sourceString: Other research directions include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and convalescent plasma transfusion.SARS-CoV-2 has about 66 druggable proteins, each of which has multiple ligand binding sites.
targetString: Ezinye iziqondiso zocwaningo zibandakanya ukusungulwa komgomo we-COVID-19 nokumpontshelwa i-convalescent plasma. I-SARS-CoV-2 inamaphrotheni angaba ngu-66 akwazi ukusebenzisa umuthi, ngayinye inamasayithi amaningi okuhlangana kuwo amamolekhuli.
translated: ['Ezinye iziqondiso zocwaningo zihlanganisa ukuthuthukiswa komuthi wokugoma we-COVID-19 kanye nokufakwa kwe-plasma yokuphilisa. I-SARS-CoV-2 inamaprotheni angaba ngu-66 anezidakamizwa, ngalinye lawo linezindawo eziningi zokubopha i-ligand.']

sourceString: Analyzing those binding sites provide the reasonable project of developing effective antiviral drug against COVID-19 proteins.
targetString: Ukuhlaziya lawo masayithi okuhlanganwa kuwo kwakha iphrojekthi enengqondo yokusungula umuthi olwa negciwane ngokumelene namaphrotheni e-COVID-19.
translated: ['Ukuhlaziya lezo zindawo zokubopha kunikeza iphrojekthi enengqondo yokuthuthukisa umuthi osebenzayo wokulwa namagciwane ngokumelene namaprotheni e-COVID-19.']

sourceString: Of the most important SARS-CoV-2 target proteins are papain-like protease, RNA dependent RNA polymerase, helicase, S protein, and ADP ribophosphatase.
targetString: Kumaphrotheni abhekiwe abaluleke kakhulu e-SARS-CoV-2 yi-protease enjenge-papain, i-RNA polymerase esekelwe ku-RNA, i-helicase, i-S protein, ne-ADP ribophosphatase.
translated: ['Kumaprotheni abaluleke kakhulu okuhlosiwe kwe-SARS-CoV-2 yi-protease efana ne-papain, i-RNA encike ku-RNA polymerase, i-helicase, iprotheni ye-S, ne-ADP ribophosphatase.']

sourceString: Hussein A A, et al studied several candidate compounds which then optimized and analyzed for their skeleton similarity with the highest similar approved drugs in order to accelerate a potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug development in his preclinical study to be recommended in a clinical study design.
targetString: U-Hussein A A, nabanye bacwaninga imithi eminingana engasetshenziswa kwabe sekuthuthukiswa futhi kuhlaziywa ukufana kwesakhiwo sayo ngemithi egunyaziwe efanayo ephakeme ukuze kusheshiswe ukusungulwa komuthi onamandla wokwelapha i-SARS-CoV-2 kulolu cwaningo lwangaphambi kokwelapha ongase usetshenziswe njengomuthi wocwaningo.
translated: ['U-Hussein A A, et al wafunda izinhlanganisela eziningana ze-candidate ezabe sezilungisa futhi zahlaziya ukufana kwazo kwamathambo nezidakamizwa eziphezulu ezifanayo ezivunyelwe ukuze kusheshiswe ukuthuthukiswa kwezidakamizwa ezinamandla zokulwa ne-SARS-CoV-2 ocwaningweni lwakhe lwangaphambi komtholampilo ukuze kunconywe kumklamo wocwaningo lomtholampilo.']

sourceString: Chloroquine is an anti-malarial medication that is also used against some auto-immune diseases.
targetString: I-chloroquine ingumuthi wokwelapha umalaleveva ophinde usetshenziselwe izifo ezithile zamasosha omzimba.
translated: ['I-Chloroquine umuthi wokulwa nesifo sengculazi osetshenziswa futhi ngokumelene nezinye izifo ze-auto-immune.']

sourceString: On 18 March, the WHO announced that chloroquine and the related hydroxychloroquine would be among the four drugs studied as part of the Solidarity clinical trial.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-18 March, i-WHO yamemezela ukuthi i-chloroquine ne-hydroxychloroquine ehlobene nayo zizoba phakathi kwemithi emine ecwaningwa njengengxenye yocwaningo lwezokwelapha Oluhlanganisiwe.
translated: ['Ngo-18 Mashi, i-WHO yamemezela ukuthi i-chloroquine kanye ne-hydroxychloroquine ehlobene izoba phakathi kwezidakamizwa ezine ezifundwe njengengxenye yokuhlolwa komtholampilo we-Solidarity.']

sourceString: New York governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York State trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine would begin on 24 March.On 28 March, the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).
targetString: Umphathi-sifundazwe waseNew York u-Andrew Cuomo wamemezela ukuthi ucwaningo lweSifunda saseNew York lwe-chloroquine ne-hydroxychloroquine luzoqala ngomhla ka-24 March. Ngomhla ka-28 March, i-FDA yagunyaza ukusetshenziswa kwe-hydroxychloroquine sulfate ne-chloroquine phosphate ngaphansi kwe-Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).
translated: ['Umbusi waseNew York u-Andrew Cuomo umemezele ukuthi izivivinyo zaseNew York State ze-chloroquine ne-hydroxychloroquine zizoqala ngo-24 Mashi.Ngo-28 Mashi, i-FDA igunyaze ukusetshenziswa kwe-hydroxychloroquine sulfate ne-chloroquine phosphate ngaphansi kwe-Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).']

sourceString: The treatment has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trials process and is authorized under the EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients who are hospitalized but are not able to receive treatment in a clinical trial.
targetString: Lokhu kwelashwa akukagunyazwa yinqubo yocwaningo yezokwelapha ye-FDA futhi igunyazwa ngaphansi kwe-EUA kuphela njengendlela yokwelapha ecwaningwayo ezosetshenziselwa izimo eziphuthumayo ezigulini ezilaliswa esibhedlela kodwa ezingakwazi ukwamukela ukwelashwa ocwaningweni lwezokwelapha.
translated: ['Ukwelashwa akuzange kuvunyelwe inqubo yokuhlolwa komtholampilo ye-FDA futhi kugunyazwe ngaphansi kwe-EUA kuphela njengendlela yokuhlola yokusetshenziswa okuphuthumayo ezigulini ezilaliswe esibhedlela kodwa ezingakwazi ukuthola ukwelashwa esivivinyweni somtholampilo.']

sourceString: The CDC has said that "the use, dosing, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" are not yet established.
targetString: I-CDC ithe "ukusetshenziswa, umthamo, noma inkathi ye-hydroxychloroquine ku-prophylaxis noma ukwelashwa kwegciwane le-SARS-CoV-2" akukalungi.
translated: ['I-CDC ithe "ukusetshenziswa, i-dosing, noma isikhathi se-hydroxychloroquine ye-prophylaxis noma ukwelashwa kokutheleleka kwe-SARS-CoV-2" akukasungulwa.']

sourceString: Doctors have said they are using the drug when "there's no other option".
targetString: Odokotela bathe basebenzisa umuthi lapho "ingekho enye indlela".
translated: ['Odokotela bathi basebenzisa lo muthi uma "kungekho enye indlela".']

sourceString: A Turkish research team in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D.
targetString: Ithimba locwaningo laseTurkey e-Istanbul liqhuba ucwaningo oluncane ekusebenziseni i-chloroquine ihlanganiswe ne-zinc, i-vitamin A, i-vitamin C ne-vitamin D.
translated: ['Ithimba locwaningo laseTurkey e-Istanbul lenza ucwaningo oluncane ngokusetshenziswa kwe-chloroquine ngokuhlanganiswa ne-zinc, i-vitamin A, i-vitamin C ne-vitamin D.']

sourceString: Large studies are underway at Duke University and the University of Oxford.
targetString: Ucwaningo olukhulu luyaqhubeka eDuke University nase-University of Oxford.
translated: ['Izifundo ezinkulu ziyaqhubeka eDuke University naseNyuvesi yase-Oxford.']

sourceString: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting a trial on the safety and efficacy of preventative use of hydroxychloroquine.
targetString: I-NYU Langone Medical School iqhuba ucwaningo lokuphepha nokusebenza kwe-hydroxychloroquine ukuze kuvinjelwe isifo.
translated: ['I-NYU Langone Medical School iqhuba isivivinyo ngokuphepha nokusebenza kokusetshenziswa kokuvimbela i-hydroxychloroquine.']

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: Ucwaningo lwezokwelapha lwaseChina eWuhan naseShenzhen luthi kubonakala i-favipiravir "isebenza ngempela".
translated: ['Izivivinyo zomtholampilo zaseShayina eWuhan naseShenzhen zithi zibonisa ukuthi i-favipiravir "yayisebenza ngokucacile".']

sourceString: 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: Iziguli ezingu-35 eShenzhen zitholwe zinegathivu ekuhlolweni phakathi nezinsuku ezingu-4, kuyilapho ubude bokugula babuyizinsuku ezingu-11 ezigulini ezingu-45 ezingazange ziyithole.
translated: ['Iziguli ezingu-35 eShenzhen zihlolwe zingekho esikhathini esiphakathi kwezinsuku ezi-4, kanti ubude bokugula babungu-11 ezinsukwini ezingu-45 ezigulini ezingu-45 ezingazange zikuthole.']

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: Ocwaningweni oluqhutshwa eWuhan ezigulini ezingu-240 ezinenyumoniya, uhhafu wanikezwa i-favipiravir omunye uhhafu wanikwa i-umifenovir.
translated: ['Ocwaningweni olwenziwe eWuhan ezigulini ezingu-240 ezine-pneumonia, isigamu sanikezwa i-favipiravir futhi isigamu sathola i-umifenovir.']

sourceString: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the existing evidence in support of the drug is scant and preliminary.
targetString: I-Italian Pharmaceutical Agency yakhumbuza umphakathi ukuthi ubufakazi obukhona ekusekeleni umuthi bumbalwa futhi obangaphambi kokuba usebenze.
translated: ['I-Italian Pharmaceutical Agency ikhumbuze umphakathi ukuthi ubufakazi obukhona obusekela lo muthi buncane futhi buyinto yokuqala.']

sourceString: On 2 April, Germany announced that it would purchase the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-2 April, i-Germany yamemezela ukuthi izowuthenga umuthi eJapan iwubeke esitokweni, bese isebenzisa amasosha ukuze athumele umuthi ezibhedlela zaseyunivesithi, lapho umuthi uzosetshenziswa khona ekwelapheni iziguli ezine-COVID-19.
translated: ['Ngomhlaka-2 Ephreli, iJalimane yamemezela ukuthi izothenga lo muthi eJapane ukuze iqoqe, futhi isebenzise amasosha ukuhambisa umuthi ezibhedlela zaseyunivesithi, lapho umuthi uzosetshenziselwa ukwelapha iziguli ze-COVID-19.']

sourceString: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made overtures to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug.The drug may be less effective in severe cases of illness where the virus has already multiplied.
targetString: Ngokuvumelana ne-South China Morning Post, uShinzo Abe uye wazethula emkhandlwini ka-Trump mayelana nokuthenga umuthi. Umuthi ungase ungasebenzi ngokuphelele ezimweni ezimbi kakhulu zokugula lapho igciwane seliye laphindaphindeka khona.
translated: ['Ngokusho kweSouth China Morning Post, uShinzo Abe wenze ama-overtures kuhulumeni kaTrump mayelana nokuthenga lo muthi. Umuthi ungase ungasebenzi kangako ezimweni ezinzima zokugula lapho igciwane selivele landa.']

sourceString: It may not be safe for use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.
targetString: Kungaba okungaphephile ukuwusebenzisa kwabesifazane abakhulelwe noma lapho abazama ukukhulelwa.
translated: ['Kungenzeka kungaphephile ukusetshenziswa ngabesifazane abakhulelwe noma labo abazama ukukhulelwa.']

sourceString: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of the antivirals lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".
targetString: Olunye ucwaningo lwe-lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), inhlanganisela yemithi elwa negciwane i-lopinavir ne-ritonavir, lwaphetha ngokuthi "ayikho inzuzo etholakele".
translated: ['Olunye ucwaningo lwe-lopinavir / ritonavir (Kaletra), inhlanganisela ye-antivirals lopinavir ne-ritonavir, lwaphetha ngokuthi "akukho nzuzo eyabonwa".']

sourceString: The drugs were designed to inhibit HIV from replicating by binding to the protease.
targetString: Le mithi yayiklanyelwe ukuvimbela i-HIV ekuphindaphindekeni ngokuhlangana ne-protease.
translated: ['Izidakamizwa zazenzelwe ukuvimbela i-HIV ekuphindaphindeni ngokubopha ku-protease.']

sourceString: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to modify the drugs to find a compound that will bind with the protease of SARS-CoV-2.There are criticisms within the scientific community about directing resources to repurposing drugs specifically developed for HIV/AIDS.
targetString: Ithimba labacwaningi e-University of Colorado lizama ukushintsha imithi ukuze lithole uketshezi oluzohlangana ne-protease ye-SARS-CoV-2. Kunabagxeki emphakathini wososayensi ngokuqondisa imizamo ekusebenziseni kabusha imithi eklanyelwe ngokukhethekile i-HIV/AIDS.
translated: ['Ithimba labacwaningi eNyuvesi yaseColorado lizama ukuguqula izidakamizwa ukuze lithole i-compound ezobopha nge-protease ye-SARS-CoV-2.Kukhona ukugxekwa ngaphakathi komphakathi wesayensi mayelana nokuqondisa izinsiza zokuthenga kabusha izidakamizwa ezithuthukiselwe ngokukhethekile i-HIV / AIDS.']

sourceString: The WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international Solidarity trial.
targetString: I-WHO ibandakanye i-lopinavir/ritonavir ocwaningweni Oluhlanganisiwe lomhlaba jikelele.
translated: ['I-WHO yahlanganisa i-lopinavir / ritonavir ekulingweni kwe-Solidarity yamazwe omhlaba.']

sourceString: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections . Gilead Sciences subsequently discovered that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against multiple filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and corona- viruses .
targetString: I-Remdesivir yakhiwa futhi yasungulwa yi-Gilead Sciences njengomuthi wokwelapha igciwane le-Ebola nezifo ze-Marburg. I-Gilead Sciences yathola ukuthi i-Remdesivir ibinomsebenzi wokulwa negciwane ku-vitro ngokumelene namagciwane e-filo-, e-pneumo-, e-paramyxo-, ne-corona- .
translated: ['I-Remdesivir yadalwa futhi yasungulwa yiGileyadi Sciences njengendlela yokwelapha isifo segciwane le-Ebola kanye nezifo zegciwane laseMarburg . Ngemuva kwalokho iGileyadi Sciences yathola ukuthi iRemdesivir yayinomsebenzi wokulwa namagciwane ku-vitro ngokumelene ne-filo eminingi-, i-pneumo-, i-paramyxo-, ne-corona- amagciwane .']

sourceString: One issue with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to more severe disease and transmission.
targetString: Inkinga eyodwa ngokwelashwa okulwa negciwane ukusungula indlela yokwelapha ngama-mutation angaholela esifweni esibi kakhulu nesithelelanayo.
translated: ['Enye indaba ngokwelashwa nge-antiviral ukuthuthukiswa kokumelana ngokuguqulwa okungaholela ezifweni ezinzima kakhulu nokudluliselwa.']

sourceString: Some early pretrial studies suggest remdesivir may have a high genetic barrier to resistance.There are several clinical trials underway, including two conducted by Cleveland University Hospitals; one for people with moderate illness and another for those with more severe illness.
targetString: Ucwaningo lokuqala lwangaphambi lusikisela ukuthi i-remdesivir kungenzeka lunesivimbeli esiphezulu sezakhi zofuzo ekungasebenzini komuthi. Kunocwaningo oluningana lwezokwelapha oluqhubekayo, okubandakanya olumbili oluqhutshwa eZibhedlela zaseCleveland University; olulodwa ngolwabantu abanokugula okusesilinganisweni kanti olunye olwabantu abagula kabi kakhulu.
translated: ['Ezinye izifundo zokuqala zangaphambi kwecala zibonisa ukuthi i-remdesivir ingaba nomgoqo ophezulu wofuzo wokumelana. Kunezivivinyo eziningana zomtholampilo eziqhubekayo, kufaka phakathi ezimbili ezenziwa yiCleveland University Hospitals; omunye kubantu abanesifo esilinganiselayo nomunye kulabo abanesifo esinzima kakhulu.']

sourceString: There are three ongoing clinical trials of intravenous vitamin C for people who are hospitalized and severely ill with COVID-19; two placebo controlled (China, Canada) and one with no control (Italy).
targetString: Kunocwaningo lwezokwelapha oluthathu oluqhubekayo lomjovo we-vitamin C wabantu abalaliswa esibhedlela nabagula kakhulu abane-COVID-19; imithi-mbumbulu emibili (eChina, eCanada) nolulodwa olungalawuliwe (e-Italy).
translated: ['Kunezivivinyo ezintathu eziqhubekayo zomtholampilo ze-vitamin C ye-intravenous kubantu abalaliswe esibhedlela futhi abagula kakhulu nge-COVID-19; ezimbili placebo elawulwa (China, Canada) futhi omunye kungekho ukulawula (Italy).']

sourceString: New York State began trials for the antibiotic azithromycin on 24 March 2020.
targetString: ISifunda saseNew York saqala ucwaningo lwesibulali-magciwane esiyi-azithromycin ngomhla ka-24 March 2020.
translated: ['Isifundazwe saseNew York saqala izivivinyo ze-antibiotic azithromycin ngo-24 March 2020.']

sourceString: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is planning a clinical trial for Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), an inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, for the treatment of pre-symptomatic patients infected with the novel coronavirus.
targetString: I-National Center yaseJapan ye-Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) ihlela ucwaningo lwezokwelapha lwe-Teijin's Alvesco (i-ciclesonide), i-corticosteroid ehogelwayo ye-asthma, ekwelapheni iziguli ezingenazimpawu zesifo ezinegciwane elisha le-coronavirus.
translated: ["I-National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) yaseJapan ihlela isivivinyo somtholampilo se-Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), i-corticosteroid ephefumula i-asthma, yokwelapha iziguli zangaphambi kwezimpawu ezinegciwane le-coronavirus entsha."]

sourceString: A form of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, a Phase II trial is underway with 200 patients to be recruited from severe, hospitalized cases in Denmark, Germany, and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.
targetString: Ucwaningo lohlobo lwe-angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, Isigaba II luyaqhubeka neziguli ezingu-200 ezizofakwa ezisukela ezimweni ezimbi kakhulu, zabalaliswa esibhedlela eDenmark, eGermany, nase-Austria ukuze kubonakale ukusebenza kwalokhu kwelashwa.
translated: ['Uhlobo lwe-enzyme yokuguqula i-angiotensin 2, isivivinyo seSigaba II siqhubeka neziguli ezingama-200 ezizoqashwa kumacala anzima, alaliswe esibhedlela eDenmark, eJalimane, nase-Austria ukunquma ukusebenza kokwelashwa.']

sourceString: Researchers from the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are currently studying the role of colchicine in reducing inflammation and pulmonary complications in patients suffering from mild symptoms of COVID-19.
targetString: Abacwaningi base-Montreal Heart Institute eCanada njengamanje bacwaninga indima ye-colchicine ekunciphiseni ukuvuvukala nezinkinga zamaphaphu ezigulini eziguliswa izimpawu zesifo ezingatheni ze-COVID-19.
translated: ['Abacwaningi abavela eMontreal Heart Institute eCanada njengamanje bafunda indima ye-colchicine ekunciphiseni ukuvuvukala nezinkinga zamaphaphu ezigulini ezihlushwa izimpawu ezincane ze-COVID-19.']

sourceString: The study, named COLCORONA, is recruiting 6000 adults aged 40 and over who were diagnosed with COVID-19 and experience mild symptoms not requiring hospitalization.
targetString: Ucwaningo, olubizwa ngokuthi yi-COLCORONA, luhlanganisa abantu abadala abangu-6000 abaneminyaka engu-40 nangaphezulu abatholwe benesifo se-COVID-19 futhi abanezimpawu zesifo ezingatheni ezingadingi ukulaliswa esibhedlela.
translated: ['Ucwaningo, olubizwa nge-COLCORONA, luqasha abantu abadala abangu-6000 abaneminyaka yobudala engama-40 nangaphezulu abatholakale bene-COVID-19 futhi bathola izimpawu ezincane ezingadingi ukulaliswa esibhedlela.']

sourceString: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or who do not have an effective contraceptive method are not eligible.
targetString: Abesifazane abakhulelwe noma abancelisayo noma abangenayo indlela esebenzayo yokuvimbela ukukhulelwa abafaneleki.
translated: ['Abesifazane abakhulelwe noma abancelisa ibele noma abangenayo indlela ephumelelayo yokuvimbela inzalo abafanelekile.']

sourceString: Several anticoagulants are being tested in Italy.
targetString: Kuhlolwa ama-anticoagulants amaningana e-Italy.
translated: ['Kuhlolwa ama-anticoagulants amaningana e-Italy.']

sourceString: Low-molecular-weight heparin is being widely used to treat patients, prompting the Italian Medicines Agency to publish guidelines on its use.
targetString: I-heparin enesisindo esiphansi samamolekhuli isetshenziswa kabanzi ekwelapheni iziguli, yaholela ne-Italian Medicines Agency ukuba ishicilele iziqondiso zokusetshenziswa kwayo.
translated: ['I-heparin enesisindo esiphansi isetshenziswa kabanzi ukwelapha iziguli, okwenza i-Italian Medicines Agency ishicilele imihlahlandlela ngokusetshenziswa kwayo.']

sourceString: A multicenter study on 300 patients researching the use of enoxaparin sodium at prophylaxis and therapeutic dosages was announced in Italy on April 14.
targetString: Ucwaningo lwezikhungo eziningi lweziguli ezingu-300 olucwaninga ukusetshenziswa kwe-enoxaparin sodium emithamweni yokuvimbela nokwelapha isifo yamenyezelwa e-Italy ngo-April 14.
translated: ['Ucwaningo lwe-multicenter ezigulini ezingama-300 ezicwaninga ngokusetshenziswa kwe-enoxaparin sodium ku-prophylaxis kanye nemithamo yokwelapha yamenyezelwa e-Italy ngo-Ephreli 14.']

sourceString: Since SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, considerable scientific attention has been focused on repurposing approved anti-viral drugs that were developed for prior outbreaks such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.
targetString: Njengoba i-SARS-CoV-2 iyigciwane, ezesayensi ziye zagxila kakhulu ekusebenziseni kabusha imithi elwa negciwane eyayisungulelwe imiqedazwe yangaphambilini enjengegciwane le-MERS, i-SARS, ne-West Nile.
translated: ['Njengoba i-SARS-CoV-2 iyigciwane, ukunakwa okukhulu kwesayensi kuye kwagxila ekwenzeni kabusha izidakamizwa ezivunyiwe zokulwa namagciwane ezakhiwa ukuqubuka kwangaphambili njenge-MERS, SARS, ne-West Nile virus.']

sourceString: Ribavirin: ribavirin was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: I-Ribavirin: i-ribavirin yasikiselwa ekwelapheni i-COVID-19 ngokuvumelana nohlelo 7 lweziqondiso zaseChina
translated: ['I-Ribavirin: i-ribavirin yanconywa ukwelashwa kwe-COVID-19 ngokusho kwemihlahlandlela ye-Chinese 7th edition']

sourceString: Umifenovir: umifenovir was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: I-Umifenovir: i-umifenovir yasikiselwa ekwelapheni i-COVID-19 ngokuvumelana nohlelo 7 lweziqondiso zaseChina
translated: ['I-Umifenovir: i-umifenovir yanconywa ukwelashwa kwe-COVID-19 ngokwemihlahlandlela yohlelo lwe-7 lwaseChina']

sourceString: Some antibiotics that have been identified as potentially repurposable as COVID-19 treatments:
targetString: Ezinye izibulali-magciwane eziye zatholwa njengezingasetshenziswa kabusha ekwelapheni i-COVID-19:
translated: ['Amanye ama-antibiotics ahlonziwe njengangase aphinde atholakale njengokwelashwa kwe-COVID-19:']

sourceString: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Approved by China.
targetString: I-Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Igunyazwe eChina.
translated: ['I-Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Ivunywe yiChina.']

sourceString: Also trials in Italy and China. and see Tocilizumab#COVID-19.
targetString: Ocwaningweni futhi lwase-Italy naseChina. futhi ubheke i-Tocilizumab#COVID-19.
translated: ['Futhi izilingo e-Italy naseChina. futhi ubone Tocilizumab#COVID-19.']

sourceString: b'A COVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: Umgomo we-b'A COVID-19 ungumgomo ocatshangwayo ngokumelene nesifo se-coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19).
translated: ["umuthi wokugoma we-b'A COVID-19 umuthi wokugoma ocatshangwayo wokulwa nesifo se-coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19)."]

sourceString: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, there are multiple attempts in progress to develop such a vaccine.
targetString: Nakuba ungekho umgomo osuqedile ucwaningo lwezokwelapha, kunemizamo eminingi eqhubekayo yokwakha umgomo onjalo.
translated: ['Nakuba kungekho muthi wokugoma oqede izivivinyo zomtholampilo, kunemizamo eminingi eqhubekayo yokuthuthukisa umuthi wokugoma onjalo.']

sourceString: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the causative virus, to become available in less than 18 months.
targetString: Ngasekupheleni kuka-February 2020, i-World Health Organization (WHO) yathi ibingalindele ukuthi umgomo we-SARS-CoV-2, igciwane eliyimbangela, ukuba litholakale ngaphansi kwezinyanga ezingu-18.
translated: ['Ngasekupheleni kukaFebhuwari 2020, i-World Health Organization (WHO) ithe ayilindele ukuthi umuthi wokugomela i-SARS-CoV-2, igciwane le-causative, utholakale esikhathini esingaphansi kwezinyanga ezingu-18.']

sourceString: Five vaccine candidates were in Phase I safety studies in April.
targetString: Amakhendidethi okugoma amahlanu abeseSigabeni I socwaningo lokuphepha ngo-April.
translated: ['Abahlanu abazogoma babesezifundweni zokuphepha zePhase I ngo-Ephreli.']

sourceString: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.
targetString: I-COVID-19 yatholwa ngo-December 2019.
translated: ['I-COVID-19 yatholakala ngoDisemba 2019.']

sourceString: A major outbreak spread around the world in 2020, leading to considerable investment and research activity to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Ukuqubuka okukhulu kwabhebhetheka emhlabeni wonke ngo-2020, kwaholela emsebenzini omkhulu wokutholwa kwezimali nocwaningo ukuze kusungulwe umgomo.
translated: ['Ukuqubuka okukhulu kwasakazeka emhlabeni wonke ngo-2020, okuholela ekutshalweni kwezimali okukhulu kanye nomsebenzi wokucwaninga ukuthuthukisa umuthi wokugoma.']

sourceString: Many organizations are using published genomes to develop possible vaccines against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Izinhlangano eziningi zisebenzisa izakhi zofuzo ukuze zisungule imigomo engenziwa ye-SARS-CoV-2.
translated: ['Izinhlangano eziningi zisebenzisa ama-genomes ashicilelwe ukuthuthukisa imithi yokugoma engenzeka ngokumelene ne-SARS-CoV-2.']

sourceString: Stated in April, imperatives of the CEPI initiative for vaccine development are speed, manufacturing capacity, deployment at scale, and global access.
targetString: Kusukela ngo-April, izinto ezisemqoka zomsebenzi we-CEPI wokusungula umgomo ziyashesha, ziyagungulwa, ziyakhiqizwa, futhi ziyafinyeleleka emhlabeni.
translated: ['Kushiwo ngo-Ephreli, izidingo zesinyathelo se-CEPI sokuthuthukiswa kwemithi yokugoma ijubane, amandla okukhiqiza, ukuthunyelwa ngezinga, nokufinyelela emhlabeni jikelele.']

sourceString: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were under research and development during early 2020 to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: Ngo-April, ososayensi be-CEPI babike ukuthi amapulatifomu obuchwepheshe ahlukahlukene angu-10 aye acwaningwa futhi asungulwa ngasekuqaleni kuka-2020 ukuze kwakhiwe umgomo osebenzayo ngokumelene ne-COVID-19.
translated: ['Ngo-Ephreli, ososayensi be-CEPI babika ukuthi amapulatifomu obuchwepheshe ahlukene angu-10 ayengaphansi kocwaningo nentuthuko ngesikhathi sokuqala kuka-2020 ukudala umuthi wokugoma osebenzayo ngokumelene ne-COVID-19.']

sourceString: Major platform targets advanced into Phase I safety studies include:
targetString: Imisebenzi yepulatifomu emikhulu eyathuthukela ocwaningweni lokuphepha lweSigaba I ihlanganisa:
translated: ['Izinhloso ezinkulu zepulatifomu eziqhubekele phambili ezifundweni zokuphepha zeSigaba I zihlanganisa:']
